name: 主题
description:
These tags are for the major and minor [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Theme_%28literature%29]themes[/url] or the elements of a game's story that presents themselves in a noticeable way.

These are what you can call the game is about if they are the major themes of a story. Or maybe the small things you notice in that story that still stand out and add to it in a way.

name: 奇幻
description: This game features elements and themes from the [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Fantasy]fantasy[/url] genre.

name: 超感知能力（ESP）
alias:
Mental Powers
Psionic Abilities
Psychic Powers
Telepathy
description: This game features elements and themes related to the [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Extrasensory_perception]extrasensory perception[/url] concept.

name: 魔法
description:
This game features elements and themes related to the paranormal concept of [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Magic_%28paranormal%29]magic[/url].

Do not use for games that have magic as a form of illusionary tricks which has no paranormal qualities.

name: 吸血鬼
description: This game features elements and themes related to the  [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Vampire]vampire[/url] lore.

name: 超能力
description: This game features elements and themes related to characters with [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Superpower_%28ability%29]superpowered[/url] abilities.

name: 恐怖
description: This game features elements and themes related to the [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Horror_fiction]horror[/url] genre.

name: 死亡恐惧症
description: This game features characters who are mostly in a state of [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Fear_of_death]fear of death[/url]. This may have justifiable reasons based on the story or may just be related to the mental illness called necrophobia.

name: 身份认同危机
description: This game features characters who are suffering from a case of [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Identity_crisis_%28psychology%29]identity crisis[/url].

name: 被怪物恐吓
description: This game features characters who are being terrorized by [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Monster]monsters[/url].

name: 动作
description: This game features elements and themes related to the [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Action_(fiction)]action[/url] genre.

name: 战斗
description: This game features scenes of [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Combat]combat[/url].

name: 机甲战斗
description: This game features scenes of [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Combat]combat[/url] with [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Mecha]mecha[/url].

name: 悬疑
description:
This game features elements and themes related to the [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Mystery_fiction]mystery[/url] genre.

A mystery is a story whose plot involves a crime or other event that remains puzzlingly unsettled until the very end.

name: 角色
description: These tags represent all kinds of details about a game's [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Character_%28arts%29]characters[/url] that stand out.

name: 其他游戏性元素
description: These are the tags about [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Gameplay]gameplay[/url] elements not found in traditional VNs.

name: 设定
description:
A game's setting includes the time, location, and everything in which it's story takes place, and initiates the main backdrop and mood for that story.

[Edited from [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Setting_%28fiction%29]Wikipedia[/url].]

name: 色情内容
description: This tag can be used for the games that has [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Sexual_content]erotic content[/url]. It is recommended to use its child-tags to provide further details instead when applicable.

name: 剧情
description: [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Plot_%28narrative%29]Plot[/url] tags are the ones about 'how' the game's story is told. What type of a story it is, what kinds of routes and endings it includes, what known methods are used etc.

name: 个人武装战斗
description:
These games contain scenes of [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Combat]combat[/url] with (hand-held) weapons, like swords, firearms and the like.
Combat with Mecha and other vehicles has a different tag.

name: 路线
description:
These tags are for details on the story's routes, if it has any.

For details on the role of routes in visual novels, you can check the related [url=https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Visual_novel#Structure]Wikipedia[/url] article.

name: 结局
description:
This metatag is to house other tags about the mechanics of games ending.

Tags about the content of an ending are not allowed, ex. Happy Ending.

You can the related [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Types_of_fiction_with_multiple_endings]Wikipedia[/url] article for details.

name: 组织
description: The subtags of this metatag are for games in which certain [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Organizations]organizations[/url] play an important role - usually because the protagonist and/or his friends/love interests are members of said organizations or are affiliated with them.

name: 宇宙
description: This metatag covers the tags that detail the universe the games take place. They may be set somewhere in the [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Known_universe]known universe[/url] or a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Fictional_universe]fictional universe[/url].

name: 时间段
description: These are the tags that define the [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Time_period]time period[/url] VN's stories are set in.

name: 动作游戏
description:
This tag indicates that the game includes gameplay sequences challenging the player's speed, dexterity and reaction time.

Check the related [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Action_Game]Wikipedia[/url] entry for details.

name: 冒险游戏（ADV）
description:
In these games, the box with the text occupies only part of the screen, usually at the bottom. This is by far the most common text presentation method.

If the textbox is not in the same position every time, use the [url=http://vndb.org/g398]Floating Textbox[/url] tag instead of this one.

If a game uses both [url=http://vndb.org/g43]full-screen[/url] and part-screen textboxes, apply both tags to it.

[url=http://s.vndb.org/sf/01/6101.jpg]Example 1[/url]
[url=http://s.vndb.org/sf/04/1304.jpg]Example 2[/url]

name: 策略游戏
description:
A [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Strategy_game]strategy game[/url] is a type of game that challenges the player to think critically in order to achieve victory.

This VN features gameplay sequences from this genre.

name: 监禁
alias:
Can't Get Out
Detention
Imprisonment
Incarceration
Kankin
Trapped
description:
The game takes place inside a building, landform or dimension from which the characters can't get out.

They may be imprisoned by law, confined to a psychiatric facility or incarcerated by others illegally, like during a kidnapping.

Prime difference between this tag and [url=/g2978]Stranded[/url] is that whereas confinement is about escape or reaching a goal first, stranded is primarily about survival and often waiting for rescue.

name: SLG
alias:
Artificial Life Game
Life Simulation Game
SLG
description:
A [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Simulation_video_game]simulation game[/url] attempts to recreate aspects of reality and puts the player in control.

This VN features gameplay sequences from this genre.

Similar to RPG games, simulation games (SLG) usually have stats representing certain values of your character. And to achieve certain goals you try to build up certain stats. On RPG's most of these stats are combat related, while on SLG's they are mostly aspects of our daily lives.

If all the stats are related to dating and attractiveness to hero(in)es, you're looking at a [url=/g39]Dating Simulation[/url] instead. If the stats do not belong to the protagonist but to a separate character, you're most likely looking at a [url=/g40]Raising Simulation[/url].

name: 角色扮演游戏（RPG）
description:
An [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Role-playing_video_game]RPG[/url] is a game in which you assume the role of a character introduced to a vast world to be explored. Games typically place emphasis on gaining equipment and experience points through fighting enemies in order to advance through different levels.

This VN features gameplay sequences from this genre.

name: 火器战斗
description: These games have battles that are resolved by using (personal) [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Firearms]firearms[/url] - whether pistols, flintlocks or modern assault rifles. Normally crew-served weapons also count as personal weapons if used by a single person (so if someone is dual wielding [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/M1918_Browning_Automatic_Rifle]BARs[/url]... go ahead)

name: 格斗游戏
description: This game is either a full [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Fighting_game]fighting game[/url] or has has a fighting game as a minigame.

name: 射击游戏
description:
A [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Shooting_game]shooter game[/url] is a type of game that challenges the player's speed and reaction time to succeed. This is mostly done by player directing an avatar and shooting at objects in the game.

This VN features gameplay sequences from this genre.

name: 约会模拟
description:
A [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Dating_sim]dating sim[/url] is a type of simulation with romance focus.

This VN features gameplay sequences from this genre.

In general, the simulation aspect means that you're setting schedules for the protagonist, who may have stats such as Appearance, Fitness, Studying, etc., and these stats affect which heroes / heroines you have a chance with.

While VN's with dating sim elements are allowed in the database, dating sims with brief VN elements are not.

[b]Do not use this tag if none of the stats involve a romantic/dating element; use [url=/g34]Simulation Game[/url] instead[/b].

name: 养成模拟游戏
alias:
Breeding Simulation
Teaching Simulation
Training Simulation
description:
A [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Raising_sim]raising sim[/url] is a type of simulation where the protagonist trains or rears one or more other characters to achieve a certain goal(s), from passing an exam to becoming a princess...

It is common that the character(s) raised are given numerical stats such as Appearance, Fitness, Studying that represent their progress. The player in a game of this kind is responsible for setting their schedule.

This VN features gameplay sequences from this genre.

While VN's with raising sim elements are allowed in the database, raising sims with brief VN elements are not.

name: 回合制策略游戏
description:
[url=https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Turn-based_strategy]Turn-Based Strategy[/url] is a strategy game where gameplay alternates between players: each player has the time to contemplate their next move and execute it, before relinquishing control to the next player. 

TBS games derive from traditional board games, tabletop wargames like [i]Warhammer[/i] and [i]BattleTech[/i], and the miniature tabletop battles used by real generals and historians to practice and conduct actual wars for millennia. Many computer TBS titles use similar grid maps, hit and damage systems, and unit balance concepts to their earlier dice-and-paper equivalents.

TBS is known for the scale of its action, which often includes a large map for its gameplay and can vary from international conflicts all the way up to controlling whole worlds or galaxies. Larger-scale games often devolve from violent conflict into general competitive empire-building simulations with the possibility for non-violent victory, at which point they become so-called "4X" (eXplore, eXpand, eXploit, eXterminate) or “Grand Strategy” games.

name: 实时策略游戏
description: This game has some elements from the [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Real_Time_Strategy]real time strategy[/url] games genre.

name: 文本占据大部分画面
description:
In these games, the box with the text occupies all or most of the screen. The box may have a border, like in [url=http://s.vndb.org/sf/08/808.jpg]Fate/stay night[/url], or no border, like in [url=http://s.vndb.org/sf/35/3135.jpg]Kira☆Kira[/url].

Many games use a full-screen textbox to display backlog text, and a part-screen textbox to display the current text. That does NOT count for this tag.

If a game uses both full-screen and [url=http://vndb.org/g32]part-screen textboxes[/url], apply both tags to it.

name: 手枪战斗
description: Pistols. Handguns. These games use them.

name: 公司
description: A [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Corporation]corporation[/url] plays an important part in the story.

name: 军事
description:
A military (or to some degree, paramilitary) organisation plays important role in the visual novel.

This might be the normal military of a country, Special Forces, a PMC or something outlandish like the Teikoku Gekidan or the Galaxy Angels.

name: 学校
description: Use this tag only if you can not identify what kind of a school that the game uses. Otherwise use of the child tags under this one.

name: 高中
description: Some part of the game takes place in a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/High_school]high school[/url].

name: 大学
description: Some part of the game takes place in a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/University]university[/url].

name: 忍者
description: [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Ninja]Ninja[/url] clans or similar organizations of shinobi are important parts of this story.

name: 步枪战斗
description:
Games with fights that involve the use of non-automatic rifles.

(Full) Automatic weapons have a different tag.

name: 地球
description: The game takes place on our own planet. Most continents, countries and cities featured are portrayed as they are or have been on [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Earth]Earth[/url]. Stories set in ficticious cities based on real cities in recognised countries take place on Earth.

name: 太空
description: The game takes place in the vacuum of space between celestial bodies or on planets (moons, asteroids...) besides Terra. For example, this category can be used to define games where the characters may inhabit spaceships that journey across the universe.

name: 取材自神话传说
description: These tags are for games that feature scenes passing on locations taken directly from these myths (or locations inspired by those), not the games that has elements from these myths.

name: 克苏鲁神话
description: [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Cthulhu_Mythos]Cthulhu Mythos[/url] strongly influences the setting and events in this VN.

name: 英国神话
description: [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Matter_of_Britain]British mythology[/url] strongly influences the setting and events in this VN.

name: 北欧神话
description: [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Nordic_mythology]Norse mythology[/url] strongly influences the setting and events in this VN.

name: 希腊神话
description: [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Greek_mythology]Greek mythology[/url] strongly influences the setting and events in this VN.

name: 自动火器战斗
description: If SMGs, assault rifles and machine guns are the solution to the problem, then the game deserves this tag.

name: 现代地球
description:
The visual novel is set on modern day [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Earth]Earth[/url].
Note: "Modern day" refers to an unspecified time period between the late 20th century and today.

name: 未来地球
description: This visual novel is set on a fictional rendition of future [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Earth]Earth[/url].

name: 带刃武器战斗
description:
Knives, swords, Naginata... if battles in the game are resolved with such implements, it should be tagged with this (or one of the more specific children).
Lightsabers and the like count as bladed weapons(as long they still cut/pierce).

name: 大和抚子女主角
description:
At least one of the heroines  is a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Yamato_Nadeshiko]Yamato Nadeshiko[/url].

Yamato Nadeshiko is a Japanese term meaning the "personification of an idealized Japanese woman", or "the epitome of pure, feminine beauty".

name: 有武力的女主角
alias:
Fighting capable heroine
Heroine that can fight
Warrior Heroine
description:
At least one of the heroines of these games is a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Warrior]warrior[/url]. She may be a professional soldier, a self-trained martial artist, a miko with a powerful charms and a sword or maybe a fantasy being. But she can definitely handle herself in a fight.

A game doesn't need to have scenes of the heroine actually fighting to have this tag. This is more about the characters demeanor than the action scenes.

name: 用剑战斗
description: These games have battles with swords - whether with European longswords, nihontou or fantasy BFS matters not.

name: 女武者女主角
description:
Onna Bugeisha - Female Weaponmaster
A heroine archetype - usually wielding a Nihontou or Naginata (in a few cases a bow), the use of which she has trained with since she was a child (in a style or another).
Might carry her weapon with her all the time, and have a certain mission (guard a certain holy place, vanquish demons, protect a specific person...).
They almost always have a strong sense of honour and justice. 
More often than not will have long, black hair and use dated words.

name: 末日后的地球
description: A considerable part of this game is set on a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Apocalyptic_and_post-apocalyptic_fiction]post apocalyptic setting[/url], if not all.

name: 薙刀战斗
description: Naginata(長刀) are basically swords mounted at the end of a stick. They are used traditionally by women (of the warrior class) to defend their homes. A rather deadly and elegant weapon.

name: 用矛战斗
description:
Long sticks with a blade at the point, usually used to pierce the enemy.
Not to be confused with the Naginata, which is primarily used for slashing attacks.
Pikes and similar weapons belong here as well.

name: 斧头战斗
description: The favorite weapon of your neighbourhood viking.

name: 刀/匕首战斗
description: Shorter blades used primarily for stabbing.

name: 钝器战斗
description: Combat in this game involves blunt weapons, like staves or clubs.

name: 双持手枪
description: Games that has people using a pistol in each hand, possibly as a character's style.

name: 长杆战斗
description:
Quarterstaves and similar weapons apply.
Not to be confused with clubs, who are usually one-handed and have a thicker end than center.

name: 短棍战斗
description:
Combat with clubs and similar unrefined, possibly improvised weaponry.
No to be confused with staves, who are usually longer and wielded with two hands (and which tend to be way more elegant).

name: 射箭战斗
description: In these game, bows (and similar projectile weapons, like crossbows and even slings, but not guns, arquebuses or similar) are used to actually harm and/or kill someone - if you just shoot at rice paddings, it doesn't belong here.

name: 异种武器战斗
alias:
Chain
Combat with Rare Weapons
Combat with Weird Weapons
Dart
Fan
description:
The protagonist uses a chain? The second heroine uses darts? No matter how hard you look, you can't find any appropriate name for the weapon?
Use this tag.
Do not use it for rare examples of common weapons - we don't care if only 20 ever were made, it's still a handgun ;-)

name: 徒手战斗
description: These games involved unarmed combat - whether it's karate, secret martial arts or just wrestling and punching the other guy in the face harder than he punches you in yours.

name: 魔法/超能力战斗
alias:
Combat by magical or other unnatural means
ESP Combat
Magic Combat
description: If the main mode of combat involves throwing "energy" at the enemy, this applies.

name: 机动战斗
description: This game has action and combat scenes involving people riding something to fight. Tanks, helicopters, airplanes, mecha and even normal cars...

name: 女性之间做爱
alias:
Girl-on-girl Sex
Girl x Girl Sex
Female on Female Sex
GxG Sex
Yuri
description:
This visual novel has scenes of [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Lesbian_sex]lesbian sex[/url].

Lesbian sexual practices are sexual activities where the participants are women.

For the purpose of the database, the tag uses the binary understanding of genders, and "Female" refers to a cis woman, who was assigned female at birth and identifies as such.

name: 男性对男性的性行为
alias:
Boy on Boy Sex
Boy x Boy Sex
BxB Sex
Gay Sex
MSM Sex
Man-on-Man Sex
Men with Men Sex
Yaoi
description:
This visual novel has scenes of men with men sex.

Men who have sex with men (abbreviated as MSM, also known as males who have sex with males) are male persons who engage in sexual activity with members of the same sex, regardless of their sexual identity; many men choose not to (or cannot for other reasons) accept social identities of gay or bisexual.

For the purpose of the database, the tag uses the binary understanding of genders, and "Male" refers to a cis man, who was assigned male at birth and identifies as such.

name: 强奸
description:
This game contains scenes of [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Rape]rape[/url]. 

Please use the specific child tag to mark the rape scenes in the game, so users that want to avoid/seek such content can make use of the tagging feature fully.

name: 完全可避免的被强奸
description: You can see every "proper ending" of the game without experiencing any rape scenes. The only rape scenes are reserved for premature bad endings, which you are not forced to read to access the other endings.

name: 乱伦
description: These games contain sex scenes that could be considered [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Incest]incestious[/url]. Whether the involved characters are actually blood-related matters not.

name: 女主角
description:
[url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Heroine]Heroines[/url] are the female members of a game's cast with their own routes and/or endings.

Do not mix with a VN's lead female character, that is called a protagonist.

name: 血缘乱伦
description: This eroge contains incestual eroscenes with characters that are blood-related.

name: 兄弟姐妹间做爱
description: These games contain sexual scenes between a brother and his sister. They may or may not be blood-related.

name: 姐妹乱伦
description: These games contain sexual scenes between two (or more) sisters. They may or may not be blood-related.

name: 血缘姐妹乱伦
description: These games contain sexual scenes between blood-related sisters.

name: 血亲兄弟姐妹乱伦
description: These games contain sexual scenes between a blood-related brother and sister.

name: 非血缘乱伦
description: This eroge contains sexual scenes involving characters which are related but are not blood-related (adopted siblings and similar).

name: 非血缘姐妹乱伦
description: These games contain sexual scenes between non-blood-related sisters.

name: 非血缘兄弟姐妹乱伦
description: These games contain sexual scenes between a non-blood-related brother and sister.

name: 恋爱
description: Romance plays a large role in these games.

name: 女女恋爱
alias:
Girls Love
GxG Romance
Shoujo Ai
Yuri Romance
description:
This game contains romance between girls.
Please note that this does not necessarily mean that there are any sexual scenes, for that use the [url=/g82]Lesbian Sex[/url] tag.

name: 男性和男性的恋爱
alias:
Boys Love
BxB Romance
Shounen Ai
Yaoi Romance
description:
This game contains romance between boys.
Please note that this does not necessarily mean that there are any sexual scenes, for that use the [url=/g83]Male on Male Sex[/url] tag.

name: 乱伦恋情
description: These games have romance that could be called [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Incest]incestual[/url] (whether the involved parties are blood-related or not is irrelevant).

name: 兄弟姐妹恋情
description: These games contain romance between a brother and sister.

name: 姐妹恋情
description: These games contain romance between two sisters.

name: 空间站
description: (Significant portions) of the game play on a space station.

name: 宇宙飞船
description: [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Spacecraft]Spaceships[/url] play an important role in the game's story.

name: 喜剧
description: Comedy is an important element of these games.

name: 科幻
description: Science Fiction (Hard or Soft) is an important Element of these games.

name: 硬科幻
description:
These games have [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Hard_Science_Fiction]Hard Science Fiction[/url] elements - less "these work by the powers of <techword>", more realistic elements.

...do these even exist? Inquiring minds want to know.

name: Kuudere Heroine
description:
These games have at least one kuudere heroine.

Kuuderes start as cold or impersonal towards the protagonist (and, possibly, everyone else) and then develop feelings for the protagonist as the story progresses.

A variant of the traditional tsundere archetype.

name: 天才女主角
description:
One or more of the heroines in a game with this tag is considered to be a genius.

A [url=https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Genius]genius[/url] is a person who displays exceptional intellectual ability, creativity, or originality, typically to a degree that is associated with the achievement of an unprecedented leap of insight.

Mind you, being smart is not the same thing as being a genius, and high scholastic achievement alone is not the mark of a genius.

name: 黑客女主角
description: At least one the heroines of this visual novel is a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Hacker_%28term%29]hacker[/url].

name: 妹妹式女主角(性格)
description:
These games have at least one imouto-type-heroine. An imouto-type heroine is a heroine who is not a sibling or a step-sibling to the protagonist but acts and gets treated like a little sister anyway.

This tag is used as a character trait of heroines. For actual sister connection please use the sister heroine tag.

TL Note: Imouto means younger sister.

name: 大姐姐型女主角
description:
These games have at least one oneesan-type-character. An oneesan-type heroine is a heroine who is not a sibling or a step-sibling to the protagonist but acts and gets treated like a big sister anyway.

This tag is used as a character trait of heroines. For actual sister connection please use the sister heroine tag.

TL Note: Oneesan means older sister.

name: 女仆女主角
description: These games have at least one heroine who is a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Maid]maid[/url].

name: 主人公的学姐/前辈女主角
alias:
Protagonist's Sempai as a Heroine
Protagonist's Upperclassman as a Heroine
description: These games have at least one heroine who is a senpai of the protagonist. Some examples can be a senior at a work place or a student of a class some years above.

name: 贵族女主角
description:
These games have at least one heroine who is of noble blood - a queen or princess, or if it really defines her, of "normal" nobility.

Current status is not important for these tags, such as a noble family that is no more wouldn't change the heroine's birthright.

Not named "Noble Heroine" to avoid tons of heroines with a noble Heart but not blood being nominated.

Check the related [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Royal_family]wikipedia[/url] entry for details.

name: 巫女女主角
description: These games have at least one heroine who is a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Miko]miko[/url]. The traditional dress is common, but not strictly required.

name: 修女女主角
description: These games have at least one heroine who is a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Nun]nun[/url]. Christianity not required.

name: 不可避的强奸剧情
description: There is a rape scene in at least one of the routes and this is unavoidable.

name: 骑士女主角
description: At least one heroine of these games is a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Knight]knight[/url].

name: 阴阳师女主角
description:
A Heroine of this game is an [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Onmyouji#Onmy.C5.8Dji]onmyouji[/url].

Onmyouji were specialists in magic and divination. Their court responsibilities ranged from tasks such as keeping track of the calendar, to mystical duties such as divination and protection of the capital from evil spirits. They could divine auspicious or harmful influences in the earth, and were instrumental in the moving of capitals. It is said that an onmyouji could also summon and control shikigami.

name: 女忍者主角
description: At least one heroine of these games is a Kunoichi, a female [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Ninja]ninja[/url].

name: 士兵女主角
description: At least one heroine of these games is (or was) a professional [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Soldier]soldier[/url].

name: 官员女主角
description:
At least one heroine of this game is an officer (a soldier in a position of authority) in a military force.

People taking temp roles in military does not belong to this tag. This is for professional officers.

name: 非人类女主角
description: At least one of the heroines might look [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Human]human[/url], but she is way more than that...

name: 主人公
description:
A VN's [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Protagonist]protagonist[/url] is the character that the player takes control of.

A combination of male and female protagonists is possible, e.g. multiple protagonists.

name: AI女主角
description: These games have at least one heroine that is an [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Artificial_intelligence]artificial intelligence[/url].

name: 机器人女主角
description:
This game has one or more [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Robot]robot[/url] heroines.

A robot is a mechanical or virtual intelligent agent that can perform tasks automatically or with guidance, typically by remote control. In practice, a robot is usually an electro-mechanical machine that is guided by computer and electronic programming. Robots can be autonomous, semi-autonomous or remotely controlled.

Contrast with [URL=http://vndb.org/g127]Cyborg Heroine[/URL], who has a (partially) artificial body that is controlled by a human brain.

name: 赛博女主角
description:
This visual novel has at least one heroine that is a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Cyborg]cyborg[/url] - that is, at least parts of her body is artificial.

Contrast with [url=http://vndb.org/g126]Robot Heroine[/url], in whose case the intelligence controlling the body is artificial as well.

name: 狐妖女主角
description: At least one of the heroines is a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Kitsune]kitsune[/url] - a fox that can take human shape.

name: 女神女主角
description: At least one of the heroines is a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Goddess]goddess[/url].

name: 吸血鬼女主角
description: A heroine in this game is a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Vampire]vampire[/url]. Bloodsucking is common, but not strictly required.

name: 有意识的武器女主角
description:
The heroine in question is actually a weapon. 
Commonly she is the human avatar of a holy sword, but other variants exist as well.

name: 原型是书的女主角
description:
(At least) one of the heroines is the humanoid avatar of a Book of Power.

Examples include Al Azif of Demonbane.

name: 男性主人公
description: These games have a male protagonist.

name: 女性主人公
description: These games have a female protagonist.

name: 有配音的主人公
description: These games have a voiced protagonists. Use this tag if the protagonist is voiced almost all the time.

name: 可选择多主人公
description:
These games have multiple protagonists, you might select one at the beginning or switch between them during play.

Switching to an another characters point of vision for brief amounts of time does not make that character the protagonist (aka the lead character of the game), please keep that in mind.

name: 成人主人公
description:
The protagonist of this game is an [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Adult]adult[/url].

'Adult' is a broadly subjective concept, but in visual novel settings should usually mean any person who is of age and has finished the high school. In fantasy/sci-fi settings where high school is not mandatory or doesn't exist, having an occupation or being of age where having an occupation is expected can be used as an indication of 'adulthood'.

name: 法师女主角
alias:
Battlemage Heroine
Magician Heroine
Magus Heroine
Sorcerer Heroine
Sorceress Heroine
Spellcaster Heroine
Wizardress Heroine
description:
These games have at least one heroine who is a mage.

Mages are people who use or practice magic derived from supernatural or occult sources.

name: 主人公有武力
alias:
Fighting capable Protagonist
Protagonist that can fight
Warrior Protagonist
description:
The protagonist of these games is a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Warrior]warrior[/url]. He may be a professional soldier, a self-trained martial artist, a cleric with a powerful charms and a sword or maybe a fantasy being. But he can definitely handle himself in a fight.

A game doesn't need to have scenes of the protagonist actually fighting to have this tag. This is more about the characters demeanor than the action scenes.

name: 未来
description: The game is set in a time beyond that of our own. Games may incorperate elements of future technologies or events yet-to-come.

name: 过去
description: The game is set in a time before our own. Games may or may not adhere to historic fact.

name: 生活片段喜剧
description: This tag is for slice of life stories used to help frame a comedic setting.

name: 现代
description:
The game is set in the current day.

"Modern Day" is a subjective concept tying the release day of the visual novel to the time period of its setting. For the tag to apply, the visual novel must be set in an approximate time period relating to its creation.

This means that the period of "Modern Day" has started in the early 80's when the first precursors to the visual novel genre have been created and is constantly advancing forward.

name: 策略卡牌战斗游戏
description: These games have strategic card battles.

name: 无分支/选项无影响
description:
A game with a linear plot has a static main storyline; it is not possible to get into traditional, substantially different routes.

Many games in this category do not prompt the player with choices and simply tell the story as it is. This is, however, not a rule: it is also possible for a game to provide choices, but they have no lasting influence on the story itself. (e.g. Utawarerumono)

name: 单结局
description: These games have only a single ending.

name: 多分支结局
description: These games have several different endings.

name: 强制游玩顺序
alias:
Enforced Ending Order
Enforced Route Order
description:
These games have an enforced ending/route order. 

You first have to get a specific ending or play a specific route to be able to access an another ending/route you want.

These conditions are absolute and there is no other way around them.

name: 家庭生活喜剧
description: The comedy in this visual novel focuses around family life: the relationship between family members, the hijinks of living together, etc.

name: 校园生活喜剧
description: This story is a comedy based on the lives of students. It can either be set on a school or somewhere else these students go to, such as a vacation.

name: 失忆症
description: A character in this game is suffering form [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Amnesia]amnesia[/url]. Or memory loss plays an important part in the games story in some other way.

name: 谋杀谜题
description: This story has elements of [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Murder_mystery]crime fiction[/url], mainly on the murder mystery front.

name: 萝莉女主角
description:
At least one of the heroines is a loli. She's either an underage girl or has the looks of one.

Her age matters not one bit when it comes to her classification as a loli. This is only about appearance.

Refer to the related [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Lolicon]Wikipedia[/url] article for details.

name: 竞速比赛
description: These games involve [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Racing]racing[/url], whether on foot, with a vehicle, swimming or something completely different.

name: 萝莉控
description:
This game features sexual scenes with loli characters and related lolicon themes.

In Japan, [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Lolicon]lolicon[/url] describes an attraction to underage girls (whether prepubescent, pubescent, or post-pubescent).

Note: Do NOT use this tag for lolicon characters, use the relevant character tags for that purpose.

name: 暴力
description:
This game features some kind of [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Violence]violence[/url].

Violence is defined by the World Health Organization as the intentional use of physical force or power, threatened or actual, against oneself, another person, or against a group or community, that either results in or has a high likelihood of resulting in injury, death, psychological harm, maldevelopment or deprivation. This definition associates intentionality with the committing of the act itself, irrespective of the outcome it produces.

name: 明确的暴力图像
description:
This game features some [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Graphic_violence]graphic violence[/url].

Graphic violence is the depiction of especially vivid, brutal and realistic acts of violence in visual media such as literature, film, television, and video games. It may be real, simulated live action, or animated.

The "graphic" in graphic violence is a synonym for "explicit", referring to the clear and unabashed nature of the violence portrayed; this is what differentiates true graphic violence from lesser forms of violence in media productions, including "cartoon" violence and "fantasy" violence.

name: 暴力文本描述
description:
This game features some scenes with descriptions of [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Violence]violence[/url].

The violence in these said scenes are not presented visually, but only as text, hence the difference of this tag from the [url=http://vndb.org/g158]Graphic Violence[/url]. This presentation may be preferable by those who do not like seeing vivid images of violent nature.

name: 流血场景
description: This game features bloody scenes. The violent act or accident resulted in the spilling of blood is not required to be shown or described before, but considerable amount of blood showing on screen is.

name: 血腥暴力
description: This game has scenes of excessive violence and shows lots of blood as a result of this violence.

name: 色情怪诞（Guro）
description:
This game has scenes of excessive violence and worse during the acts of sex.

Guro is short for 'Erotic Grotesque'. It is a sub-genre of hentai featuring blood, gore, disfiguration, torture, and bloody amputees. Extreme examples of Guro include necrophilia, amputation during sex, and violent skull-fucking.

name: 欺凌
description:
The story of this visual novel involves [url=https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Bullying]bullying[/url].

Bullying is the use of force, coercion, hurtful teasing, comments, or threats, in order to abuse, aggressively dominate, or intimidate one or more others. The behaviour can be habitual and involve an imbalance of social or physical power.

Bullying is divided into four basic types of abuse: psychological, verbal, physical, and cyber, though an encounter can fall into more than one of these categories.

name: 虐待儿童
description:
This game has dramatic events related to [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Child_Abuse]child abuse[/url].

Child abuse is the physical, sexual, emotional mistreatment, or neglect of a child.

name: 药物使用
alias:
Drug abuse
Drug addiction
Recreational drug use
description:
This story has elements of drug use.

Don't use it on visual novels in which a character or characters is/are taking medically prescribed drugs.

name: 战国时期
alias:
Set in the Sengoku Jidai
Warring States Period of Japan
description: This visual novel is set in (or at least based upon) the [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Sengoku_period]Warring States Period of Japan[/url].

name: 角色身体健康问题
description: Problems regarding the [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Health]health[/url] of its characters play an important role in this story.

name: 生死剧
description: A game that spends considerable amount of its time on discussing the preciousness of life, or has its characters constantly worrying about their or their loved ones survival, or a game that has a lot of people dying and this situation's effecting the psychologies of characters can have this tag.

name: 感情危机
description: This tag is for games that has people in a relationship and having problems keeping that together.

name: 自杀
description:
This story features the theme of [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Suicide]suicide[/url].

Suicide is the act of intentionally causing one's own death. Suicide is often committed out of despair, the cause of which can attributed to a mental disorder such as depression, bipolar disorder, schizophrenia, autism spectrum disorders, alcoholism, or drug abuse. Stress factors such as financial difficulties or troubles with interpersonal relationships often play a significant role.

name: 父亲配角
description: This game has a father or a father-type-character as a support character, that that acts fatherly, giving advices and such, adding a family aspect to the game.

name: 母亲型配角
description: This game has a mother or a mother-type support character, acting motherly and all, to add a family aspect to the game.

name: 哥哥配角
description: This game has a brother or a brother-like-character as a support character.

name: 导师配角
description:
In this game there is a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Mentor]mentor[/url] support character that teaches the protagonist (or a heroine in rare cases) for the most of the story.

It can be a teacher or a teacher-like-character, always giving advices to the protagonist and being annoying. 
Or it has an awesome mentor that trained the main character to be kickass.
Or it has that old town elder that shows up everywhere helping the protagonist out...

name: 笨蛋朋友
description: One of the supporting characters is a moron. Usually this happens to be the best friend of the protagonist or at least as a close friend.

name: 教师女主角
description: At least one of the heroines is a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Teacher]teacher[/url].

name: 触手强奸
description: This visual novel features rape involving [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Tentacle]tentacles[/url].

name: 群交
description: This game includes [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Group_sex]group sex[/url] scenes.

name: 游戏早期出现分支剧情
description:
This games story branches out at early in the game. 

This means you will get a choice that will carry the story to some branches that are quite different than the rest early in the game.

name: 唯一真结局
description:
Even though this game has multiple endings, one of them is considered to be the true ending to the story.

Sometimes this is evident from that ending being several times longer then others, sometimes it is the ending the sequel continues from and sometimes this is later disclosed by the creators.

name: 游戏后期出现分支剧情
description:
This games story branches out at the late parts of the game.

This means for the most part of the game you'll be reading the same story, whichever route you aim for in the end. You'll get some scenes based on the heroine you aim for but %90 of the story will stay same until you reach the branching point. So treasure your first playthrough and pick the heroine you like best for it, because it won't be as unique the next time.

name: 兽交
description:
This game involves sex with animals. 

For details please check the relevant Wikipedia article: http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Zoophilia

Note: Please only use this tag in case of real animals, for fantastic creatures use [url=http://vndb.org/g988]Sex with Monsters[/url] and its child tags.

name: 正太
description: These eroge have at least one scene with a character that could be described as a shota.

name: 幽灵女主角
description: A heroine in this game is a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Ghost]ghost[/url].

name: 大小姐女主角
alias:
Aristocratic Heroine
Noble Heroine
Ojou-sama Heroine
Rich Heroine
Upper Class Heroine
Wealthy Heroine
description:
One or more of the heroines in this game belong to the [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Upper_class]upper class[/url].

The upper class is the social class composed of the wealthiest members of society, who also wield the greatest political power. The upper class is generally contained within the wealthiest 1-2% of the population, and is distinguished by immense wealth (in the form of estates) which is passed from generation to generation.

This tag is about the social status of a heroine and does not refer to her behavior*.

*Having grown up accustomed to wealth and privilege, they have a tendency to flaunt their family wealth and status. As they are used to being waited upon by servants, they are more likely than not to order others not of the same social status as them around, even unintentionally.

name: 男装女主人公
alias:
Cross-dressing Heroine
Girl Cross-dressing as a Boy
description:
At least one of the heroes of this visual novel is a girl whose physical features make her look like a boy to the point that she could be mistaken for one.
[url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Cross_dressing]Cross-dressing[/url] is not required while often being the source of the confusion.

name: 宅系女主角
description: One of the heroines is an anime (cosplaying/manga/video games) Otaku. Meaning that she is obsessed with this hobby of hers, to a harmless degree though.

name: 偶像女主角
description: One of the heroines is an [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Japanese_idol]idol[/url].

name: 笨蛋系女主角
alias:
Ditz Heroine
Idiot Heroine
Stupid Heroine
description:
One of the heroines is an airhead.

Airheads lack common sense, but have a happy and friendly attitude.

name: 眼镜娘女主角
description: One or more of the heroines wear [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Glasses]glasses[/url].

name: 病娇女主角
description:
One or more of the heroines in this game displays [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Yandere#Y]yandere[/url] behavior.

Yandere is a Japanese term for a person who is initially very loving and gentle to someone before their devotion becomes destructive in nature, often through violence.

name: 现代傲娇女主角
description:
One or more of the heroine is a modern tsundere.

She has one side that is utterly deredere (lovestruck) towards the protagonist (and possibly everyone else).

She has another one that is extremely hostile towards the protagonist (and/or everyone else) and which often will use extreme violence towards him.

She's switch between those two frequently. Expect 2-3 switches within one minute at worst.

Contrast with Classic Tsundere, Coodere and Yandere.

name: 古典傲娇
description:
One or more of the heroine is a classic Tsundere (as they were defined before the anime "mainstream" assimilated it).

Starts tsuntsun (cranky, violent and possibly violent) towards the protagonist (and possibly everyone else), due to some reason or another, and over the course of the game falls in love with him/turns deredere (lovestruck) .

While tsuntsun and deredere might conflict, this phase will be over after a short while and progress into straight deredere.

Compare with Coodere. Do not confuse with Modern Tsundere.

name: 娇羞女主角
description:
One of the heroines is deredere - she is utterly lovestruck with the protagonist essentially from the moment she meets him.

Expect lots of blushing at even the most innocent remarks.

name: 体弱女主角
description: One of the heroines of this game has a sickness that takes an important role in the story.

name: 学生会
alias:
Guild of Students
Student Council
Student Government
Students' Union
description:
The [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Student_government]student government[/url] plays an important part in this story.

A student government is a student organization present in many colleges, universities and has started to appear in some high schools. In higher education, the student union is often accorded its own building on the campus, dedicated to social and organizational activities of the student body.

name: 宅男/女主人公
description: The protagonist is an anime/manga/video game otaku.

name: 体育
description: Sports are an important element of these games.

name: 利爪战斗
description: Vampires, werewolves or humans shapechanging their hands to claws to fight

name: 主人公的幼驯染女主角
description: One or more of the heroines is a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Childhood_friend]childhood friend[/url] of the protagonist. (Forgotten) marriage promise optional but common.

name: 虚构物种
alias:
Fantastic Beings
Fantastic Creatures
Fictional Creatures
description: This visual novel contains creatures and/or beings not found in the real world.

name: 主人公可命名
alias:
Nameable Lead Character
Protagonist with a Changeable Name
description:
You can set the name of the protagonist of this game.

There may or may not be additional voice acting if you use the default name.

name: 狼人
description:
One or more characters of this game are [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Werewolf]werewolves[/url].

A werewolf, also known as a lycanthrope, is a mythological or folkloric human with the ability to shapeshift into an anthropomorphic wolf-like creature, either purposely, by being bitten by another werewolf, or after being placed under a curse.

name: 木乃伊
description:
In fiction mummies are undead creatures whose corpses has been mummified and animated.

For more information on real life mummies and the process of mummification, read the related [url=https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Mummy]Wikipedia[/url] article.

name: 魔像
description: This game includes [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Golem]golems[/url].

name: 强奸未遂
description:
This game has one or more scenes of attempts of rape.

Which either fails by story default, or by choosing the right option.

This tag is intended to mark games that you can avoid rape beyond the attempt.

name: 不知怎的就开干
alias:
Poor Excuses for Sex
Random Sex Scenes
description: Some or all of the sex scenes in this game are just there with little connection to the story. They happen spontaneously with weakest excuses you can ever imagine.

name: 怪物猎人女主角
description: At least one of the heroines is a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Monster]monster[/url] hunter.

name: 吸血鬼猎人女主角
description: At least one of the heroines is a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Vampire]vampire[/url] hunter.

name: 恶魔女主角
description: At least one heroine is a (western type) [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Demon]demon[/url].

name: 半恶魔女主角
description: At least one heroine in the game is the child of a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Demon]demon[/url] and a human or something similar.

name: 带有恶魔血统的女主角
description: This type of heroine starts as a regular human but later on gets demon blood mixed with her own, ultimately granting her superhuman qualities and powers.

name: 拔作
description: This visual novel is focused on the erotic content, the storyline and characterization (if any) play a secondary role, and only provide setting for the sex-scenes. Plot serves the sex-scenes, not the other way round.

name: 家庭
description: A family environment plays an important role in this story. It can be protagonist's own family or one of the heroine's. Expect lots of talks over dinning tables and parents giving advices. One alternative can also be characters talking about the importance of a warm family environment all the time in the absence of parent figures.

name: 犯罪家族
description: A [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Crime_family]Crime Family[/url] plays an important part in the story.

name: 日本黑帮
description: This story has members or themes from traditional [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Yakuza]yakuza[/url].

name: 传统家庭
description: This game has a big traditionalist family with some elders pressuring the protag or heroines to do things for the good of the family.

name: 性奴
description:
Sexual slavery is a process wherein someone 'forces' by varied means someone else to engage into sexual activity of some sort.

The mentioned 'force' could be outright force/coercion or be part of an agreement between a dominant and a submissive.
The means are varied and numerous, some not exhaustive means are blackmailing, hypnotism, mind breaking and sexual violence or some form of consensual slave contract.

There are two distinct forms of sexual slavery:
1. A [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Sexual_slavery]non-consensual one[/url], an act of performing non-voluntary sexual activity due to coercion.
2. A [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Sexual_slavery_%28BDSM%29]consensual one[/url], usually in some form of a dominant person owning a submissive person as property.

In the environment of visual novels, mainly nukige there has to be postulated a third form of sexual slavery:
3. A semi-(non-)consensual one, wherein the 'submissive' has first to be persuaded by the dominant person by means usually regarded as a criminal act in real life. The Japanese subculture has defined the word 調教 [choukyou] for this, which literally means ‘to teach an animal to do something or to behave correctly’.

Note: Please use the child tags of this tag when applicable.

name: 捆绑
description: This game features scenes of [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Bondage_%28sexual%29]sexual bondage[/url].

name: 现代日本
description:
These games take place in Modern Day [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Japan]Japan[/url].
Note: "Modern day" refers to an unspecified time period between the late 20th century and today.

name: 虚构的现代日本城镇
alias:
Fictional Contemporary Japanese City
Fictional Contemporary Japanese Town
Fictional Modern Day Japanese City
description:
This visual novel is set in a fictional town within contemporary Japan.
Note: "Modern day" refers to an unspecified time period between the late 20th century and today.

name: 宗教组织
description: A [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Religious_organization]religious organization[/url] plays an important role in this story.

name: 基督教堂
description:
The games story has the [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Christian_Church]Christian Church[/url] taking an active role in it.

Or a similar imaginary organization/subdivision of the Christian Church is used as a part of the story.

name: 魔法师协会
description: Game has an organization of magic users, however they are called in the game; sorcerers, wizards, magus, magi... Most of the time in modern settings these associations are hidden out of sight, but its not a requirement for this tag.

name: 主人公的姐姐或妹妹为女主角
description: One of this games heroines is protagonist's [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Sister]sister[/url]. Younger, older or twin doesn't really matter.

name: 主人公的实姐实妹作为女主角
description: One of this game's heroines is protagonist's blood related [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Sister]sister[/url].

name: 贫乳女主角(非萝莉)
description:
One or more heroines of this VN have flat or small breasts.

This tag is separate from the [url=/g154]Loli Heroine[/url] tag, please do not mix the two.

name: 主人公有非血缘姐姐妹妹
alias:
Adopted Sister Heroine
Foster Sister Heroine
Stepsister Heroine
Step Sister Heroine
description:
At least one heroine in this visual novel is the protagonist's sister, but they are not biologically related to one another.

This heroine could be the protagonist's [URL=https://vndb.org/i295]stepsister[/URL], [URL=https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Adoption]adopted sister[/URL] or [URL=https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Foster_care]foster sister[/URL].

name: 爱尔兰神话
description: [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Irish_mythology]Irish mythology[/url] strongly influences the setting and events in this VN.

name: 美索不达米亚神话
description: [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Mesopotamian_mythology]Mesopotamian mythology[/url] strongly influences the setting and events in this VN.

name: 无色情内容
alias:
No Erotic Content
Not an Eroge
description: This game has no sexual and real erotic content at all. It may have some small fan services here and there but those would be at a level you would normally see on an anime on TV.

name: 少量色情内容
description: This is the exact opposite of Nukige. These games have only a couple of hentai scenes per route just for the novelties sake. They are all about (relatively) great stories and should be avoided by people who are looking for an erotic experience.

name: 秘密身份
description: This game has one or more characters with [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Secret_identity]secret identities[/url].

name: 配角
description: These are all the non-heroine and non-protag characters a game has.

name: 人造人女主角
description:
One or more of the heroines in this story are [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Homunculus]homunculus[/url].

A homunculus is an artificial human, given life by magic and/or science.

name: 激光和束能武器战斗
description:
This visual novel features combat in which the participant characters/mechas/spaceships/etc. shoot lasers and beams at each other.

If these beams are clearly magical, please use [url=http://vndb.org/g80]Magic/ESP Combat[/url] instead.

name: 激光和束能火器战斗
alias:
Beam Gun
Combat with Laser and Beam Weapons
Laser Weapon
Raygun
Ray Gun
Zap Gun
description: This visual novel features [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Raygun]firearms shooting beams and/or lasers[/url] instead of traditional projectiles.

name: 刺客女主角
alias:
Hitman Heroine
Killer-for-hire Heroine
Trained Killer Heroine
description: A heroine of this game is (or was) an [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Assassin]assassin[/url].

name: 未来日本
description: This story is set in an imaginary future [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Japan]Japan[/url].

name: 虚构的未来日本附近的岛屿
description: The story is set on a fictional island near the coast of futuristic Japan.

name: 仅简短的分支路线
description: The game is mostly linear, but has a few branches depending on your choices, which are mostly short and don't affect the actual ending at all.

name: 残疾女主角
description:
One or more of the heroines has a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Disability]disability[/url]. For example, she might be blind, deaf, mute or crippled.

Use this tag for physical disabilities, and apply [url=/g497]Heroine with Psychological Problems[/url] for mental disabilities, instead.

name: 哑巴女主角
description: A heroine in this story suffers from [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Muteness]muteness[/url].

name: 时间旅行
description:
This visual novel features [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Time_travel]time travel[/url].

Time travel is the concept of moving between different points in time in a manner analogous to moving between different points in space.

name: 平行宇宙
description: This tag is for games that dwell the concepts like the existence of a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Parallel_universe_%28fiction%29]parallel universe[/url].

name: 同性恋配角
description: One of the supporting characters is a homosexual. And this takes some role in the story.

name: 主人公的姐妹作为配角
alias:
Non-romancable Protagonist's Sister as a Side Character
Non-romancable Sister of the Protagonist as a Side Character
Sister of the Protagonist as a Side Character
description: This game has the protagonist's sister as a support character. She is not the target of any romance from the protagonist unlike the similar heroine entry.

name: 心理健康问题
description: Problems regarding the mental [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Health]health[/url] of its characters play an important role in this story.

name: 白日梦
description: Used for games where [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Daydream]daydreams[/url] are an integral part of the story. Do not use this tag for just any game that has daydreams inside it.

name: 身体健康问题
description: Problems regarding the physical [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Health]health[/url] of its characters play an important role in this story.

name: 成瘾女主角
description: The visual novel has at least one heroine who has some sort of [url=https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Addiction]addiction[/url].

name: 胆小女主角
description: This type of heroine is weak (physically and/or mentally). She gets pushed around and bullied easily, at least for most of the game.

name: 害羞的女主角
description: This type of heroine is shy, in most cases too shy to talk to anyone at all until the protagonist works his magic.

name: 架空世界
description: The game takes place on another world. The game's environment could be similar to that of our own with a few significant changes, but it could also be radically different.

name: 魔法少女女主角
description: One or more of the heroines is a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Magical_girl]magical girl[/url].

name: 反向强奸
alias:
Female on Male Rape
Rape of Male by Female
description: This game has one or more scenes where a female forces herself sexually on an unwilling male.

name: 士兵主人公
description: The protagonist of the game is (or was) a professional [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Soldier]soldier[/url].

name: 领导者主人公
description: This type of protagonist is a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Leader]leader[/url]. This protagonist has employees/subjects/soldiers to command. Games story may or may not include actually commanding them.

name: 皇帝主人公
description: The protagonist of this visual novel is an [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Emperor]emperor[/url] or empress.

name: 盲人女主角
description: One or more of the heroines is blind, that is, she is unable to see.

name: 天使女主角
description: One or more heroines of this game are [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Angel]angels[/url].

name: 女儿配角
description: One of the stories characters is the daughter of the protagonist. This tag is for pure fatherly relations, no ill intentions included.

name: 单女主角
description: This game has only a single heroine to interact with, that's all the story is about.

name: 将死女主角
alias:
Terminally Ill Heroine
Terminal Patient Heroine
description: One of the heroines on this game has a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Terminal_illness]terminal illness[/url]. Either from the start of the game or for the most part in general. If she survives the game or not is up to the game but her sickness is an important factor for her as a character.

name: 医院
description: This visual novel has a lot of scenes set in a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Hospital]hospital[/url].

name: 棒球
description:
[url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Baseball]Baseball[/url] plays a part in this game's story.

Baseball is a bat-and-ball sport played between two teams of nine players each. The aim is to score runs by hitting a thrown ball with a bat and touching a series of four bases arranged at the corners of a ninety-foot diamond. Players on the batting team take turns hitting against the pitcher of the fielding team, which tries to stop them from scoring runs by getting hitters out in any of several ways. A player on the batting team can stop at any of the bases and later advance via a teammate's hit or other means. The teams switch between batting and fielding whenever the fielding team records three outs. One turn at bat for each team constitutes an inning and nine innings make up a professional game. The team with the most runs at the end of the game wins.

name: 反应小游戏
description: This game includes some mini-games that require player to act fast and show some skill, even at small amounts, to win.

name: 体弱多病的主人公
description: Protagonist of this game has a sickness that takes an important role in the story.

name: 地牢探险游戏（迷宫）
description: This game has some amounts of RPG sections that are basically exploring maze-like dungeons and fighting enemies encountered.

name: 主人公的竞争对手作为女主角
description:
This game has one or more heroines that have a rivalry going on with the protagonist. These heroines get many of their scenes in events related to such rivalries.

This should not be confused with [url=/g1250]Protagonist's Opponent as a Heroine[/url] tag, since Rivalry refers to long lasting engagement in competitive relationship, while opponents can be people that you only meet once.

The rivalry need not be mutual for the tag to apply.

name: 间谍女主角
description: A heroine in this game is a secret agent or a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Spy]spy[/url]. Working for a government or a private group, she has many skills and many secrets.

name: 动物
description: Some games have strong ties to [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Animals]animals[/url] in their story. These tags are for those games.

name: 猫
description: This game has one or multiple [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Cats]cats[/url] taking an important role in the story. Or it has cats all around on many scenes with multiple lines of dialogs related to them.

name: 狗
description: This game has one or multiple [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Dogs]dogs[/url] taking an important role in the story. Or it has dogs all around on many scenes with multiple lines of dialogs related to them.

name: 将死的主人公
alias:
Terminally Ill Protagonist
Terminal Patient Protagonist
description: Protagonist of this game has a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Terminal_illness]terminal illness[/url]. Either from the start of the game or for the most part in general.

name: 疾病
description: An illness has a major role in this story. Game spends much time discussing about it.

name: 绝症
description: Someone is dying from a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Terminal_illness]terminal illness[/url] in this game.

name: 交通工具
description: This game has some vehicles playing an important role in it's story. It can be passing on a boat, or maybe it has a protag that can't stop talking about his car...

name: 汽车
description: This game has a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Car]car[/url] that's crucial to the story. Maybe its a road trip game, or maybe its a racing game with tons of cars and a lot of details about them.

name: 类型
description: If this game is a type of story that you can't name using any of the existing tags you can use these.

name: 公路旅行
description:
[url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Road_trip]Wikipedia[/url] description of the term: A road trip is a journey via automobile, sometimes unplanned or impromptu, or a journey involving sporting game(s) away from home, thus encompassing any journey by automobile, regardless of stops en route.

This game is a road trip story, or at least it has one that makes a considerable part of the game.

name: 永生的女主角
description: One of the heroines is [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Immortality]immortal[/url], doesn't age or can't be killed through normal means.

name: 疯狂
description: One or more characters in this game are either [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Insanity]insane[/url] or showing early symptoms of starting to get mad.

name: 治疗者女主角
description:
One or more heroines of this game is a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Healer]healer[/url] - whether she is a cleric using magic, adept at using herbs or a real doctor.

Usually has a mild personality (to the point of being motherly), a staple of RPGs.

name: 多重人格的女主角
description:
One or or more of the heroines has multiple personalities - this might have psychological causes, or be a real second personality.

While modern Tsundere appear to be this at times, they don't qualify.

name: 里人格更强大的女主角
description: One or more heroines has a second personality that is much more powerful than their normal one.

name: 短暂的女性主人公
description:
This game lets you play with a female protagonist for a short time.

Keep in mind that this short time still should be significantly long enough to make a mention of it.

For example; if a hundred hour game lets you play as a female protagonist for only five minutes, do not use this tag for that game.

Also do not use this for games that lets you see from the heroines' perspective for only a brief time like G-sen and Crescendo (use [url=/g633]Other Perspectives[/url] instead), think more of actually playing as one like F/SN.

name: 炼金术
description: The game features [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Alchemy]alchemy[/url], either as a science that manipulates matter, or as a magical term.

name: 公主女主角
description:
At least one of the heroines in this VN is a western-style [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Princess]princess[/url]. Usually that means the daughter or a close relative of a ruling monarch.

Regarding her appearance she might wear gowns (though she might wear armor for combat, or a school uniform to fit in), and have a crown.

She does not need to be from the West as long as she fits the image (many fantasy princesses will be this instead of the Hime archetype).

name: 公主女主角（东方风格）
description:
At least one of the heroines is an Eastern-style princess and is the daughter of a regional lord or the king - being called [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Hime]hime[/url] by other characters is NOT enough to qualify a heroine for this tag.

Examples include Sayo-hime of Amatsukaze and Hitoha of Ouzoku.

name: 忍者主人公
description: The protagonist of this game is a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Ninja]ninja[/url].

name: 地图移动
description:
The player can select where to go on a map, be it a world map or a campus map.

Some visual examples of map movement: [url=https://s.vndb.org/sf/87/108887.jpg]1[/url], [url=https://s.vndb.org/sf/90/39090.jpg]2[/url], [url=https://s.vndb.org/sf/55/33655.jpg]3[/url], [url=https://s.vndb.org/sf/51/32951.jpg]4[/url], [url=https://s.vndb.org/sf/99/31299.jpg]5[/url].

name: 护士配角
description: One of the support characters in the game is a nurse.

name: 学校护士配角
description: One of the support characters in the game is a school nurse.

name: 后期色情内容
description: The sexual content in this game appears at the very end of the game (or at least on the last couple of hours of a thirty hour game for example)

name: 中世纪欧洲
description: This game has scenes that are set in the [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Middle_Ages]Middle Ages Europe[/url].

name: 政治
description:
This game has scenes of detailed political discussions.

Check the related [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Politics]Wikipedia[/url] entry for details.

name: 大量色情内容
description: This visual novel has significant amount of sex scenes: about half or more of the playtime is spent on explicit sexual content.

name: 场景
description: These tags are for the main locations of the game, please do not tag every location that you see the game take place, but instead only the ones that take at least one third of the game or so.

name: 宫殿
description: This visual novel has many scenes set in a royal [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Palace]palace[/url].

name: 亚洲风格宫殿
description: The game has many scenes set in an Asian-style palace

name: 住所里
description: Game has many scenes set in a living space used as a permanent or semi-permanent residence for an individual, family, household or several families.

name: 西方风格庄园
description: Game has many scenes set in a western-style mansion.

name: 亚洲风格庄园
description: Game has many scenes set in an Asian-style manor.

name: 城堡
description: Game has many scenes set in a castle.

name: 西方风格城堡
description: Game has many scenes set in a western-style castle.

name: 亚洲风格城堡
description: Game has many scenes set in a Asian-style castle.

name: 军事基地
description: Game has many scenes set on a military base.

name: 游乐园
description: This visual novel has many scenes set in an [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Amusement_park]amusement park[/url] or a theme park.

name: 宗教场所
description: Game has many scenes set in a religious location.

name: 寺庙
description:
This visual novel has many scenes set in a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Temple]temple[/url].

For Christian temples, please use the [url=http://vndb.org/g318]Church[/url] tag.

name: 教堂
description: This visual novel has a considerable amount of scenes set in a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Church_%28building%29]church[/url].

name: 神社
description: This visual novel has many scenes set in a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Shinto_shrine]Shinto shrine[/url].

name: 多重人格的主人公
description:
The protagonist suffers from [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Split_Personality]split personality[/url].

Dissociative identity disorder is a psychiatric diagnosis that describes a condition in which a person displays multiple distinct identities or personalities (known as alter egos or alters), each with its own pattern of perceiving and interacting with the environment.

name: 阴谋诡计
description: This game has conspiracies, secret plots and all kinds of under the rugs deals going on.

name: 犯罪情节
description:
This is a crime story. Or at least have some law and order, crime life etc. themes taking an important role in it.

Do not use it for games that include one or more criminal acts in them somewhere. The game has to be about a specific crime, like a story about a bank robbery, or the lives of people in the crime world.

name: 侦探工作
description: This game features its one or more characters working like [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Detective]detectives[/url], gathering clues and investigating some mysteries in a serious professional/semi-professional way.

name: 制造悬念
description: This game has many secrets and mysteries. As the story progresses the tension builds up to an exciting climax. Or at least that's the intention.

name: 智斗
description:
This game features scenes where at least two people or two groups use their intelligence and ability to think quickly to try to defeat each other.

This can be indicated by the opposing sides trying to outwit each other by engaging in many schemes and tricks, and/or cornering them in a long battle of arguments.

name: 天才主人公
description: Protagonist of this game is a genius.

name: 类似过去的虚构世界
alias: Past Setting in a Fantasy World
description: This game is set in an imaginary world whose timeframe resembles the past of our world.

name: 虚构世界中的现代设定
alias: Modern Day Setting in a Fantasy World
description: This game is set in an imaginary world whose timeframe resembles our modern world.

name: 虚构世界中的未来设定
alias: Future Setting in a Fantasy World
description: This game is set in an imaginary world whose timeframe resembles a futuristic version of our world.

name: 游戏要素
description: These tags are for specific gameplay elements a game has. They are not to define the type of the game.

name: 猫猫女主角
description: One or more of the heroines is a cat-girl.

name: 战斗公主女主角
description:
At least one of the heroines is a western-style princess, but unlike the vanilla version this one leads her battles from the frontlines.
Usually wears plate armor or chainmail wields a sword. Strong sense of justice common, but not strictly necessary.

name: 召唤
description:
One or more of the game's characters have the ability to magically (or with a sci-fi explanation) summon people or creatures to fight for them or do their bidding.

Non-serious example includes Pokemon.
Serious examples include the Childs of Mai-HiME and the Shinjuu of Seinarukana.

name: 有战斗能力的朋友
alias:
Fighting Best Friend
Friends That Can Fight
description:
In this game friends of the protagonist are capable of handling themselves in fight.

For example we can say that the best friend of the protagonist fights as well - usually to protect the protagonist's back, but he might also turn into his Nemesis.

name: 跨次元组织
description: An Interdimensional Organization, devoted to the protection of certain ideals and/or orders, plays an important role in the game

name: 三角恋
description:
This game has a story element in which two characters compete or show rivalry with each other in order to gain the love of one person, usually the protagonist. It does not matter if the character ends up dating one person, dating both of their love interests, or even not at all.

If the game focuses on drama or comedy aspect of the love triangle, please use the appropriate child tag, but if the game has a mix of both, then please use this tag.

name: 戏剧性的三角恋
description: There is a love triangle in the game, and it is a source of conflict and pain for the characters.

name: 喜剧三角恋
description: There is a love triangle in the game, but this is played for laughs - it does not lead to suffering on part of the characters and heartbroken dramatic situations.

name: 战略角色扮演游戏（SRPG）
alias:
Strategic Roleplaying Game
Tactical Roleplaying Game
TRPG
description: These games have RPG gameplay mixed with strategy - usually these have less character customization options than other RPG's, and focus more on combat tactics.

name: 跨次元奥德赛
description: For a large part of the story, the protagonist (and his associates) travel from one dimension to another - whether they are trying to find a way home, or have some loftier ideal.

name: 邪恶路线
description:
This game has an extra evil route that is mostly about rape, murder and all kinds of things that most people would not want to see.

Good thing is, its all concentrated in a route so you can totally avoid it.

Use this tag for the games where one or more routes are different from the rest and are filled with darker content.

name: 双胞胎妹妹配角
description: This game features a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Twins]twin[/url] sister as a support cast member.

name: 双胞胎女主角
alias:
Heroine Twin Sisters
Twin Heroines
Twin Sister Heroines
description: This game has heroines that are [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Twins]twins[/url]. This tag can be used even if only one of those twins has a route.

name: 幽灵
description: A [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Ghost]ghost[/url] is the soul or spirit of a dead person or animal that can appear, in visible form or other manifestation, to the living.

name: 外星人
description: This visual novel features [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Extraterrestrial_life]extraterrestial life[/url].

name: 跛脚女主角
alias:
Amputee Heroine
Heroine with Missing Limbs
Heroine with no Arms
Heroine with no Legs
description: A heroine who has severely impaired physical abilities because of deformation, injury, or amputation of parts of the body.

name: 节奏游戏
description:
This game includes gameplay where button presses or mouse clicks are to be matched to music.

Check related [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Rhythm_game]Wikipedia[/url] article for details.

name: 时间循环
description: The story involves a time loop, a period of time (a day, a week, etc) that repeats itself over and over.

name: 交互式AVG
description:
Games where you interact with the world, either through text input , point-and-click or "look/examine/talk to"-style interfaces.

Interaction via the usual selection of dialog options does not fall under this tags field.

name: 无意义的故事
description:
Games where the story often doesn't even pretend to make sense. Not to be confused with a merely convoluted or confused plot, this refers to cases where the very idea of plot is completely discarded.

Check the Wikipedia entry for [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Literary_nonsense]Literary nonsense[/url] for details.

name: 存在危机
description: The protagonist is forced to deal with major uncertainties about the nature of reality or the accuracy of their perceptions.

name: 日本妖怪
description:
This game features [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Y%C5%8Dkai]Youkai[/url].

Youkai range eclectically from the malevolent to the mischievous, or occasionally bring good fortune to those who encounter them. Often they possess animal features (such as the Kappa, which is similar to a turtle, or the Tengu which has wings), other times they can appear mostly human, some look like inanimate objects and others have no discernible shape. Youkai usually have a spiritual supernatural power, with shapeshifting being one of the most common. Youkai that have the ability to shapeshift are called obake.

name: 反派主人公
description:
Protagonist of this game is [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Villainous]villainous[/url], or simply is an "evil" character of the story.

Starting bad or going bad later, then becoming good again etc. doesn't matter as long as the villainous part takes an important role in the story.

name: 简短文字为主的场景
description: This game is actually an ADV but sometimes its narration switches to the NVL side. These scenes are often enough to take a notice but still they don't make one third of the game.

name: 恶搞
description: A parody is a work that mimics the style of another work, artist, or genre in an exaggerated way, usually for comic effect. It uses the frame of the original work and adds comic elements by either exaggerating the flaws of the original work or trivializing it, or in some cases both. Parodies can take many forms, including fiction, poetry, film, visual art, and more.

name: 一男多女群交
description:
This visual novel contains group sex scenes, where multiple female partners have sex with a single male.
