For the purpose of the database, the tag uses the binary understanding of genders, and "Male" refers to a cis man, who was assigned male at birth and identifies as such. "Female" refers to a cis woman, who was assigned female at birth and identifies as such.

name: 一女多男群交
description:
This visual novel contains group sex scenes, where multiple male partners have sex with a single female.

For the purpose of the database, the tag uses the binary understanding of genders, and "Male" refers to a cis man, who was assigned male at birth and identifies as such. "Female" refers to a cis woman, who was assigned female at birth and identifies as such.

name: 性别转换
description: The protagonist or one of the other characters in this story changes sex by magical or [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Sex_reassignment_surgery]medical surgery[/url] means, or due to being involved in a weird science accident.

name: 其他要素
description: These tags are the elements of a story that doesn't fit under the other groups.

name: 奥德赛
alias:
Epic Quest
Grand Adventure
Legendary Journey
description: For a large part of the story, the protagonist (and his associates) travel from one place to another - whether they are trying to find a way home, or have some loftier ideal.

name: 间谍活动
description: The story of the game features [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Espionage]espionage[/url]. Espionage involves a government or individual obtaining information considered secret or confidential without the permission of the holder of the information.

name: 跛脚主人公
alias:
Amputee Protagonist
Protagonist with Missing Limbs
Protagonist with no Arms
Protagonist with no Legs
description: A protagonist who has severely impaired physical abilities because of deformation, injury, or amputation of parts of the body.

name: 音乐主题
description: The story of this game revolves around [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Music]music[/url].

name: 残疾主人公
description:
The protagonist has one or more disabilities - he might be blind, deaf, mute or missing an extremity.

Use this tag for physical disabilities, and apply [url=/g500]Protagonist with Psychological Problems[/url] for mental disabilities, instead.

name: 有健康问题的主人公
description:
For tags that can be used for a protagonist that's not in best of his health.

You can also use this tag itself if you believe this protagonist is not covered by any of it's sub-tags.

name: 作为游戏要素的麻将
alias:
Jan
Mah-jongg
Ma-jan
Majiang
Maque
麻将
麻雀
description:
[url=https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Mahjong]Mahjong[/url] is a game for four players that originated in China. In the game, each player is dealt either thirteen or sixteen tiles in a hand (depending on the variation being played). On their turn, players draw a tile and discard one, with the goal of making four or five melds (also depending on the variation) and one pair, or "head". Winning comes "on the draw", by drawing a new or discarded tile that completes the hand. Thus a winning hand actually contains fourteen (or seventeen) tiles.

Only use this if there is an actual mahjong minigame in the VN. If it is only used as a plot-element, please use [url=http://vndb.org/g1290]Mahjong as Story Element[/url].

name: 学生女主角
description: One or more of this games heroines is a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Student]student[/url].

name: 有健康问题的女主角
description:
For tags that can be used for a heroine that's not in best of her health.

You can also use this tag itself if you believe this heroine is not covered by any of it's sub-tags.

name: 女主角的角色/职业
description:
Heroine Archetypes defined by what they do (for a living) or what [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Role]roles[/url] they play in the society.

Also includes characters that stopped doing this job (role etc.) but still keeps acting like one.

name: 女主角的关系
description: These are the heroine Archetypes by their [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Kinship]relation[/url] to the protagonist.

name: 机甲
description: This game has robots and/or robotic suits that are directly operated by human pilots.

name: 色情内容呈现方式
description:
Tags listed under this meta tag defines how the sexual content in this game is implemented. 

It had so much sexual content that it was surprising? Or maybe it had only one scene per route....

name: 游戏前期出现色情内容
description: The sexual content in this game appears at the very beginning of the game (or at least on the first couple of hours of a thirty hour game for example).

name: 按参与者分类的性爱内容
description: These are the sexual content tags with their participants classifications or by their current state being their main feature.

name: 黑暗的色情内容
description: These are the sexual content tags that are not for everyone.

name: 精灵女主角
description:
One of the heroines is an [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Elves_in_fantasy_fiction_and_games]elf[/url].

In many works of modern fantasy, elves are depicted as a race of semi-divine humanoid beings who are friendly with nature and animals.

A hallmark of fantasy elves is also their long and pointed ears. The length and shape of these ears varies depending on the artist or medium in question. Elves tend to be immortal or longeval in comparison to humans, more beautiful and wiser, with sharper senses and perceptions, and abilities or crafts that seem alien or magical.

This tag does not refer to the tiny, little sprite kind of elf.

name: 女主角特征
description: Heroine-defining character traits.

name: 徒手格斗女主角
description:
One or more of the heroine fights unarmed and is capable of killing people with her bare hands.

Refer to the related [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Hand-to-hand_combat]Wikipedia[/url] article for details.

name: 卖淫
description: These games have scenes involving [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Prostitution]prostitution[/url].

name: 伪娘
alias:
Boy Cross-dressing as a Heroine
Cross-dressing Hero
Otokonoko Heroine
Otoko no Ko Heroine
男の娘 Heroine
description:
At least one of the heroines of this visual novel is a boy whose physical features make him look like a girl to the point that he could be mistaken for one.
[url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Cross_dressing]Cross-dressing[/url] is not required while often being the source of the confusion.

name: 学校宿舍
alias:
Danshiryou
Joshiryou
Residence Hall
女子寮
男子寮
description:
Some part of the game takes place in a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Dormitory]dormitory[/url].

A dormitory, often shortened to dorm, in the United States is a residence hall consisting of sleeping quarters or entire buildings primarily providing sleeping and residential quarters for large numbers of people, often boarding school, college or university students. In the UK, the word has an earlier, different but related meaning: it refers specifically to an individual room in which many people sleep, typically at a boarding school. The UK equivalent of the American word as applied to university buildings is hall of residence, often shortened to halls.

name: 哑巴主人公
description:
The protagonist doesn't say a word in the entire game. It may be based on a form of [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Muteness]muteness[/url] or a gameplay mechanism.

For example, most JRPG characters never say a word for the entire game but the story characters act like he did, and have one sided conversations with him. Possibly assuming that you, the player, talk with your TV/monitor or something...

name: 血缘父女乱伦
description: These games contain sexual scenes between a blood-related father and daughter.

name: 涉及卖淫的性行为
alias:
Enjo-kousai Sex
Hooker Sex
Hooking
JK Business Sex
description:
These games have sex scenes that involve prostitution, that is, one of the participants take place in the activity for monetary or similar gains.

[url=https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Prostitution]Prostitution[/url] is the business or practice of engaging in sexual relations in exchange for payment or some other benefit. Prostitution is sometimes described as commercial sex. 

A common form of prostitution in Japan is called [url=https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/JK_business]JK business[/url] (Enjo-kousai) that means "compensated dating" and is a practice where older men give money and/or luxury gifts to attractive women for their companionship and possibly, for sexual favors.

name: 伪娘配角
alias:
Boy Cross-dressing as a Girl Side Character
Boy Cross-dressing as a Girl Support Character
Cross-Dressing Male Side Character
Cross-dressing Male Support Character
Otokonoko Side Character
Otoko no Ko Side Character
Otokonoko Support Character
Otoko no Ko Support Character
Trap Side Character
男の娘 Side Character
男の娘 Support Character
Femboy Side Character
Tomgirl Side Character
Sissy Side Character
description:
At least one of the support characters of this visual novel is a boy whose physical features make him look like a girl to the point that he could be mistaken for one.
[url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Cross_dressing]Cross-dressing[/url] is not required while often being the source of the confusion.

name: 怀孕
description: Stories involving pregnancy.

name: 失明主人公
description: The protagonist (or alternatively, POV character) is afflicted by optical, neural, or neurological sightlessness.

name: 孕交
description: This visual novel involves sex with [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Pregnancy]pregnant[/url] women.

name: 垂直方向文本
description: The text in this game is displayed vertically instead of horizontally.

name: 浮动的文本框
description:
The textbox is not in a fixed position, but may appear in different places and sizes on the screen.

[ex: Quartett, Gekkou no Carnevale]

name: 展示形式
description:
Tags that describe the look and feel of the game. Not how the game is played, but how the games contents are presented to the reader.

Check the related [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Presentation]Wikipedia[/url] article for details.

name: 非人类主人公
description: The protagonist might look human, other characters might think the protagonist is human, but the protagonist isn't actually human.

name: 戴眼镜的主人公
description: The protagonist wears glasses.

name: 配音
description:
This meta-tag is for housing the tags that detail how the voice acting is used in a game. 

If the protag has voice acting, does heroine lines only partially voiced, or does the game has every line voiced, including characters thoughts and all...

name: 主人公的特征
description: Protagonist-defining character traits.

name: 主人公的角色/职业
description:
Protagonist Archetypes defined by what they do (for a living) or what [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Role]roles[/url] they play in the society.

Also includes characters that stopped doing this job (role etc.) but still keeps acting like one.

name: 强奸犯主人公
description:
The protagonist in this VN displays inclination to commit rape. Don't use this tag for every game that gives you the option to commit rape once or twice, probably leading to bad ends, but for games that make it into a habit.

Usually, a protagonist like this is an unrepentant criminal, though in some cases they might invent their own justification why in their mind it's okay to rape certain characters.

name: 因必要理由被迫做爱
description: Characters have a binding, mandatory reason to have sex. Often bizarre, like "this serious illness can only be cured by protagonist's special sperm" or "the only way for her to become stronger is to have sex".

name: 双胞胎作为配角
description: This game has at least one set of [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Twins]twins[/url] as supporting characters.

name: 痴汉主人公
description: The protagonist is a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Frotteurism]frotteur[/url].

name: 扶她女主角
description:
One or more of the game's heroines has  male as well as female genitalia. Generally, though not necessarily, paired with otherwise female characteristics.

Check the related [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Hermaphrodite]Wikipedia[/url] page for details.

name: 表堂兄弟姐妹乱伦
description: These games contain sexual scenes between two (or more) cousins. They may or may not be blood-related.

name: 堂兄弟姐妹恋情
description: These games contain romance between cousins.

name: 主人公的表堂姐妹为女主角
description:
One or more of the heroines is a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Cousin]cousin[/url] of the protagonist.

A cousin is a relative with whom a person shares one or more common ancestors (other than a parent, child/descendant, sibling, child/descendant of a sibling, or sibling of a parent/ancestor). However in common parlance, "cousin" normally specifically means "first cousin".

name: 实时3D
description: Most of the graphics in the game are 3D models, rendered in realtime.

name: 校友回归
description: This game features some characters return to a their home town, usually the protagonist. It may just be about that person's experiences or it may be about big events related to it, like the [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Homecoming]homecoming[/url] celebrations.

name: 同居
alias:
Doukyo
Dousei
Living Together
Sharing a Home
description: The protagonist lives in the same home as one of the heroines/heroes for an extended period. They may not necessarily share the sleeping quarters, but they must at least have common dining rooms, kitchens, sanitary facilities, etc.

name: 伪娘主人公
alias:
Cross-dressing Male Protagonist
Otokonoko Protagonist
Otoko no Ko Protagonist
男の娘 Protagonist
Femboy Protagonist
Tomgirl Protagonist
Sissy Protagonist
description:
The protagonist of this visual novel is a boy whose physical features make him look like a girl to the point that he could be mistaken for one.
[url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Cross_dressing]Cross-dressing[/url] is not required while often being the source of the confusion.

name: 救世主主人公
description: The protagonist is heralded as the "Chosen One", with prophecies, omens et al.

name: 女子学校
description: This game is set on a school that only admits girls as students.

name: 岛
description: A significant part of this visual novel is set on a small(ish) [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Island]island[/url].

name: 保镖主人公
alias:
Guardian Protagonist
Protector Protagonist
Security Guard Protagonist
description: The protagonist of this game is a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Bodyguard]bodyguard[/url].

name: 照片立绘
description: The characters are not represented by drawings or CG, but by photographs of actors.

name: 音乐环境
description: The game largely takes place in a musical environment - for example, a band, an orchestra, a music school, or similar.

name: 成长剧
description: The story has parts narrating the transition of the characters from adolescence to adulthood.

name: 转世
description: One or more of the game's characters, human or not, are [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Reincarnation]reincarnations[/url] of dead people (or animals or gods).

name: 照片背景
description: The backgrounds in the game were originally photographs. Likely filtered to some degree, but still clearly recognizable as such.

name: 后宫结局
description:
This game has a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Harem]harem[/url] ending.

This means you can reach to an ending in which the protagonist is being loved by multiple heroines at the same time. And somehow manages to keep them all without choosing one over.

This situation can result in both erotic (leading to group sex scenes) and comedy (stuff that you see in all those harem anime) endings.

name: 平台游戏
description: Games with this tag has some amounts of jumping to and from suspended platforms. They may be dungeon floors in a 2D platformer, or climbing a mountain in a 3D one.

name: 神
description: A game with this tag has some supernatural divinities, gods, or goddess' on its cast. They may be originating from one of the popular mythologies or may be based on games original story. Or may be they are from one of the accepted religions around the world, if the game is brave enough.

name: 永生的主人公
description: The protagonist is immortal, doesn't age or can't be killed through normal means.

name: 神明主人公
description: The protagonist of this visual novel is a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Deity]god[/url].

name: 同事女主角
description: One of the heroines works at the same place as the protagonist, whether occasionally or permanently.

name: 虚拟现实
description: This visual novel features a separate, well distinguishable virtual world, which is reachable through 'technological' means.

name: 痴迷
description:
One of the characters have an obsession that plays an important part in this story. It may be a revenge the protagonist is obsessing about or it may be a heroine obsessing about uncovering a certain truth.

Don't use this tag on the games where a heroine is insisting on eating something... but on games when it is a factor of psychological drama.

name: 复仇
description: A character in this game is hell bent on a revenge. He or she will do anything for it...

name: 恐怖主义
description: This visual novel includes acts of [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Terrorism]terrorism[/url] in its plot.

name: 黑客主人公
description: The protagonist of this visual novel is a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Hacker_%28term%29]hacker[/url].

name: 捏人或捏物
alias:
character building
character customization
tweaking
vehicle customisation
description: This game allows you to customize your characters, vehicles and similar. Any detailed customizations beyond the basic picking up (and equipping) items an equipment detail of the usual RPG's can be considered a customization.

name: 二周目
description:
This game allows you to use previous playthrough's saves on future play sessions. Allowing further character building and access to higher level content etc on each replay.

Check related [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/New_Game_Plus]Wikipedia[/url] article for details.

name: 图形
description:
All tags related to the games graphical presentation methods, sprites, animations etc. goes here.

Check the related [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Graphics#Computer_graphics]Wikipedia[/url] article for details.

name: 可选的游戏玩法
description: Mini-games and battle sequences in this game are optional. They can be turned off and/or skipped easily without playing them even once. Well except for an introduction or a brief tutorial of course.

name: 可跳过的游戏玩法
description: Mini-games and battle sequences in this game can be skipped after beating them once. There may be cases where a game requires them to be beaten more then once, but the tag still applies.

name: 跳过场景
description:
This game offers the option to skip one or more scenes, usually on subsequent play-throughs after you read it once. 

This is an alternative to the usual fast-forwarding through the lines you read before, that most games use. Since this allows you to skip large amounts of text and images completely without forcing you to fast-forward through them.

name: 生活片段剧
description: This tag is for slice of life stories of dramatic nature.

name: 日常片段
description:
A [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Slice_of_life]slice of life[/url] story is a category for a story that portrays a "cut-out" sequence of events in a character's life.

It usually tries to depict the every-day life of ordinary people, sometimes with fantasy or science fiction elements involved.

Slice of life stories may either be dramatic or otherwise presented in a very serious nature, or may be used to help frame a comedic setting.

name: 真实生活片段
description: This tag is for slice of life stories presented in a very realistic way.

name: 战争
description: The story includes large-scale armed conflict.

name: 末日
alias:
Armageddon
Doomsday
End of the World
Ragnarok
description: The story involves the end of the world as we know it.

name: 可解锁路线
description:
This tag is for games with new unlockable routes. 

They can be made available by getting to certain points in a game or by finishing it a set amounts of times.

name: 可供选择的起点
description:
This game allows users to start from alternative starting points after finishing a route. Usually at the turning point of the game where a user picks which route to continue.

This tag is not for games with new unlockable routes. Use [url=http://vndb.org/g459]Unlockable Routes[/url] for those.

name: 有绝对领域的女主角
description:
This game features one or more heroines with [url=http://tvtropes.org/pmwiki/pmwiki.php/Main/ZettaiRyouiki]zettai ryouiki[/url].

"Zettai Ryouiki" consists of socks reaching over the knees, a short skirt, and an exposed thigh area between the socks and the skirt. Zettai ryouiki can refer to just the exposed thigh area, or to the combination of high socks, short skirt and exposed thigh. It can be a sexual fetish. Note that proper zettai ryouiki requires the socks to reach above the knee.

Examples include [url=/c34]Rin[/url] from Fate/stay night, [url=/c2928]Nayuki[/url] from Kanon, [url=/c3793]Miyu[/url] from Kimi ga Aruji and every girl from [url=/v1799]Zettai Ryouiki![/url].

name: 眼罩女主角
description:
One or more heroines of this game has an [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Eyepatch]eyepatch[/url]. She doesn't necessarily have to be blind in that eye, only requirement is that the character wears it enough to be associated with it.

An eyepatch is a small patch that is worn in front of one eye. It may be a cloth patch attached around the head by an elastic band or by a string, or an adhesive bandage. It is often worn by people to cover a lost or injured eye, but it also has a therapeutic use in children for the treatment of amblyopia.

name: 有过性经验的女主角
description:
Most of the VN's and and Eroge are pure love stories. With the protagonist being the first love of the games heroines and the first man that they have ever been with.

But in some cases story takes a more realistic approach and display heroines that had previous sexual experiences before the games story begins or ones that still keep an active sexual life. This tag is for that type of heroines that are not virgins when they sleep with the protagonist.

This tag is only for character classification purposes and it is not meant to discriminate anyone's lifestyle or choices.

name: 成人女主角
description:
One or more of the heroines in this game are [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Adult]adults[/url].

'Adult' is a broadly subjective concept, but in visual novel settings should usually mean any person who is of age and has finished the high school. In fantasy/sci-fi settings where high school is not mandatory or doesn't exist, having an occupation or being of age where having an occupation is expected can be used as an indication of 'adulthood'.

name: 女主角的外貌
description: These are the tags defining a heroines [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Human_physical_appearance]physical appearance[/url].

name: 女主角的个性
description: This meta-tag is to gather heroine traits related to their personalities.

name: 锦标赛
description: This game has a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Tournament]tournament[/url] that is an important part of the story.

name: 管家配角
alias:
estate manager
head of household staff
house manager
majordomo
manservant
staff manager
description: One of the visual novel's support characters is a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Butler]butler[/url].

name: 现代东京
description:
The game is set in, or at least has considerable time of its story taking place in modern day [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Tokyo]Tokyo[/url].
Note: "Modern day" refers to an unspecified time period between the late 20th century and today.

name: 现代涩谷
description:
The game is set in, or at least has considerable time of its story taking place in modern day [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Shibuya,_Tokyo]Shibuya[/url].
Note: "Modern day" refers to an unspecified time period between the late 20th century and today.

name: 猫耳女主角
description:
For games featuring heroines with catlike ears or anything that would remind it as their signature part or appearance, such as a hairband with cat ears or her hair being shaped exactly like one.

Please do not mix with catgirl tag; almost every catgirl has nekomimi, but not every nekomimi is a catgirl... And catgirl is a child tag of Non-human Heroine, so it's not suitable for human girls with nekomimi.

name: 兽耳女主角
description:
This game has one or more [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Kemonomimi#Animals]kemonomimi[/url] characters that are appearing in a heroine role.

Kemonomimi characters typically appear human except for added animal-like qualities (such as ears or tails).

name: 教师主人公
description: The protagonist of this game is a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Teacher]teacher[/url].

name: 法师主人公
alias:
Battlemage Protagonist
Magus Protagonist
Sorcerer Protagonist
Spellcaster Protagonist
Wizard Protagonist
description: The protagonist of this game is is a mage.

name: 骰子游戏
description:
This game features a dice game that shows the thrown dice.

Do not use for games like RPG's that use hidden dice rolls.

name: 文字
description:
Where does this game display its text, what type of a text displaying method it chooses to tell its story?

All related tags are gathered here.

name: 天使
description: There are [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Angel]angels[/url] in this game.

name: 恶魔
description: There are [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Demons]demons[/url] in this game.

name: 兽耳族配角
description:
This game has one or more [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Kemonomimi#Animals]kemonomimi[/url] characters that are appearing in support roles.

Kemonomimi characters typically appear human except for added animal-like qualities (such as ears or tails).

name: 潜水艇
description: This visual novel has many scenes set inside of a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Submarine]submarine[/url].

name: 异色瞳女主角
description:
One or more of the heroines has eyes of different colors.

Check the related [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Heterochromia]Wikipedia[/url] article for details.

name: 僵尸女主角
description: At least one of the heroines of this visual novel is a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Zombie_%28fictional%29]zombie[/url].

name: 活玩偶女主角
description: One of the heroines is a living doll. Like in Rozen Maiden.

name: 女巫女主角
description:
A heroine in this game is a witch, a type of magician that delves into the context of [url=https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Witchcraft]witchcraft[/url].

Do not use this tag for any heroine who is able to cast magic; use this tag only if a heroine is specifically stated to be a witch or practice witchcraft.

name: 女同女主角
description:
One of the heroines is sexually attracted to other females. It is expressed by her behavior through the game, her sexual experience on the subject is irrelevant for this tag.

Along the story she may change her choice and turn bisexual or heterosexual, main idea here is her acting this way for a considerable time in the game.

name: 不死生物
description:
For games that includes all types of characters and creatures that are still walking, even after they are long dead...

Check Wikipedia [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Undead]undead[/url] entry for details.

name: 神性众生
description:
All divine entities goes here, angels, demons, gods etc.

Also includes ones that are touched by them, chosen ones etc.

name: 不死生物女主角
description: A heroine in this game is an [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Undead]undead[/url].

name: 神话生物女主角
description: This game features heroines belonging to the [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Divinity]divinity[/url].

name: 女主角有心理健康问题
description: For heroines suffering from a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Mental_disorder]mental disorder[/url].

name: 性瘾女主角
description: Heroine in this game has a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Nympho]sexual addiction[/url].

name: 强奸受害者女主角
description:
A heroine of this game is a victim of a rape and the story involves the drama and psychological problems she has afterwards.

Do not use for games that has rape scenes quickly followed by a game over, or games that don't consider this as an element of drama.

name: 主人公有心理健康问题
description: For protagonists suffering from a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Mental_disorder]mental disorder[/url].

name: 强奸受害者主人公
description:
Protagonist of this game is a victim of a rape and the story involves the drama and psychological problems he has afterwards.

Do not use for games that has rape scenes quickly followed by a game over, or games that don't consider this as an element of drama.

name: 心理创伤
description: Some characters in this game are suffering from a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Psychological_trauma]Psychological trauma[/url].

name: 性瘾主人公
description: Protagonist of this game has a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Nympho]sexual addiction[/url].

name: 多人游戏
description: This game can be played by more than one player at the same time. Both same computer/console/handheld and online multiplayer is covered by this tag.

name: 迟钝系主人公
alias:
Dense about Love Protagonist
Romantically Insensitive Protagonist
description: This type of a protagonist is totally immune to romantic and sexual advances. He/she can't read the atmosphere at all. This protagonist may be a genius but still can't understand the feelings of anyone towards him/her until a clear confession is made. Even then he/she needs to ask for a confirmation about it and think for a while to understand what that means. The people who are in love with this protagonist can do everything to make him/her understand, from occasional kisses to even having sex under poor excuses (like transfering mana etc) but they have no chance to be understood, none at all...

name: 异装/跨性别
description: This game involves transgender, transvestite characters, characters who actively transgresses, or "bends," expected gender roles, and/or situations about them as an important part of the story.

name: 主人公的外貌
description: This metatag is to gather protagonist tags related to their appearance.

name: 童年约定
description:
Two characters in this game, usually the protagonist and a heroine made a promise to each other in their childhood.

This promise is a key element in this story and even though in many cases one or both sides may have forgotten about it, it will change many things when its remembered/ revealed.

name: 外星人女主角
description:
One or more heroines of this game are of [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Extraterrestrial_life]extraterrestrial[/url] origin.

Extraterrestrial life is defined as life that does not originate from Earth. Also referred to as alien life, or simply aliens, these hypothetical forms of life range from simple bacteria-like organisms to sapient beings far more advanced than humans.

name: 狗狗女主角
description: One or more of the heroines is a dog-girl.

name: 大量强奸内容
description: This game has a lot of rape in it. Not just a handful but tons of it...beware...

name: 天才配角
description: One of the supporting characters is a natural genius that knows much about anything and everything.

name: NTR
description:
This visual novel has scenes focused on Netorare. Netorare is more than a simple act of infidelity, but the fetishization of jealousy and other negative feelings commonly associated with it.

For a game to be classified as Netorare the following conditions must be met:

1. The protagonist's significant other, a very close friend, or in some cases, a close relative is stolen from him by someone seducing, coercing, blackmailing, outright raping them, or by using other techniques. It doesn't necessarily mean that they are literally stolen, but the negative feelings experienced by their significant other might make it seem so.

2. The one who loses their loved one almost always finds out about the situation and suffers from jealousy and the feeling of helplessness arisen from an inability to change anything. The one stealing the lover and/or the stolen loved one might rub it in by humiliating the loser in private or in public.

3. The trait does [b]not[/b] apply if the character having sex with someone else does not have a close loving relationship with the protagonist, and if the protagonist does not experience jealousy and other negative feelings upon finding out about the act. In other words, the ties between the partners and their forcible separation is important to the netorare fetish. For example, an unrequited crush or a potential hero(ine) on a different route would not count for the purposes of this fetish.

4. The act of stealing must happen while the protagonist is in a relationship with the stolen significant other. Scenes of heroine's past relationships do not count as Netorare.

The game is usually portrayed from the perspective of someone losing his significant other, in order to delve deep into the jealousy aspect of the fetish, however, for story purposes the game might switch between multiple POVs and also portray the events from the perspective of the stolen SO.

name: 领导者女主角
description: This type of heroine is a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Leader]leader[/url]. This heroine has employees/subjects/soldiers to command. Games story may or may not include actually commanding them.

name: 报纸社团
description: [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Newspaper]Newspaper[/url] club and the activities related to it takes an important role in this story.

name: 私家侦探主人公
alias:
Gumshoe Protagonist
Private Dick Protagonist
Private Eye Protagonist
Private Investigator Protagonist
description: The protagonist makes a living as a  [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Private_detective]private detective[/url].

name: 龙主人公
description: The protagonist of this visual novel is a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Dragon]dragon.[/url]

name: Ganguro风格女主角
description: This game features one or more heroines that have an appearance similar to the [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Ganguro]ganguro[/url] fashion.

name: NTL
description:
Netori is a counterpart tag to [url=/g513]Netorare[/url], however instead of playing as someone who has his significant lover stolen, you play as the one doing the stealing.

Rather than fetishizing jealousy and other negative feelings, Netori is a power trip of pulling one over another person and taking something that is theirs.

For a game to be classified as Netori, the following conditions must be met:

1. The protagonist steals the significant other, a very close friend, or in extremely rare cases, a close relative from another character by seducing, coercing, blackmailing, outright raping them, or by using other techniques.

2. The character stolen must be someone you are not supposed to steal. As an example, the protagonist having sex with someone's mother wouldn't be Netori, if she doesn't have a significant other. However, it would become Netori if she is the protagonist's own mother, and the father is present in the game in some form.

3. For Netori-themed games the finding out aspect is less important, as the game focuses on the protagonist and his conquest. Still, the losing character needs to exist within the game and play some role related to his SO being stolen. If the losing character does not appear or is barely mentioned, the game should be tagged with [url=/g1380]Infidelity[/url] instead of Netori.

4. The trait does not apply if the protagonist's conquest does not have a close loving relationship with another character, as ties between the partners and their forcible separation by the protagonist is important aspect of the fetish.

name: 已婚女主角
alias:
Hitodzuma Heroine
Hitozuma Heroine
Wife Heroine
description: At least one of the heroines of this visual novel is a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Wife]married woman[/url]. Her marriage may or may not be continuing during the course of the story.

name: 药物性交
alias:
Aphrodisiacs
Drug-induced Sex
Sex with Pills
description: This visual novel contains sexual scenes between participants, who voluntarily or involuntarily consume drugs before/during sex scenes.

name: 咖啡馆
description:
Games with this tag mostly take place inside a cafe or a similar location.

Use the tag only for games that spend considerable time in one, not every game that shows a cafe once.

name: 森林
description: A significant part of this visual novel is set in a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Forest]forest[/url].

name: 性骚扰
description: For games that has elements of [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Sexual_harassment]sexual harassment[/url] in their stories.

name: 痴汉
description:
Chikan (痴漢, チカン, or ちかん) is the Japanese term used to refer to [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Frotteurism]frotteurism[/url], or men who commit such acts (the term for women who commit such acts is chijo, 痴女).

Use this tag if the game in question has this type of harrasment as an important factor in its story and it goes beyond a simple one time attempt. Not as a passing joke or a reference.

name: 书呆子女主角
description:
One or more heroines in this game is a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Bibliophilia]bookworm[/url].

A bookworm is someone who loves books for their content, or who otherwise loves reading.

This type of heroines can be often spotted reading a book, carrying a book or talking about a book at all times. They are also known for working or hanging out in school libraries or book stores.

name: 学生社团
description:
A [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Student_club]student club[/url] plays an important role in this story.

School clubs are student-based school organizations, consisting of administration-approved organizations functioning with myriads of tasks, varying on the specific purpose of each respective club.

name: 软弱无能的主人公
alias:
Good-for-nothing Protagonist
Spineless Protagonist
Useless Protagonist
Wimpy Protagonist
Worthless Protagonist
Wussy Protagonist
description:
The opposite of [url=/g692]Proactive Protagonist[/url].

The protagonist of this game is a worthless, spineless, good for nothing individual that is not worthy of being called a man. He is no help to anyone and is most of the time unable to make any decisions in time. He is always being pushed around by every other character in the game, he is that way at the start and he is still like that in the final moments of the game.

Please don't use this tag on games that has its protag starting this way but also has him fixing his ways in the first hours of the game. Thus making it somewhat bearable by some quick reading.

While this description says man, this tag can also be applied to worthless, spineless, good for nothing female protagonists.

name: 反英雄主人公
description:
This games protagonist is an [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Antihero]Antihero[/url].

He is generally considered to be a protagonist whose character is, at least in some regards, conspicuously contrary to that of the archetypal hero, and is in some instances its antithesis. Usually the antihero lacks heroic motivation and uses questionable methods to achieve his goal, this is done from the perspective that the ends justify the means.

name: 卷轴射击游戏
description: This games action sequences are set on a scrolling background, like the screen always scrolls to right, or to up. No free movement available other than trying to survive on that scrolling screen.

name: 哥特风格女主角
description: One or more heroines in this game are mostly dressed in [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Gothic_fashion]gothic fashion[/url].

name: 虚构的未来日本城镇
description: This game is set in a fictional Japanese town sometime in the future.

name: 兔子女主角
alias:
Bunny-girl Heroine
Bunnygirl Heroine
Bunny Girl Heroine
Rabbit Girl Heroine
description:
One or more heroines in this visual novel is a bunny-girl.

NOTE: This tag refers to heroines whose rabbit features are permanent- for example, a rabbit kemonomimi whose rabbit features are a part of her body. For human heroines who have non-permanent rabbit-features - such as clothing or hairstyles- please use [URL=https://vndb.org/g474/]Usagimimi Heroine[/URL].

name: 假小子女主角
description:
One or more of the heroines of this novel is a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Tomboy]tomboy[/url].

A tomboy is a girl who exhibits characteristics or behaviors considered typical of the gender role of a boy, including wearing masculine clothing and engaging in games and activities that are physical in nature, and which are considered in many cultures to be the domain of boys. Tomboy girls also tend to be rude and rough and have or show bad manners.

name: 精神控制做爱
alias:
Saiinjutsu
Saimin
Saiminjutsu
Sex Involving Hypnosis
Sexual Hypnotism
Erotic Brainwashing
description: This game features characters that use techniques of [url=https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Brainwashing]mind control[/url] to achieve sexual relationships with others, and other situations that somehow manage to combine mind control with sex.

name: 血亲母子乱伦
description: These games contain sexual scenes between a blood-related mother and son.

name: 大胸女主角
description: One or more heroines of this VN have big, huge or gigantic breasts.

name: 纯爱故事
alias:
Love Overcomes All
True Love Story
description:
Most of the VNs have some sort of romance, but there are some that are about true love overcoming all difficulties. Of a pair of destined lovers overcoming every difficulty...

Examples include:
*Stories about lovers that stay true to each other no matter what (lying once or twice allowed sleeping with others not),
*Stories about lovers that sacrifice everything for their love,
*Stories where love saves the characters from certain doom (like giving up on an endless chain of revenge for love),
etc

name: 魔王主人公
description:
The protagonist is a Maou, a demon king (or king of devils etc).

He might've just escaped from being sealed for centuries and aiming to regain his former power (and enslave those who thwarted him the last time), just finally decided on taking over the world... or he might be a Maou who loves small animals and nature in general, hates mankind because they pollute it, and who ends up living together with a group of humans to see if they're really that bad.

Do note that this tag is only intended for actual demon kings,  and not for characters bearing Maou as a title or a nick. The character needs to have fantastic, [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Demonic]demonic[/url] properties.

name: 节日
description: A [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Festival]festival[/url] holds a great deal of importance in this games story.

name: 学校节日庆典
description:
A considerable time of this games story takes place during a school festival or during the preparations for one showing the activities and preparations of students.

Check the related [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Japanese_Cultural_Festival]Wikipedia[/url] article for further details.

name: 法庭
description: The story involves an on-screen trial with which the characters are heavily involved. Expect lots of hyperbole-filled arguments, cross-examination of witnesses, and (if you're really lucky) just maybe a cry or two of "Objection!"

name: 通灵
description: One or more of the game's characters have the ability to communicate with or conjure the spirits of the dead. This may take the form of a seance, or the spirit may possess the medium's body.

name: 警察
description: The [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Police]police[/url] have a major role in this game. One or more characters are members of the police force, and/or police work is significantly involved in the game's plot.

name: 乙女类游戏
alias:
Girl x Boy Romance
GxB Romance
Otoge
Otomege
Reverse dating-sim
description:
A game with a female protagonist, with the central focus on developing a relationship with one or more male characters. These games are usually aimed at a female audience, such as Tokimeki Memorial Girls' Side.

Note that not all games meant for female players fit this tag, such as yaoi games.

name: 黑客攻击
description: This game involves characters hacking into security networks, corporations, or even just the computers of other hackers. Expect ICE, Icebreakers, and in the worst cases "All our DNS are down! They're breaking through the subnets!"

name: 学生主人公
description: The protagonist is attending school during the course of the story.

name: 肉鸽（Roguelike）
description: This game has [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Roguelike]roguelike[/url] gameplay. Roguelikes are the ancestors of modern computer RPGs, and feature randomized dungeons (or other terrain) as well as turnbased gameplay (with short turns - in general, only 1 action per turn - attack once, move one square, etc.).

name: 叙述他人的思维
description:
On a regular game player can hear the thoughts of the protagonist, but not the other characters. Unlike those, games bearing this tag allows you to hear the thoughts of other characters as well, just as a part of its narrative, not because the protagonist has psychic powers or something.

Do not mix this tag with the games that switches to the perspective of other characters sometimes.

name: 警官主人公
description:
Protagonist of this game is an officer (a soldier in a position of authority) in a military force.

People taking temp roles in military does not belong to this tag. This is for professional officers.

name: 诅咒
description: This story has some sort of [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Curse]curse[/url] playing an important role in it.

name: 寡妇女主角
description:
One ore more of the heroines of this game is a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Widow]widow[/url].
A widow is a woman whose spouse has died.

name: 虚构的现代日本乡村
alias:
Fictional Contemporary Japanese Countryside
Fictional Contemporary Japanese Rural Area
Fictional Modern Day Japanese Rural Area
description:
This story is set in a fictional coutryside area of contemporary Japan.
Note: "Modern day" refers to an unspecified time period between the late 20th century and today.

name: 缓慢升温的恋情
description:
This story spends 'a lot of time' realizing the love between the couples in question because of any combination of the reasons below:

*They are too immature to realize their feelings,
*They are too shy to talk about their feelings,
*They are too afraid to confess their feelings,

...until a lot of time passes or something drastic happens.

name: 多线解密
description:
In order to understand the actual story of this game the player needs to play multiple routes. Each route reveals some bits of the mystery.

Do not confuse this with [url=http://vndb.org/g149]Enforced Playing Order[/url], since the VN doesn't necessarily have unlockable routes, and it is more about the story content of such paths and how they contribute to the story's overarching Mystery/Plot.

name: 死神女主角
alias:
Death God Heroine
God of Death Heroine
description: One or more heroines in this game are [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Shinigami]shinigami[/url].

name: 女武神女主角
description: One or more heroines in this game are [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Valkyrie]Valkyrie[/url].

name: 儿童主人公
description: These games have protagonists that are younger than the usual (student) protagonists of such games.

name: 体育节
description:
A considerable time of this games story takes place during a school athletics festival or during the preparations for one showing the activities and preparations of students.

Check the related [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Japanese_Cultural_Festival]Wikipedia[/url] article for further details.

name: 传递存档
description:
In some game series, a saved game from one game in the series can be used to unlock content or start in a different situation in later games. This game supports this loading of data from previous titles.

Check related [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Save_game]Wikipedia[/url] article for details.

name: 黑皮女主角
description:
This game features a heroine with a darker [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Skin_tone]skin tone[/url].

Can also be used for extremely tanned characters.

name: 主人公的选择
description:
At the beginning of this game you have to choose one of the characters to play as the protagonist.

This differs from games that switches lead roles during the course of a games story, since that is not optional.

name: 龙女主角
description: At least one heroine is a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Dragon]dragon[/url]. This includes heroines who are dragons but take human form (via magic or other means).

name: 龙
description: These games contain actual [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Dragon]dragons[/url] (as in, the monster/creature type, not as titles, coins or anything similar).

name: 人造生物
description:
Beings that are not born under normal circumstances, not even in the fantasy settings go under this tag. They may be made purposefully or may came into being by an accident. The point is, they are made, not born.

Golems animated by magic, creatures made in labs, all of them fall under this category. Walking dead do not count.

name: 转校生女主角
description:
One or more of this games heroines is a transfer student.

Check related [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Transfer_student]Wikipedia[/url] article for details.

name: 班长女主角
description:
This character is a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Class_President]class president[/url].

A class president is usually the leader of a student body class, and presides over its class cabinet or organization within a student council, in a grade school class presidents are generally elected by the class, a constituency composed of all students in a grade level.

Class presidents are different from the student-body president in that they represent only a specific class of students, rather than the entire student body.

name: 学校体育社团成员女主角
description:
A heroine is a member of a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Sports_club]sports club[/url] associated with a school.

A school sports club is a administration-approved student-based school organization focusing on a selected sport.

name: 佩剑女主角
alias:
Heroine with Blade
Heroine with Katana
Heroine with Sword
description:
One of the heroines of this game carries a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Sword]sword[/url] around. She may be in a school club related to swords (Kendo, Iaido, Fencing) or may have another reason to do so.

Another tag, [url=http://vndb.org/g67]Onna Bugeisha[/url], also includes swords but it also refers to characters that have a strong sense of honor and justice. If that tag's description fits better, use that one instead.

name: 魔法教师主人公
description: Protagonist of this game teaches magic.

name: 决斗
description:
Most of the fighting in this game is in the form of one on one fights. They can be either of, in the form of a competition, or the classic anime style where everyone else just stops doing anything and watches the fight while discussing and throwing comments.

You can check the Wikipedia entry for [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Duel]duels[/url] for more information.

name: 犹豫不决的主人公
description:
Protagonist of this game can't make a choice between the heroines. He is either unsure about which one he loves more or is afraid of hurting the feelings of the other.

And since in the anime world it's 'okay' to not to make a choice and make everyone wait indefinitely, this is accepted as it is. Even though this considered a character flaw it doesn't effect concerned heroines endless love towards him at all...because love is so great...

PS: You can use this tag for games that the protag makes a decision later in the story too.

name: 武术家主人公
description: Protagonist of this game is a practitioner of [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Martial_arts]martial arts[/url].

name: 武术家女主角
description: A heroine of this game is a practitioner of [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Martial_arts]martial arts[/url].

name: 不可避女主角被强奸
description: There is a rape scene for a heroine in at least one of the routes and this is unavoidable. Use [url=/g3821]Completely Unavoidable Heroine Rape[/url] if the rape scenes appear in every route or before the branching point.

name: 只有非女主角不可避被强奸
description: Unavoidable rape scenes in this game are only ones that are concerning the non-heroine characters. If there are any rape scenes concerning the heroines they can be avoided.

name: 魅魔女主角
description: One or more of the heroines is a [url=https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Succubus]succubus[/url], a demon in female form who, according to mythological and legendary traditions, lies upon sleepers, especially men, in order to engage in sexual activity with them.

name: 主人公的学妹/后辈女主角
description: These games have at least one heroine who is a kouhai of the protagonist. Some examples can be a junior at a work place or a student of a class some years below.

name: 玩家作为角色
description:
This game has you, the player, taking active part in the game, as 'yourself'.

Most of the time this character you play does not speak any lines and doesn't have a set name; to keep the feeling that it is 'you'.

This can be thought to be similar to the [url=http://vndb.org/g390]Mute Protagonist[/url] but is different in some aspects since that protagonist is just a character that doesn't have any lines in the story.

name: 打破第四面墙
description:
This story features events or characters that break the illusion of reality of the game's setting. (referred as the [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Fourth_wall]fourth wall[/url])

Examples include characters directly speaking to the player, or scenes were the real world is compared with the stories fictional world.

name: 医生主人公
alias:
Doctor of Medicine Protagonist
Medical Practitioner Protagonist
Physician Protagonist
description: The protagonist (or a protagonist) of this game is a practitioner of medicine, a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Physician]physician[/url].

name: 只有可避免的色情内容
description:
The story of this game can be enjoyed to the end without seeing any sexual content. Sexual content is only present in side stories or in specific endings, or can simply be avoided by making the right choices. (Or the wrong choices, depending on your point of view.)

If a game's good endings include sexual content, it should not have this tag.

**IMPORTANT NOTE: This tag is for *in-game* avoidance ONLY. *Do not* tag visual novels with a "no sexual content patch", "all-ages version patch", etc. - those are to be specified in the releases section of a visual novel only!**

name: 游泳社团
description: School [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Swimming_%28sport%29]swimming[/url] club and the activities related to it takes an important role in this story.

name: 恶魔主人公
description: Protagonist of this game is (or later becomes) a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Demon]demon[/url].

name: 天使主人公
description: Protagonist of this game is (or later becomes) an [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Angel]angel[/url].

name: 女商人女主角
description:
This type of a heroine usually wears formal clothing, acts serious and is knowledgeable in business management. She usually is the best person to be consulted about any issues regarding money and law.

Her current position (work status) during the game's story is irrelevant since the tag is about her attitude and outlook.

name: 暖人心田
description:
This type of a story is designed to have an emotional impact on the player and make itself memorable, crying is usual but mostly optional.

It's explained in [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Key_%28company%29]wikipedia article about KEY[/url] like this:
The developers at Tactics created a simple formula for a game: a comedic first half with a heart-warming romantic middle followed by a tragic separation and finally an emotional reunion formed what is known as a "crying game". The main purpose of such a game is to make the player feel for the characters and make them cry due to emotional scenarios which serves to leave a bigger impact on the player after the game is over.

name: 未来东京
description: The game is set in, or at least has considerable time of its story taking place in a future [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Tokyo]Tokyo[/url].

name: 单元事件故事
description:
This type of a story is told in a style that separates events and organizes them in an episodic structure. Each episode has its own flow, build-up and climax.

Sometimes games featuring this structure take it to the next step and add opening, ending and next episode trailers to each episode giving it a total TV Series feel. This is a bonus though, not a necessity to have this tag.

name: 美食讨论
description:
This game has a lot of scenes that are all about eating and discussing about food. The more detailed these discussions the better.

Usually in these games every occasion to eat is a detailed scene with characters eating (usually something different each time), and discussing about current dishes origins, how it's made and similar.

Advanced versions of these games also include shopping to prepare those dinners. And they manage to include scenes about ingredient discussions, shopping tips and more.

name: 合意触手性交
description: This visual novel features consensual sex involving [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Tentacle]tentacles[/url].

name: 独特的剧情路线
description:
Routes in this game are totally different from each other.

For example, one route's allies and villains can change places in another route, and you can find yourself fighting against a heroine this time, side by side with the villain you hated on the other route.

Or when you were trying to save the world in one route, you may find yourself trying to destroy it on the next route.

name: 傲娇女主角
description:
This game features one or more heroines that display [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Tsundere]tsundere[/url] behavior.

Tsundere is a Japanese character development process which describes a person who is initially cold and even hostile towards another person before gradually showing their warm side over time.

name: 幼稚暴力女主角
alias:
heroine that smacks the protagonist around
rough heroine
description:
This type of heroine shows childishly violent behaviour throughout the story. She hits the protagonist and others whenever she feels frustrated not caring if they had anything to blame for.

These attacks can get extremely violent but since they are considered a part of the comedy they don't cause any permanent harm.

This tag is for heroines that display violent outbursts in regular life. Do not use this tag for combat related situations. Also, do not use this tag when the heroine's violence toward the protagonist or other characters is seriously intended to be harmful, rather than overexaggerated for the sake of comedy.

name: 网球社团
description: School [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Tennis]tennis[/url] club and the activities related to it takes an important role in this story.

name: 半人类女主角
description:
This game features one or more heroines that are born from the union of a human and a member of different species.

Examples include [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Half-elves]half-elves[/url], half-demons, [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Demigod]demigods[/url] etc...

Magically or scientifically created combinations count for this tag, but cyborgs etc do not.

name: 分支剧情
description: This is the anti-thesis of [url=http://vndb.org/g145]Linear Plot[/url]. This story, at some point, will divide into multiple sub-stories.

name: 傲慢女主角
alias:
Class-conscious Heroine
Elitist Heroine
Immodest Heroine
Snob Heroine
Takabi Heroine
description:
This type of heroine believes that she is superior to everyone else, in every aspect, and takes great pleasure in pointing this out at every opportunity.

Most of the time this character turns out to be incompetent yet utterly arrogant, complete with the artificial laugh and slapstick, but in rare cases she can have a solid reason to be arrogant. 

Usually these characters are accompanied by a few lackeys following them around.

name: 蒸汽朋克
description: This game features elements from the [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Steampunk]steampunk[/url] genre.

name: 飞机
description: [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Airplane]Airplanes[/url] play an important role in the game's story.

name: 飞行员女主角
alias:
astronaut heroine
aviator heroine
crewman heroine
description: This heroine is a pilot or a crewman of an airplane, aka. an [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Aviator]aviator[/url].

name: 丘比特女主角
description: Heroine is a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Cupid]cupid[/url], god of love. She may have a bow and arrows, which allows her to seed a love between people

name: 可解锁后宫结局
description: Game has a harem ending, but you can only play it after completing some other routes.

name: 主人公的个性
description: This meta-tag is to gather protagonist traits related to their personalities.

name: 愚蠢的主人公
alias:
Blockhead Protagonist
Bonehead Protagonist
Idiot Protagonist
Silly Protagonist
Stupid Protagonist
description: For not so smart protagonists.

name: 好色主人公
description:
The protagonist in a visual novel with this tag is a pervert.

[URL=https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Perversion#Sexual_usages]Perversion[/URL] is a type of human behavior that deviates from that which is understood to be orthodox or normal. Although the term perversion can refer to a variety of forms of deviation, it is most often used to describe sexual behaviors that are considered particularly abnormal, repulsive or obsessive.

Please note that this tag specifically refers to sexual perversion.

name: 挥剑主人公
alias:
Protagonist with Blade
Protagonist with Katana
Protagonist with Sword
description: The protagonist carries a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Sword]sword[/url] around. It may be related to a school club (Kendo, Iaido, Fencing) or may have another reason.

name: 热血主人公
description:
The protagonist is hotblooded.

For those uninitiated, a hotblooded character feels extremely passionate about justice/love/protecting his friends (there are also other types, like hot blooded artists, but these are usually played for laughs) to such a degree that he WILL overcome challenges that aren't humanly possible.
Hotblooded characters regularly keep fighting after all others would've died, overcome mind control, poison, disease, gravity, radiation and fate itself by sheer guts and passion.

Prominent examples include Domon Kasshu (G-Gundam), Magami Yuuji([URL=http://vndb.org/v2000]Only You[/URL]), Kamina and Simon (TTGL) and Himehagi Aisuka ([URL=http://vndb.org/v1491]Trample on Schatten!![/URL]).

name: 热血女主角
description:
One or more of the heroines is hotblooded.

For those uninitiated, a hotblooded character feels extremely passionate about justice/love/protecting her friends (there are also other types, like hot blooded artists, but these are usually played for laughs) to such a degree that she WILL overcome challenges that aren't humanly possible.
Hotblooded characters regularly keep fighting after all others would've died, overcome mind control, poison, disease, gravity, radiation and fate itself by sheer guts and passion.

The most prominent example of a hotblooded heroine in recent time is probably Kizaia Hinokami of [URL=http://vndb.org/v1491]Trample on Schatten[/URL].

name: 飞行员主人公
alias:
astronaut protagonist
aviator protagonist
crewman protagonist
description: This protagonist is a pilot or a crewman of an airplane, aka. an [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Aviator]aviator[/url].

name: 热血配角
description:
One or more of supporting cast is hotblooded.

For those uninitiated, a hotblooded character feels extremely passionate about justice/love/protecting his friends (there are also other types, like hot blooded artists, but these are usually played for laughs) to such a degree that he WILL overcome challenges that aren't humanly possible.
Hotblooded characters regularly keep fighting after all others would've died, overcome mind control, poison, disease, gravity, radiation and fate itself by sheer guts and passion.

name: 喜剧强奸
description: Most or all of the rape in this game are done in a comical way. Situations leading to them and the events after them are designed in a way that these events do not carry any drama and trauma that an actual rape does.

name: 贸易模拟游戏
description: This game features gameplay elements of a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Business_simulation_game]business simulation[/url].

name: 女同强奸
description: This tag is used on stories where one or more female characters sexually assault another female.

name: 短暂的男性主人公
description:
This game lets you play with a male protagonist for a short time.

Keep in mind that this short time still should be significantly long enough to make a mention of it.

For example; if a hundred hour game lets you play as a male protagonist for only five minutes, do not use this tag for that game.

Also do not use this for games that lets you see from the other characters' perspective for only a brief time like G-sen and Crescendo (use [url=/g633]Other Perspectives[/url] instead).

name: 扶她配角
description:
One of the support characters has male as well as female genitalia. Generally, though not necessarily, paired with otherwise female characteristics.

Check the related [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Futanari]Wikipedia[/url] article for details.

name: 飞机战斗
description: This game features battles fought in the skies with [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Airplanes]airplanes[/url].

name: Depression (obsolete)
description:
A mood of [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Depression_%28mood%29]depression[/url] can be felt through all this game. (Feelings of deep sadness, helplessness, and hopelessness.)

Or this game has an important character suffering from a serious case of depression, affecting the other characters in the game as well as the mood.

[b]The tag was mixing two different concepts and has been deprecated in favour of the clarified tag [url=/g3998]Clinical Depression[/url]. Transfer applicable VN entries to the newly clarified tag.[/b]

name: 超级英雄
description:
This game features some [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Superhero]superheroes[/url].

Expect some of games ordinary looking characters transform/change into some costumes/armors and fight for the 'public interest'.

name: 超级英雄主人公
description: The Protagonist of this game is a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Superhero]superhero[/url].

name: 超级女英雄
description: One of more of this games heroines are [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Superhero]superheroes[/url].

name: Mayadere Heroine
description:
This type of a tsundere is dangerous and scary.

Think of a heroine that started as a villain trying to kill the protagonist but then switched to his side after falling in love with him. One that still makes jokes about killing him once in a while...

name: 视角切换
description: While most games stick to the perspective of a single lead character, some use more then one lead and some switch to the other characters' [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Point_of_view_%28literature%29]point of view[/url] from time to time.

name: 其他人视角
description:
This game sometimes jumps to the perspectives of the characters other than the protagonist. But it doesn't stay in that [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Point_of_view_%28literature%29]point of view[/url] long enough to consider that character as an another lead or let you make choices etc.

This way you can see some events from their eyes, the events they encounter without protagonist being by their side, hear some of their thoughts etc...

name: 园艺社团
description: School gardening club and the activities related to it takes an important role in this story. Expect lots of talking about flowers in this game.

name: 护士女主角
description:
One of the games heroines is a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Nurse]nurse[/url].

Nursing is a profession within the healthcare sector focused on the care of individuals, families, and communities so they may attain, maintain, or recover optimal health and quality of life.

name: 厨师女主角
description: One of the games heroines is a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Cook_%28profession%29]cook[/url].

name: 记者女主角
description: One of the games heroines is a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Journalist]journalist[/url].

name: 单性别学校
description: This game is set on a school that only admits one gender as students. For details check [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Single-sex_school]single-sex education[/url].

name: 男子学校
description: This game is set on a school that only admits boys as students.

name: 管家主人公
alias:
estate manager protagonist
head of household staff protagonist
house manager protagonist
majordomo protagonist
manservant protagonist
staff manager protagonist
description: The protagonist of this game is a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Butler]butler[/url].

name: 保镖女主角
alias:
Guardian Heroine
Protector Heroine
Security Guard Heroine
description: A heroine of this game is a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Bodyguard]bodyguard[/url].

name: 警察女主角
alias:
Cop Heroine
Police Detective Heroine
Policewoman Heroine
description: A heroine of this game is a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Police_officer]police officer[/url].

name: 警察主人公
alias:
Cop Protagonist
Police Detective Protagonist
Policeman Protagonist
description: Protagonist of this game is a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Police_officer]police officer[/url].

name: 盗贼女主角
description: A heroine of this game is a professional [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Thief]thief[/url].

name: 律师主人公
alias:
Attorney Protagonist
Counsel Protagonist
Solicitor Protagonist
description: The protagonist of this game is a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Lawyer]lawyer[/url].

name: 援交女主角
alias:
Call Girl Heroine
Enjo Kousai Heroine
Enkou Heroine
Hooker Heroine
Whore Heroine
description: One of the games heroines engages in sexual activities in exchange for money. For details check [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Prostitution]prostitution[/url].

name: 第二次世界大战
description: This game takes place during the times of [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/World_War_II]World War II[/url], or has considerable amount of scenes that do in a series lengthy flashbacks or similar.

name: 阴阳师主人公
description:
The protagonist of this game is an [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Onmyouji#Onmy.C5.8Dji]onmyouji[/url].

Extract from wikipedia description:
"Onmyouji were specialists in magic and divination. Their court responsibilities ranged from tasks such as keeping track of the calendar, to mystical duties such as divination and protection of the capital from evil spirits. They could divine auspicious or harmful influences in the earth, and were instrumental in the moving of capitals. It is said that an onmyouji could also summon and control shikigami."

name: 主人公的妈妈为女主角
description: One of this games heroines is protagonist's [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Mother]mother[/url].

name: 主人公的血亲母亲作为女主角
description: One of this games heroines is protagonist's [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Mother]biological mother[/url].

name: 主人公的非血亲母亲作为女主角
alias:
Adoptive Mother Heroine
Foster Mother Heroine
Stepmother Heroine
Step Mother Heroine
description:
At least one heroine in this visual novel is the protagonist's mother, but they are not biologically related to one another.

This heroine could be the protagonist's stepmother, adopted mother or foster mother.

name: 非血缘母子乱伦
description: These games contain sexual scenes between a non-blood-related mother and son.

name: 牧师配角
description:
One of this games support characters is a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Priest]priest[/url].

These characters usually provide help and shelter to the lead characters of the story but sometimes their fantasy versions are also noted, casting holy spells, fighting against demons etc.

name: 医生女主角
alias:
Doctor of Medicine Heroine
Medical Practitioner Heroine
Physician Heroine
description: A heroine of this game is a practitioner of medicine, a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Physician]physician[/url].

name: 治疗师主人公
description:
Protagonist of this game is a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Healer]healer[/url] - whether he is a cleric using magic, adept at using herbs or a real doctor.

Usually has a mild personality (to the point of being fatherly), a staple of RPGs.

name: 厨师主人公
description: The protagonist of this game is a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Cook_%28profession%29]cook[/url].

name: 灵媒女主角
alias:
Channeler Heroine
Shaman Heroine
Spirit Guide Heroine
description: One of the heroines of this game is a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Mediumship]medium[/url].

name: 艺术家女主角
description: One of this games heroines is an [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Artist]artist[/url].

name: 音乐家女主角
description: One of the heroines of this game is a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Musician]musician[/url].

name: 画家女主角
description: One of the heroines is a creative artist in the medium of [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Painting]painting[/url].

name: 射箭社团
description: School [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Archery]archery[/url] club and the activities related to it takes an important role in this story.

name: 敲诈勒索
description:
This story has [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Blackmail]Blackmailing[/url].

For example; someone (most commonly the heroine) may get coerced into doing favors for someone else.

name: 勒索强奸
description:
This game contains scenes where an unwilling party gets blackmailed into having sex.

Examples include; games where the heroines gets coerced into doing sexual favors for the antagonist.

name: 大逃杀
description:
At least some of the characters are involved in a twisted game which involves killing other participants to ensure their own survival.
Usually they are forced into this by various means (maybe they were abducted or their only choices are the death penalty and playing the game), but exceptions do exist.

This should not be confused with duels in an arena, as it is almost involves fighting to the death and challenging someone to a duel will likely get you killed.

name: 植物女主角
description: One or more heroines of this game is a sentient plant - she could be the actual plant moving around, or "just" an avatar of it.

name: 鬼女主角
description:
One or more heroines in this game is an [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Oni_%28folklore%29]oni[/url] - a japanese demon.

Do not confuse with the Demon Heroine tag, which is for Western Demons.

name: 正太主人公
description:
Protagonist of this game is a shota. He's either a pubescent or prepubescent boy, or has the looks of one.

His age matters not one bit when it comes to his classification as a shota. This is only about appearance.

Refer to the related [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Shotacon]Wikipedia[/url] article for details.

name: 萝莉主人公
description:
Protagonist of this game is a loli. She's either an underage girl or has the looks of one.

Her age matters not one bit when it comes to her classification as a loli. This is only about appearance.

Refer to the related [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Lolicon]Wikipedia[/url] article for details.

name: 有过性经验的主人公
description:
Most of the VN's and and Eroge are pure love stories. Telling how the protagonist of this game found his/her first love and has his/her first sexual experience.

But in some cases story takes a more realistic approach and display protagonists that had previous sexual experiences before the games story begins or ones that still keep an active sexual life. This tag is for that type of protagonist that are not virgins at the beginning of the game.

This tag is only for character classification purposes and it is not meant to discriminate anyone's lifestyle or choices.

name: 鬼屋
description: A haunted house/mansion/other building is the main setting or one of the important settings in this game.

name: 坏结局
description: The game has at least one bad ending. The nature and the number of the bad ending(s) can vary.

name: 密码系统
description:
This game doesn't use the conventional method of saving the game to keep a record of your progress. Instead it gives you passwords to keep.

Check related [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Password_%28video_games%29]Wikipedia[/url] article for details.

name: 开发特点
description:
This meta-tag is designed to house all tags about how a games engine works, how the game presents its contents and how does it play.

Check the related [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Style_%28fiction%29]Wikipedia[/url] article for details.

name: 设计
description: This meta-tag is designed to house tags about how a games system works. Such as how it saves progress, how many players it allows and similar.

name: 回忆倒叙
description:
This game has some [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Flashback_%28narrative%29]flashback[/url] scenes.

Flashback is an interjected scene that takes the narrative back in time from the current point the story has reached. 

Flashbacks are often used to recount events that happened before the story’s primary sequence of events or to fill in crucial backstory. A character origin flashback shows key events early in a character's development.

name: 马尾女主角
description: This game has a heroine with a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Ponytail]ponytail[/url].

name: 假日季
alias:
Christmas Season
New Year Celebration
X-Mas
description: [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Christmas]Christmas[/url] and/or [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/New_Year%27s_Eve]New Year celebration[/url] (and all the related preparations) is an important part of the plot.

name: 补魔（做爱充能）
description: Somehow, energy can be transferred or even created by having sex in this game. Includes Mana, Lifeforce, etc.

name: 元气满满型女主角
description:
This type of heroine is always active, running around, engaging in sportive activities or training all the time for some reason.

This is a personality trait, therefore an energetic heroine doesn't have to be a [url=http://vndb.org/g566]Sports Club Heroine[/url] or an [url=http://vndb.org/g1491]Athlete Heroine[/url] and vice versa.

name: 赛博朋克
description:
Cyberpunk is a science fiction genre noted for its focus on "high tech and low life". The name is a portmanteau of cybernetics and punk and was originally coined by Bruce Bethke as the title of his short story "Cyberpunk", published in 1983. It features advanced science, such as information technology and cybernetics, coupled with a degree of breakdown or radical change in the social order.

Cyberpunk plots often center on a conflict among hackers, artificial intelligences, and megacorporations, and tend to be set in a near-future Earth, rather than the far-future settings or galactic vistas found in novels such as Isaac Asimov's Foundation or Frank Herbert's Dune. The settings are usually post-industrial dystopias but tend to be marked by extraordinary cultural ferment and the use of technology in ways never anticipated by its creators ("the street finds its own uses for things").

[From [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Cyberpunk]Wikipedia[/url]]

name: 大段说明
description:
This game uses long-winded technical explanation that is given all at once to the reader.

Check the related [url=http://tvtropes.org/pmwiki/pmwiki.php/Main/Infodump]TVTropes[/url] entry for details.

name: 完全可避免的NTR
alias:
Only Avoidable Netorare
Only Avoidable NTR
description:
You can see every "proper ending" of the game without experiencing any netorare events. Only such events are reserved for premature bad endings, which you are not forced to read to access the other endings.

The scenes where you can choose not to witness the NTR events, but they still happen behind the scenes, should not be counted as avoidable.

name: 魔法学校
description: A significant portion of the game takes place in a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Magic_School]magical academy[/url] or similar magic education institution.

name: 棒球社团
description: School [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Baseball]baseball[/url] club and the activities related to it takes an important role in this story.

name: 男女多人群交
description:
This visual novel contains group sex scenes, where multiple male and female partners have sex with each other.

For the purpose of the database, the tag uses the binary understanding of genders, and "Male" refers to a cis man, who was assigned male at birth and identifies as such. "Female" refers to a cis woman, who was assigned female at birth and identifies as such.

name: 排尿性爱
alias:
