description: One of the main heroes of the game is a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Knight]knight[/url].

name: 猫耳男主角
description: One of the heroes of the game sports cat-like ears. They can be natural for non-human/demi-human characters or they can just be an accessory.

name: 神明男主角
description: One of the heroes in this visual novel is a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/God]god[/url].

name: 学生社团主席女主角
alias:
High School Club Director Heroine
High School Club President Heroine
Student Club Director Heroine
description: One of the heroines is the director of a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Student_club]student club[/url].

name: 学生社团主席主人公
alias:
Leader of Student Club
Student Club Chairman Protagonist
Student Club Chancellor Protagonist
Student Club Director Protagonist
description: Protagonist of the game is the director of a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Student_club]student club[/url].

name: 兽耳男主角
description:
This game has one or more [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Kemonomimi#Animals]kemonomimi[/url] characters that are appearing in a hero role.

Kemonomimi characters typically appear human except for added animal-like qualities (such as ears or tails).

name: 精神控制
alias:
Brainwashing
Coercive Persuasion
Hypnosis
Hypnotism
Mind Abuse
Thought Control
Thought Reform
description: The game's story features elements of mind control, [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Hypnotism]hypnotism[/url] and [url=https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Brainwashing]brainwashing[/url].

name: 星际战斗
description: This game features battles fought in the space with [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Starship]starships[/url].

name: 可避免的强奸
description:
This game features [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Rape]rape[/url] scenes that can be avoided by making right choices or succeeding in gameplay stages.

The tag has been made unapplicable in favour of its child tags. Please use more specific tags, and in the situations where you are not sure which tag to use (for example, because you haven't finished the game), use the generic [url=/g84]Rape[/url] tag instead.

name: 完全可避免的女主角强奸
description:
You can see every "proper ending" of the game without experiencing any rape scenes of a heroine. Their only rape scenes are reserved for premature bad endings, which you are not forced to read to access the other endings.

Does not apply to non-heroine characters.

name: 天体主人公
alias:
Astronomical Object Protagonist
Comet Protagonist
Planet Protagonist
Star Protagonist
description:
The protagonist is a personification/embodiment of a cosmic object (star, planet, etc.).

See the Wikipedia entry for [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Celestial_body]celestial body[/url] for more details.

name: 酷刑
description:
This game features scenes of [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Torture]torture[/url].

These scenes are not required to be graphically depicted.

Aim of the tag is to mark the presence of scenes of severe pain or suffering, whether physical or mental, being intentionally inflicted on people are present in this game somewhere.

name: 图形风格变更
alias:
Changing Art Styles
Different Visual Styles
description: The [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Style_%28visual_arts%29]graphic style[/url] of the visual novel changes noticeably one or more times during gameplay. This might represent a character's personality change, an altered state of consciousness, a change of location, a flashback, etc.

name: 剧院
description: A significant part of the game is set in a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Theater]theater[/url].

name: 音乐剧剧院
description: A significant part of the game is set in a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Musical_theatre]musical theater[/url].

name: 20年代
description:
This story takes place at a time between years 1920-1929 on Earth.

More details on 20's can be found on the related [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/1920s]Wikipedia[/url] article.

name: 母女血亲乱伦
description: These games contain sexual scenes between a blood-related mother and daughter.

name: 秘书主人公
description: Protagonist in this VN works as a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Secretary]secretary[/url].

name: 农民主人公
description: The protagonist of this game is a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Farmer]farmer[/url].

name: 半恶魔主人公
description: Protagonist of the game is the child of a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Demon]demon[/url] and a human or something similar.

name: 半人类主人公
description:
The protagonist of this game is born from the union of a human and a member of different species.

Examples include [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Half-elves]half-elves[/url], half-demons, [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Demigod]demigods[/url] etc...

Magically or scientifically created combinations count for this tag, but cyborgs etc do not.

name: 神话生物主人公
description: This game's protagonist belongs to the [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Divinity]divinity[/url].

name: 精通剧情套路的主人公
description: Protagonist is [url=http://tvtropes.org/pmwiki/pmwiki.php/Main/GenreSavvy]genre savvy[/url], meaning he compares his situation to that of a movie/book/video game/visual novel hero and draws conclusions from that.

name: 科幻奇幻
description:
This visual novel mixes elements of both science fiction and fantasy (for example magic wielding robots).

[url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Science_Fantasy]Science fantasy[/url] is a mixed genre within speculative fiction drawing elements from both science fiction and fantasy.

name: 谋反
alias:
Revolution
Revolt
Mutiny
Uprising
Coup
Insurrection
description:
[url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Rebellion]Rebellion[/url] against government plays a huge role in this visual novel.

This tag is supposed to be only used only for political rebellions and not to describe a rebellious attitude of characters.

name: 霸主主人公
description: Protagonist is an overlord. He leads an Army of Darkness to conquer the whole known universe (or something similar).

name: 政府
description: [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Government]Government[/url] plays an important part in this story.

name: 骑士主人公
description: The protagonist of this game is a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Knight]knight[/url].

name: 50年代
description:
This story takes place at a time between years 1950-1959 on Earth.

More details on [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/50's]50's[/url] can be found on wikipedia.

name: 电波
description:
Denpa games are a subgenre of horror eroge, popularised by the 1996 Leaf game 'Shizuku' which also lent the genre its name. The typical model is a horror story where the catalyst for the events that occur are based on familiar people acting in unfamiliar, yet seemingly orchestrated ways. Stories where the world seems to have gone mad; and the protagonist is not necessarily an exception. The name comes from the idea that electromagnetic waves (denpa) is causing people to act strangely (although it is rarely anything that mundane).

Description from a [url=http://www.menhelmate.org/2010/04/subarashiki-hibi-furenzoku-sonzai.html]Subarashiki Hibi[/url] review by Asceai.

name: 遮眼发型的女主角
description:
This game has at least one heroine with a hairstyle covering one (or both) of her eyes for a considerable part of the story.

Also used for heroines with their face hidden by shadows in a similar manner.

name: 仙境传说
alias:
Alice in Wonderland
Fushigi no Kuni
description: Large parts of this game are set in the Wonderland of Lewis Carroll's book [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Alice%27s_Adventures_in_Wonderland]Alice's Adventures in Wonderland[/url]. Animals and inanimate objects will usually have voices and personalities, and the characters will very often mirror the famous characters of Carroll's original book and its sequel.

name: 提示角
description:
Bad endings in this game (occasionally also good endings) are followed by a short scene in which characters explain to the player where they went wrong and how they can get a better ending next time.

(At least, that's the intention. In many games the actual advice is somewhere between useless and nonexistent, and the characters crack jokes instead. No-one seems to mind.)

name: 两人共同口交
alias:
Double Blowjob
Double Fellatio
Dual blowjob
Dual Fellatio
Twin Fellatio
description:
The game contains scenes that features a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Blowjob]blowjob[/url] performed by two people together at the same time on a single person.

[url=https://s2.vndb.org/sf/27/130927.jpg]NSFW Example 1[/url]
[url=https://s2.vndb.org/sf/28/130928.jpg]NSFW Example 2[/url]

name: 有翅膀的女主角
description:
This game features one or more heroines with [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Wing]wings[/url]. 

She can be an angel, demon or even ordinary human wearing an accessory, but there are many scenes where she has wings on her back.

name: 受欢迎的主人公
description:
This type of protagonist is popular from the beginning of the game or becomes one shortly after. Opposed to the usual VN protagonist that becomes popular at the end of the game.

Having a few childhood friends, or a group of friends doesn't count.

Check the Wikipedia entry on [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Popularity]popularity[/url] for details.

name: 船长主人公
description:
The protagonist of this story is, or becomes, the [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Captain_%28nautical%29]captain[/url]/commanding officer of a ship/spaceship/submarine.

You can also use this tag for the military rank for the [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Captain_%28naval%29]naval captains[/url], since it's almost the same thing. But do not use it for the military rank for [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Captain_%28land%29]captain (land)[/url] that doesn't have anything to do with ships.

name: 海盗
description: [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Pirate]Pirates[/url] play an important role in this story.

name: 海盗女主角
description: One or more heroines in this story are [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Pirate]pirates[/url].

name: 海盗主人公
description: The protagonist of this story is a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Pirate]pirate[/url].

name: 贫民窟
description: Some part of this story takes place in [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Slums]slums[/url]. Poverty and difficult living conditions are depicted in the story.

name: 成年男主角
description:
One or more of the heroes in this game are [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Adult]adults[/url].

'Adult' is a broadly subjective concept, but in visual novel settings should usually mean any person who is of age and has finished the high school. In fantasy/sci-fi settings where high school is not mandatory or doesn't exist, having an occupation or being of age where having an occupation is expected can be used as an indication of 'adulthood'.

name: 男性恐惧症女主角
description: This game features a heroine suffering from androphobia - an exaggerated or irrational fear of men.

name: 短性爱场景
description: Sexual scenes in this VN are unusually short. Although there can be many CG's per scene and/or many scenes in general but each scene is short and ends very fast.

name: 长性交场景
description: Sexual scenes in this VN are unusually long. Walls of text per scene are expected (multiple ejaculations optional but quite common).

name: 受精怀孕
description:
Stories involving the impregnation of one of the characters. Usually found in the games about the [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Fertilisation]fertilisation[/url] fetish.

Do not use for games that you suddenly see a heroine pregnant without the impregnation taking a role in the story itself. This tag is for the act of impregnation, not pregnancy.

name: 白化病女主角
description: A heroine's appearance in this game resembles to an [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Albino]albino[/url]; she has white hair, and her eyes have unnatural color (like red or almost transparent blue).

name: 主人公死亡(路线或结局)
description:
The protagonist of the game can [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Death]die[/url] in one of the routes or endings.

Do not use if this results in a game over/bad end.

name: 时间流逝
description:
The time frame of the events is substantial and meaningful for the plot. By the end of the story reader should truly feel a significant passage of time in the world. This should mean at least years or even centuries passing and characters or the world changing over time.

This tag is not meant for brief leaps in time or time leaps taking place after the real events in the game's epilogue or such.

name: 以真实人物为基础的女主角
description: At least one of this game's heroines portraits a person from the real world.

name: 关西腔女主角
alias:
Heroine With Kansai Accent
Heroine With Kansai Dialect
Heroine With Osaka Accent
Kansai-Ben Heroine
Osaka-Ben Heroine
description: This heroine's use of a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Kansai_accent]Kansai dialect[/url], most commonly Kyoto or Osaka dialect, makes her stand out. In keeping with Japanese stereotypes about people from this region, she will usually have a brash personality to match.

name: 女祭司女主角
description:
One or more heroines of this game is a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Priest]priestess[/url].

Do not mix with [url=http://vndb.org/g115]Miko Heroine[/url].

name: 做爱时泌乳
description: A character's breasts produce milk during the act of sex.

name: 史莱姆强奸
description: This game contains one or more scenes of rape with amorphous/gelatinous monster.

name: 与怪物做爱
description: This game features sex scenes involving non-human, non-animal fictional creatures.

name: 合意史莱姆性交
description: This game features consensual sex involving a amorphous/gelatinous monster.

name: Former All-girls School
description: The game is set in a former all-girls school, where the boy-girl ratio is very low, and protagonist might be the only boy in all-girls class.

name: 内置流程图
description: This game has built-in [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Walkthrough#Video_games]walkthrough[/url]/flowchart, which can be accessed through in-game menus.

name: 近亲繁殖
description:
These games contain scenes of incest that lead to impregnation.

See [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Inbreeding]inbreeding[/url] on Wikipedia for details.

name: 女仆配角
description: One of the game's support characters is a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Maid]maid[/url].

name: 中世纪奇幻
description:
The game is set in a place based on or borrowing aspects from the Middle Ages, but has distinctly fictional elements such as fictional kingdoms or magic.

These games often feature princesses, knights, castles and magic.

See the related [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Medieval_fantasy]Wikipedia[/url] entry for details.

name: 魔法少女主人公
description: The protagonist of this game is a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Magical_girl]magical girl[/url].

name: 怪物
description: This game has one or multiple [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Monster]monsters[/url] taking an important role in the story. Or it has monsters all around on many scenes with multiple lines of dialogs related to them.

name: 异装癖
description: Some characters in this game are [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Crossdressing]cross-dressing[/url].

name: 拥有幻想朋友的主人公
description: Protagonist in this game has one or more [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Imaginary_friends]imaginary friends[/url].

name: 自杀主人公
description:
During the story protagonist tries to commit a suicide (if he succeeds or not is irrelevant).

Check related [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Suicide_crisis]Wikipedia[/url] article for details.

name: 妖怪女主角
description:
One or more heroines of this game are [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Y%C5%8Dkai]Youkai[/url].

Youkai range eclectically from the malevolent to the mischievous, or occasionally bring good fortune to those who encounter them. Often they possess animal features (such as the Kappa, which is similar to a turtle, or the Tengu which has wings), other times they can appear mostly human, some look like inanimate objects and others have no discernible shape. Youkai usually have a spiritual supernatural power, with shapeshifting being one of the most common. Youkai that have the ability to shapeshift are called obake.

name: 男主角死亡
description:
A hero in this game can [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Death]die[/url] in one of the routes or endings.

Do not use if this results in a game over/bad end, and for games that the death of a hero is 'nothing big' nor a reason for any drama like Rance series.

name: 雪女女主角
description: A heroine in this game is a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Yuki-onna]yuki-onna[/url], the semi-spirit entity which controls ice, cold weather or just can freeze everything.

name: 轮廓剪影
description: In games with this tag a significant portion of character sprites are [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Silhouette]silhouettes[/url].

name: 元(Meta)小说
description:
External attributes of the VN (such as it being a work of fiction, or a computer program, or a 2D representation on a screen, or being influenced by a player, etc.) are themselves relevant to the plot of the VN. This may range from just regularly breaking the fourth wall to more subtle plot constructions.

Check the related [url=http://en.wikipedia.org./wiki/Metafiction]Wikipedia[/url] article for details.

name: 日期显示
description: The game displays the in-story date and/or time on the screen, always or at least regularly. Often this is in the form of a small overlay in a corner of the screen.

name: 船
description: This visual novel has many scenes set on board of a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Ship]sea-ship[/url].

name: 美人鱼女主角
description:
One or more heroines in this game is a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Mermaid]mermaid[/url].

A mermaid is a mythological aquatic creature with a female human head and torso and the tail of a fish. Mermaids have a broad representation in folklore, literature, and popular culture.

name: 童话故事
description:
This game features elements and themes from [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Fairy_tale]fairy tales[/url].

Only a small number of the stories thus designated explicitly refer to fairies. Nonetheless, the stories may be distinguished from other folk narratives such as legends and traditions (which generally involve belief in the veracity of the events described) and explicitly moral tales, including beast fables. Fairy tales typically feature such folkloric characters as fairies, goblins, elves, trolls, giants or gnomes, and usually magic or enchantments.

name: 学生社团主席男主角
alias:
High School Club Director Hero
High School Club President Hero
Student Club Director Hero
description: One of the heroes is the director of a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Student_club]student club[/url].

name: 日本神话
description: Traditional [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Japanese_mythology]Japanese mythology[/url] strongly influences the setting and events in this VN.

name: 凯尔特神话
description: [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Celtic_mythology]Celtic mythology[/url] strongly influences the setting and events in this VN.

name: 佛教神话
description: [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Buddhist_mythology]Buddhist mythology[/url] strongly influences the setting and events in this VN.

name: 日耳曼神话
description: [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Germanic_paganism]Germanic mythology[/url] strongly influences the setting and events in this VN.

name: 精灵
description:
There are [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Elves]elves[/url] in this story.

The [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Elves_in_fantasy_fiction_and_games]fantasy fiction kind of elves[/url], not the fairies.

name: 无法避免的后宫结局
description: In this story, all characters that protagonist had intercourse with will definitely compose his [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Harem]harem[/url] in the end.

name: 高量特殊效果
description:
This game uses a lot of [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Special_effects]special effects[/url] to enhance the storytelling, making the game look like it is animated during some scenes.

These games may also use animated scenes and looping animations but these are not related to this tag.

name: 网球
description: The sport of [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Tennis]tennis[/url] plays a major role in this VN.

name: 三重口交
description:
This visual novel contains a scene that features a blowjob being performed by three characters together on a single penis.

[url=https://s2.vndb.org/sf/40/130940.jpg]NSFW Example 1[/url]
[url=https://s2.vndb.org/sf/41/130941.jpg]NSFW Example 2[/url]

name: 艺术家男主角
description: One of this games hero is an [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Artist]artist[/url].

name: 音乐家男主角
description: One of the heroes of this game is a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Musician]musician[/url].

name: 大量选项
alias:
High Amount of Choices
Many Choices
description: Game contains a high amount of choices.  In many cases, you won't be able to play for more than five minutes without seeing a new choice.

name: 阉割
description: Game contains scenes of [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Castration]castration[/url].  This can be either story-related or for fetish reasons.

name: 歌手男主角
description: One or more heroes in this game are [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Vocalist]vocalists[/url].

name: 军人男主角
description: At least one hero of these games is (or was) a professional [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Soldier]soldier[/url].

name: AI男主角
description: One ore more of the heroes is an [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Artificial_intelligence]artificial intelligence[/url].

name: AI主人公
description: The protagonist is an [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Artificial_intelligence]artificial intelligence[/url].

name: 工程师女主角
description: One or more heroines is an [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Engineer]engineer[/url].

name: 痴汉女主角
description: One or more heroines of the game bearing this tag is a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Frotteurism]frotteur[/url].

name: 天文社团
description: [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Astronomy]Astronomy[/url] club and the activities related to it takes an important role in this story.

name: 戴眼镜男主角
description: There is a hero who wears [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Glasses]glasses[/url].

name: 极度（不）幸运的主人公
description: The protagonist is extremely [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Luck]lucky[/url], extremely unlucky, or possibly both at the same time.

name: 校长女主角
alias:
Headmistress heroine
Head teacher heroine
Headteacher heroine
School principal heroine
description:
One of the heroines is the most senior teacher and the leader of a school.

See related Wikipedia entries [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Principal_%28school%29]1[/url] & [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Principal_%28academia%29]2[/url].

name: 私家侦探男主角
alias:
Gumshoe Hero
Private Dick Hero
Private Eye Hero
Private Investigator Hero
description: One of the heroes is a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Private_detective]private detective[/url].

name: 离异女主角
description:
The game with this tag has at least one heroine who's [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Divorce]divorced from a past marriage[/url]. Not to be confused with [url=http://vndb.org/g549]Widow heroine[/url] though.
It also applies if she's divorced from the protagonist himself, like in [url=http://vndb.org/v415]Sekai de Ichiban Dame na Koi[/url]'s case.

name: 附体
description: A [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Demonic_possession]demonic possession[/url] or a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Spirit_possession]spirit possession[/url] is portrayed in this visual novel.

name: 魅魔
description: This game features [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Succubi]succubi[/url].

name: 贵族主人公
description: The protagonist of this VN is from a noble family, a member of [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Nobility]nobility[/url].

name: 人鱼主人公
description: The protagonist in this VN is of a sea dwelling race, a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Merperson_%28disambiguation%29]merperson[/url].

name: 魅魔配角
description: This game features [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Incubi]incubi[/url].

name: 女扮男装主人公
description:
The protagonist of this visual novel is a girl whose physical features make her look like a boy to the point that she could be mistaken for one.
[url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Cross_dressing]Cross-dressing[/url] is not required while often being the source of the confusion.

name: 初中
description: Some part of the game takes place in a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Junior_High_School]middle school[/url].

name: 宗教女主角
description: A heroine in this VN is a devoted believer of a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Religion]religion[/url] and she keeps talking about it frequently.

name: 声优女主角
alias:
Seiyu Heroine
Seiyû Heroine
Seiyū Heroine
Voice Actress Heroine
description: One of this games heroines is an [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Seiyuu]seiyuu[/url].

name: 旅程
description:
These games are, for the most part, about a journey.

It may be about a road trip, a travel with friends and family. ([url=/g286]Road Trip[/url])

Or an epic journey like [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Odyssey]Odyssey[/url], something about a ring and a volcano, a voyage across the stars or maybe even dimensions. ([url=/g363]Odyssey[/url])

Or it may be about a journey not fitting to either of these two, like a voyage from Beijing to Berlin, in that case use this tag itself.

name: 近亲繁殖的主人公
description:
The protagonist's parents were closely related to each other, genetically.

Check the related [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Inbred]Wikipedia[/url] page for details.

name: 笨蛋反派角色
description: One of the villain of the game is an [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Idiot]idiot[/url]. Usually serves as a comedy factor.

name: 有呆毛的女主角
alias:
Ahoge Heroine
アホげ
アホ毛
description:
A game tagged with this tag has at least one heroine, who for the majority of the game possesses an [url=http://animanga.wikia.com/wiki/Ahoge]ahoge[/url]. Ahoge refers to a single, often large, lock of hair sticking out from the top of the head.
Prime examples would include Saber from Fate/Stay Night, or Sumika from the Muv-Luv saga.

name: 疯狂科学家配角
description: One of the support characters in the game is a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Mad_scientist]mad scientist[/url].

name: 复活
description: Stories involving [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Resurrection]resurrection[/url].

name: 同人小说
description:
The story is set in a world already created by some other author. Majority of those works are free dojin novels.

Check the related [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Fan-fiction]Wikipedia[/url] article for details.

Unofficial faithful adaptations should use [url=/g3740]Adaptation[/url] or its child tags instead.

name: 呆毛主人公
description: A game tagged with this tag has a protagonist, who for the majority of the game possesses an [url=http://animanga.wikia.com/wiki/Ahoge]ahoge[/url]. Ahoge refers to a single, often large, lock of hair sticking out from the top of the head.

name: 开放式结局
description:
The story of this game does not have clear cut, conclusive and definitive ending(s). There will be many questions unanswered and outcome of certain events will never be explained.

Severity of the mystery may change from a few details unexplained to stories which leave you wondering where the next chapter is.

This type of story-telling leaves the answer to those questions and outcome of the story to the imagination of the readers.

Only use on games with an ending that is open to interpretation.

name: 呆毛男主角
description: A game tagged with this tag has a hero who for the majority of the game possesses an ahoge. Ahoge refers to a single, often large, lock of hair sticking out from the top of the head.

name: 有呆毛的配角
description: A game tagged with this tag has a side character who for the majority of the game possesses an ahoge. Ahoge refers to a single, often large, lock of hair sticking out from the top of the head.

name: 秃顶男主角
description: A Hero of this game is [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Bald]bald[/url].

name: 秃顶的主人公
description: The protagonist of this game is [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Bald]bald[/url].

name: 秃头女主角
description: A heroine of this game is [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Bald]bald[/url].

name: 进气口发型的女主角
alias:
Hood Scoop Hair Heroine
インテーク (髪型)
description:
Heroines featuring the distinctive '[url=https://tvtropes.org/pmwiki/pmwiki.php/Main/HairIntakes]intake[/url]' hairstyle, where the rising forelock (usually divided in the middle) makes the hair look like an hood scoop.

Prime examples can be found in [url=http://vndb.org/v4]Clannad[/url]'s Kyou as well as in the cast of [url=http://vndb.org/v92]Muv Luv Alternative[/url].

name: 渐变色发色的女主角
description: This game features a heroine whose hair is rendered in a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Color_gradient]color gradient[/url] for stylistic purposes.

name: 女主角的发型
description: This is a meta tag to gather all tags regarding the hair (generally the hairstyle) of heroines.

name: 女主角的身体
description: This is a meta tag to gather all tags regarding the body type, proportions and skin colors of heroines.

name: 教师男主角
description: One of the heroes in this game has a profession of a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Teacher]teacher[/url].

name: 克隆男主角
description: A hero of this game is a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Cloning]clone[/url].

name: 克隆
description:
This story features [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Cloning]cloning[/url].

Cloning in biology is the process of producing similar populations of genetically identical individuals that occurs in nature when organisms such as bacteria, insects or plants reproduce asexually.

name: 单相思
description: Considerable part of this story features an [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Unrequited_love]unrequited love[/url], a love that is not reciprocated or returned in kind.

name: 运动短裤女主角
description:
This game has considerable amount of scenes where one can see girls with [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Bloomers_%28clothing%29#Bloomers_in_Japan] sport bloomers[/url].

Bloomers are a type of girl's gym shorts in Japan.

Please do NOT use this tag for the classic (as in mid-19th century to early 20th century) bloomers. Use the [url=http://vndb.org/g1751]Heroine with Traditional Bloomers[/url] tag instead.

name: 腿间性行为
alias:
Interfemoral Sex
Sumata
Thighs Sex
素股
description: The game contains at least one scene that features [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Intercrural_sex]intercrural sex[/url].

name: 胖胖的主人公
description: A protagonist that is noticeably [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Overweight]overweight[/url].

name: 游戏玩家主人公
description: Protagonist is an avid player of video games, a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Gamer]gamer[/url].

name: 游戏玩家男主角
description: One or more heroes of this game are avid players of video games, [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Gamer]gamers[/url].

name: 多重插入
description:
This game has one or more sexual scenes featuring [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Double_penetration#Multiple_penetration]multiple penetration[/url].

Multiple penetration refers to one person being sexually penetrated several times simultaneously.

name: 精液沐浴
description:
This game features one or more scenes featuring [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Bukkake]bukakke[/url].

Bukkake refers to scenes featuring a person being ejaculated on by several men, or in some cases a single man over and over. Main point is for the recipients body to be covered with it.

name: 肛门口交
description:
This game features one or more scenes featuring [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Anilingus]anilingus[/url].

Anal–oral sex, also referred to or described as anal–oral contact or anilingus (from anus + lingus (Latin Lingere: to lick, less commonly spelled analingus), is a form of oral sex involving contact between the anus or perineum of one person and the mouth (lips) or tongue of another.

name: 自慰
description:
The game contains at least one scene that features [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Masturbation]masturbation[/url].

Masturbation refers to sexual stimulation of a person's genitals, usually to the point of orgasm.

name: 臀交
description:
The buttjob is a sexual act where the penis is thrust several times between a woman's buttocks.

It is similar to boobjob and does not include any anal or vaginal penetration by itself.

name: 乳房扩张
alias:
Boobs Enlargement
Breast Enlargement
Breast Implants
description:
This game features a heroine that gets her breast size increased in a very short period of time. This can be the result of a realistic medical procedure like [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Breast_implant]breast implants[/url], or of fantasy origin like some super drugs or magic.

If the breasts are expanded to the impossible, grotesque size, use [url=/g1561]Grotesque Body Modification[/url] instead.

In case the breast expansion has been performed through a somewhat realistic medical procedure, use the tag together with [url=/g3931]Cosmetic Surgery[/url].

name: 非插入式做爱
alias:
Dry humping
Dry sex
Frottage
Heavy petting
Outercourse
Sexual petting
description:
The game contains at least one scene that features [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Non-penetrative_sex]Non-penetrative sex[/url].

Non-penetrative sex is sexual activity without vaginal, anal, or oral penetration, as opposed to penetrative aspects of intercourse, anal sex, or oral sex.

name: 磨豆腐
description:
This game features one or more scenes of [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Tribadism]tribadism[/url].

Tribadism is a form of non-penetrative sex in which a woman rubs her vulva against her partner's body for sexual stimulation. This may involve female-to-female genital contact or a female rubbing her vulva against her partner's thigh, arm, palm or stomach, and does not always reflect a scissoring motion.

name: 恶棍女主角
description:
One or more heroines in this game is [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Villainous]villainous[/url], or simply is an "evil" character of the story.

Starting bad or going bad later, then becoming good again etc. doesn't matter as long as the villainous part takes an important role in the story.

Examples include [url=http://vndb.org/v1494]Miss Leet[/url].

name: 雇佣兵主人公
description:
The protagonist of the game is (or was) a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Mercenary]mercenary[/url].

A mercenary is a person who takes part in an armed conflict, who is not a national or a party to the conflict, and is "motivated to take part in the hostilities essentially by the desire for private gain and, in fact, is promised, by or on behalf of a party to the conflict, material compensation substantially in excess of that promised or paid to combatants of similar ranks and functions in the armed forces of that Party".

name: 雇佣兵女主角
description:
At least one heroine of these games is (or was) a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Mercenary]mercenary[/url].

A mercenary is a person who takes part in an armed conflict, who is not a national or a party to the conflict, and is "motivated to take part in the hostilities essentially by the desire for private gain and, in fact, is promised, by or on behalf of a party to the conflict, material compensation substantially in excess of that promised or paid to combatants of similar ranks and functions in the armed forces of that Party".

name: 修女配角
description: One of the side characters in the game is a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Nun]nun[/url].

name: 无背景音乐
description: These visual novels have no background music, and might not have any sound at all.

name: 声音和音乐
description:
All tags related to the audible presentation goes under this meta-tag.

Check the related [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Game_music]Wikipedia[/url] article for details.

name: 故事情节
description: Tags concerning how the story is presented to the reader are collected here. This meta-tag is not about the story, but what kinds of methods and tools are used to present it.

name: 显示
description: This meta-tag is to cover the tags concerning the various displays games use.

name: 贫穷的主人公
description: Protagonist of this game is poor. He (or she) is either working to earn a living or suffering from [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Poverty]poverty[/url].

name: 只有坏结局
description:
This game has only bad endings. The type of the game may vary, but when you reach to the end of the story, it won't end with a happy ending, no matter what you try.
This tag is not suitable to vns with bittersweet endings.

name: 吸血鬼男主角
description: One of the heroes of the VN is a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Vampire]vampire[/url].

name: 双胞胎兄弟作为男主角
alias:
Hero Twin Brothers
Twin Brother Heroes
Twin Heroes
description: This game has heroes that are [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Twins]twins[/url].

name: BDSM
description:
This game features one or more scenes featuring [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/BDSM]BDSM[/url].

BDSM is a type of roleplay or lifestyle choice between two or more individuals who use their experiences of pain and power to create sexual tension, pleasure, and release. The compound acronym, BDSM, is derived from the terms bondage and discipline (B&D, B/D, or BD), dominance and submission (D&s, D/s, or Ds), sadism and masochism (S&M, S/M, or SM).

name: 贵族男主角
description: One or more heroes of this VN is from a noble family, a member of [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Nobility]nobility[/url].

name: 刺客男主角
alias:
Hitman Hero
Killer-for-hire Hero
Trained Killer Hero
description: A hero of this game is (or was) an [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Assassin]assassin[/url].

name: 法师男主角
alias:
Magus Hero
Sorcerer Hero
Wizard Hero
Battlemage Hero
Magician Hero
Spellcaster Hero
description:
These games have at least one hero who is a mage.

Mages are people who use or practice magic derived from supernatural or occult sources.

name: 病娇男主角
description:
One or more of the heroes in this game displays [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Yandere#Y]yandere[/url] behavior.

Yandere is a Japanese term for a person who is initially very loving and gentle to someone before their devotion becomes destructive in nature, often through violence.

name: 带有性场景的游戏玩法
description:
The sexual scenes in this game features a gameplay of sorts.

It can either be in the form of a lot of choices made during these scenes with different paths and results. Or it may give players the ability to interact with the participants of these scenes by using mouse and keyboard to touch, drag and drop objects and such.

name: 魔王男主角
alias:
Demon King Hero
Demon Lord Hero
Maoh Hero
description:
A hero of this game is a Maou, a demon king (or king of devils etc).

He might've just escaped from being sealed for centuries and aiming to regain his former power (and enslave those who thwarted him the last time), just finally decided on taking over the world... or he might be a Maou who loves small animals and nature in general, hates mankind because they pollute it, and who ends up living together with a group of humans to see if they're really that bad.

Do note that this tag is only intended for actual demon kings,  and not for characters bearing Maou as a title or a nick. The character needs to have fantastic, [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Demonic]demonic[/url] properties.

name: 傲娇男主角
description:
This game features one or more heroes that display [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Tsundere]tsundere[/url] behavior.

Tsundere is a Japanese character development process which describes a person who is initially cold and even hostile towards another person before gradually showing their warm side over time.

name: 邪恶的男主角
description:
One or more heroes in this game is [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Villainous]villainous[/url], or simply is an "evil" character of the story.

Starting bad or going bad later, then becoming good again etc. doesn't matter as long as the villainous part takes an important role in the story.

name: 男主角的个性
description: This meta-tag is to gather heroine traits related to their personalities.

name: 没有方向感的女主角
description: One (or more) of the game's heroines has no sense of direction.

name: 基于真实人物的主人公
description: The protagonist of this game portraits a person from the real world.

name: 神圣宝藏
alias:
Holy Artifact
Holy Treasure
Sacred Artifact
description: Some kind of sacred treasure or treasures (Holy Grail, holy sword, etc.) take an important role in the story.

name: 双持剑
description: Games that have people using two swords at the same time.

name: 运动员男主角
description:
These games have at least one hero who plays sports often, either amateur or professionally.

Check the related [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Sportsperson]Wikipedia[/url] article for details.

name: 主人公的姑姑作为女主角
description: One of the heroines of the visual novel is protagonis's [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Aunt]aunt[/url].

name: 作家女主角
description:
One of the heroines in this story is a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Writer]writer[/url], be it of fiction, magazine articles, or whatever else.

Can also be used for newspaper reporters who write articles as well.

name: 狼人男主角
alias:
Garou Hero
Lycanthrope Hero
Wolfman Hero
description:
One or more of the heroes is a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Werewolf]werewolf[/url].

A werewolf, also known as a lycanthrope, is a mythological or folkloric human with the ability to shapeshift into an anthropomorphic wolf-like creature, either purposely, by being bitten by another werewolf, or after being placed under a curse.

name: 钩铳战斗
description: This game features combat scenes involving the use of an [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Arquebus]arquebus[/url].

name: 裸体围裙女主角
description: This game features scenes where one or more of the game's heroines appear wearing an [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Apron]apron[/url] and nothing else.

name: 旗袍女主角
alias:
Heroine with Cheongsam
Heroine with Mandarin Gown
Heroine with Qipao
Heroine with Qípáo
description:
One or multiple heroines in the game wears a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Qipao]Cheongsam[/url].

The cheongsam is a body-hugging (modified in Shanghai) one-piece Chinese dress for women; the male version is the changshan. It is known in Mandarin Chinese as the qípáo.

name: 狼人主人公
alias:
Garou Protagonist
Lycanthrope Protagonist
Wolfman Protagonist
description:
The protagonist of this game is a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Werewolf]werewolf[/url].

A werewolf, also known as a lycanthrope, is a mythological or folkloric human with the ability to shapeshift into an anthropomorphic wolf-like creature, either purposely, by being bitten by another werewolf, or after being placed under a curse.

name: 主人公的老板作为女主角
description: At least one of the heroines in this game is the protagonist's [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Boss]boss[/url]. The protagonist takes orders (in)directly from that heroine.

name: 衣物开启/关闭
description:
In these games, the player is allowed a choice to let the participants to keep their clothing on or to have them get naked, during most of the sexual scenes. This means that there are two variations to every CG for these scenes to collect.

Note not to confuse with [url=/g2422]Nude Filter[/url], which is a gag option to remove the clothes from the character sprites at any given time.

name: 返婴癖
alias:
Adult Baby
Diaper Lover
Teen Baby
description:
Features scenes where characters enact in [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Paraphilic_infantilism]paraphilic infantilism[/url].

Paraphilic infantilism is a sexual fetish for some that involves role-playing a regression to an infant-like state. Behaviors may include drinking from a baby bottle or wearing diapers.

name: 现代美利坚合众国
alias:
Modern Day America
Modern Day USA
description:
Large parts of this game take place in modern day [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/United_States_of_America]United States of America[/url].
Note: "Modern day" refers to an unspecified time period between the late 20th century and today.

name: 塔防游戏
description: This game features a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Tower_defense]Tower Defense[/url] gameplay element.  This involves placing units and/or structures on a map in order to defeat waves of enemies.

name: 兽耳主人公
alias:
Inumimi Protagonist
Nekomimi Protagonist
Protagonist with Animal Ears
description:
The protagonist of this game has [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Kemonomimi#Animals]kemonomimi[/url].

Kemonomimi characters typically appear human except for added animal-like qualities (such as ears or tails).

name: 宗教男主角
description: A hero in this VN is a devoted believer of a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Religion]religion[/url] and he keeps talking about it frequently.

name: 科学家男主角
description: A hero in this game is a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Scientist]scientist[/url]. He can be working in a scientific field, holding a position in a university, research center or scientific laboratory.

name: 犬耳女主角
description:
For games featuring heroines with doglike ears or anything that would remind it as their signature part or appearance, such as a hairband with dog ears or her hair being shaped exactly like one.

Please do not mix with doggirl tag; almost every doggirl has inumimi, but not every inumimi is a doggirl... And doggirl is a child tag of Non-human Heroine, so it's not suitable for human girls with inumimi.

name: 哲学
description:
This game features [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Philosophy]philosophical[/url] themes and/or lengthy philosophical discussions.

Philosophy is the study of general and fundamental problems, such as those connected with existence, knowledge, values, reason, mind, and language.

name: 设计故事
description:
These games revolve around a group of characters working to [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Design]design[/url] something or such an act takes a huge part in the story.

They may be working to design (create) doujin comics, games and such or may be employed in a company that works in such a field.

Do not use for games about music and food related projects, since there are already tags for those.

name: 销售员主人公
alias:
Bagman Protagonist
Commercial Traveler Protagonist
Roadman Protagonist
description: The protagonist of this game is a [url=http://www.urbandictionary.com/define.php?term=salesman]salesman[/url].

name: 主人公的嫂子作为女主角
alias:
Aniyome Heroine
Gimai Heroine
Gishi Heroine
Protagonist's Brother's Wife as a Heroine
Protagonist's Wife's Sister as a Heroine
description:
One or more of the heroines is the protagonist's [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Sister-in-law]sister-in-law[/url].
Sister-in-law refers to the sister of protagonist's wife, or the wife of protagonist's brother.
In rare instances it may also define the relationship between people who marry siblings and refer to the wife of protagonist's spouse's sibling.

name: 主人公的女儿作为女主角
description: One of this games heroines is protagonist's [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Daughter]daughter[/url].

name: 主人公的血亲女儿作为女主角
description: One of this games heroines is protagonist's blood-related daughter.

name: 主人公的非血亲女儿作为女主角
description: One of this games heroines is protagonist's non-blood-related daughter.

name: 外星人主人公
description:
The protagonist of this game is of [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Extraterrestrial_life]extraterrestrial[/url] origin.

Extraterrestrial life is defined as life that does not originate from Earth. Also referred to as alien life, or simply aliens, these hypothetical forms of life range from simple bacteria-like organisms to sapient beings far more advanced than humans.

name: 单一存档槽
description:
These games allow you to make only one [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Game_save]save[/url]. When you decide to save your game progress, you have to overwrite the single save you have, which makes visiting the early points of the game and exploring impossible.

You are permitted to use the tag on the games that allow you to create different user profiles.

name: 包办婚姻
description:
The game with this tag contain events involving at least one character whose marriage is arranged by someone other than the couple getting wedded.

See the related [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Arranged_marriage]Wikipedia[/url] entry for more information.

name: 浪人主人公
description:
Protagonist of the game is a rounin.

In Japan, a rounin is a student who has graduated from middle school or high school but has failed to enter a school at the next level, and consequently is studying outside of the school system for entrance in a future year.

[From [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/R%C5%8Dnin_%28student%29]Wikipedia[/url]]

Though the term is based on ancient [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Samurai]samurai[/url], do not use it for games featuring a masterless-samurai. Use [url=http://vndb.org/g1180]Samurai Protagonist[/url] on those instead.

name: 混血日本人主人公
description: Protagonist is [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Hafu]half-Japanese[/url].

name: 日本混血女主角
description: One of the heroines is [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Hafu]half-Japanese[/url].

name: 蔷薇向
description:
Bara (薔薇, "rose"), also known as the wasei-eigo construction "Mens' Love" (メンズラブ) or ML, is a Japanese jargon term for a genre of art and fictional media that focuses on male same-sex love and desire, usually created by and for gay men.
Bara can vary in visual style and plot, but typically features masculine men with varying degrees of muscle, body fat, and body hair, akin to beefcakes, or bears (熊) in gay culture. 
Western commentators sometimes refer to bara as "yaoi", but yaoi is largely created by and for women and features idealized bishounen who conform to the heteronormative formula of the dominant and masculine seme pursuing the submissive and effeminate uke.

See more info at [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Bara_%28genre%29]Wikipedia[/url].

name: 雨
description:
This visual novel has many scenes featuring [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Rain]rain[/url].

Could be so called rain drama effect, in that when there's something dramatic/sad happening, the sky has bad habit of starting to rain in cases like these to boost the overall effectiveness of scene.

name: 大会
description:
A major part of the plot in this VN involves the characters attending some sort of [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Convention_%28meeting%29]convention[/url].

A convention, in the sense of a meeting, is a gathering of individuals who meet at an arranged place and time in order to discuss or engage in some common interest.

name: 社会崩溃
description:
This VN involves a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Societal_collapse]societal collapse[/url].

Societal collapse broadly includes both quite abrupt societal failures typified by collapses (such as that of the Mayan Civilization), as well as more extended grinding declines of superpowers (like the Roman empire in Western Europe and the Han Dynasty in East Asia).

name: 按国籍和民族划分的女主角
description:
These are the tags concerning heroine's, or her parents' origins.

A heroine's [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Ethnicity]ethnicity[/url] and [url=https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Nationality]nationality[/url] are used as flavors to detail characters in stories and not in any other negative sense such as [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Discrimination]discrimination[/url]; though they are almost always [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Stereotypical]stereotypical[/url].

Use these tags for characters regardless of racial and ethnic combinations. And don't make any Half-Japanese and Quarter-American tags. Those will be covered by new functions later.

name: 不同国籍和族裔的主人公
description:
These are the tags concerning protagonist's, or their parents' origins.

A protagonist's [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Ethnicity]ethnicity[/url] and [url=https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Nationality]nationality[/url] are used as flavors to detail characters in stories and not in any other negative sense such as [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Discrimination]discrimination[/url]; though they are almost always [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Stereotypical]stereotypical[/url].

Use these tags for characters regardless of racial and ethnic combinations. And don't make any Half-Japanese and Quarter-American tags. Those will be covered by new functions later.

name: 武士主人公
description:
The protagonist of this VN is, or was a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Samurai]samurai[/url].

Do not use this tag for games featuring characters acting in the way of [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Bushid%C5%8D]Bushidou[/url] but not carrying an official title.

name: 只有GoodEnd
alias:
Good Endings Only
No Bad Endings
description: The game features only good endings, there are no bad endings or game overs in it.

name: 大量坏结局
alias:
A Lot Of Bad Endings
Many Bad Endings
description: These games have a ton of bad endings and almost every choice can lead you to them.

name: 樱花
description: These games features many scenes with [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Sakura]cherry blossoms, aka. sakura.

name: 高中生主人公
description: These VN's protagonist is a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/High_school]high school[/url] student.

name: 大学生主人公
description: The protagonist is a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/University]university[/url] student

name: 扶她主人公
description: These games have a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Futanari]futanari[/url] protagonist.

name: 变形（可控制）
description: These games feature characters that can transform into other forms including animals, objects, etc.

name: 兄弟乱伦
description: These games contain sexual scenes between two (or more) brothers. They may or may not be blood-related.

name: 舔穴
description: These visual novels have at least one scene of [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Cunnilingus]cunnilingus[/url] (oral stimulation of the female genitals).

name: 女仆主人公
description:
Protagonist is a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Maid]maid[/url].

A maidservant or in current usage housemaid or maid is a female employed in domestic service.

name: 大镰刀战斗
description: These games have battles with [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Scythe]scythes[/url].

name: 东方Project
description: These games are set in the same universe as the [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Touhou]Touhou[/url] games, or feature characters from those.

name: 命运
description:
The concept of [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Destiny]destiny (fate)[/url] plays an important role in these games.

Destiny refers to a predetermined course of events. It may be conceived as a predetermined future, whether in general or of an individual. It is a concept based on the belief that there is a fixed natural order to the cosmos.

Important point is to use this tag to mark the games that mention destiny (fate) specifically and not use it on every game where an 'event' seems inevitable.

Example: Do not use on a game with a terminally ill character that dies somewhere along the story by saying that it was destiny, as long as the concept itself is not mentioned in the script.

name: 白毛女主角
description: This tag is for games where at least one main heroine has [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Human_hair_color#Grey_and_white_hair]white colored hair[/url].

name: 黑皮男主角
description:
This game features a hero with a darker [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Skin_tone]skin tone[/url].

Can also be used for extremely tanned characters.

name: 丑陋的主人公
alias:
Grotesque-looking Protagonist
Repulsive Protagonist
Unattractive Protagonist
description:
The protagonist of this game is [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Ugliness#Ugliness]ugly[/url].

To be ugly is to be aesthetically unattractive, repulsive, or offensive. Like its opposite, beauty, ugliness involves a subjective judgement and is at least partly in the "eye of the beholder."

name: 角色崩坏
description:
One of the themes in this game is [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Corruption]corruption[/url] of its characters. This refers to characters disposition changing from a good, socially accepted one to a more evil, darker one.

This character change should be a notable event in the game.

name: 家庭主妇主人公
alias:
Househusband Type Protagonist
Housewife Type Protagonist
Stay-at-home Dad Type Protagonist
description: This protagonist excels at [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Homemaking]household chores[/url], such as cleaning and cooking and also utilises these skills. Whether he/she learned these skills out of necessity or actually likes to take care of the household is irrelevant as long he/she has the necessary skills and he is actively using them to take care of the household.

name: 宿舍管理员主人公
description: The protagonist of this game is the manager of a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Dormitory]dormitory[/url].

name: 宿舍管理员女主角
description: One of the heroines is the manager of a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Dormitory]dormitory[/url].

name: 赏金猎人主人公
alias:
Bail Enforcement Agent Protagonist
Bail Fugitive Investigator Protagonist
Fugitive Recovery Agent Protagonist
description:
The protagonist is a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Bounty_hunter]bounty hunter[/url].

A bounty hunter captures fugitives for a monetary reward (bounty).

name: 救赎
description:
The theme of [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Redemption_%28theology%29]redemption[/url] has to some degree significant role in overall story. 

Redemption is a religious concept referring to forgiveness or absolution for past sins or errors and protection from damnation, eternal or temporary, generally through sacrifice.

name: 文学改编
alias:
Based on a Book
Based on a Novel
description:
This game is a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Literary_adaptation]literary adaptation[/url], its story is based on an actual book.

Do not mix with [url=http://vndb.org/g1056]fan-fiction[/url], fan fictions are basically side stories that are not found in the original work.

name: 过去的东京
description: The game is set in, or at least has considerable time of its story taking place in past [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Tokyo]Tokyo[/url], or in [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Edo]Edo[/url], Tokyo's former name.

name: 过去地球
description: These are the tags for the games that take place in Earth's Past.

name: 过去日本
description: These games take place in Past [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Japan]Japan[/url].

name: 律师男主角
description: The hero in this game is a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Lawyer]lawyer[/url].

name: 穷变富
description:
This story has elements from the [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Rags_to_riches]rags to riches[/url] literature archetype.

"Rags to riches" refers to any situation in which a person rises from poverty to wealth, or sometimes from obscurity to fame.

name: 学生会成员女主角
alias:
Guild of Students Member Heroine
Student Body Representative Heroine
Student Council Officer Heroine
Student Government Member Heroine
Students' Union Officer Heroine
description:
A heroine is a member of the [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Student_government]student government[/url].

A student government is a student organization present in many colleges, universities and has started to appear in some high schools. In higher education, the student union is often accorded its own building on the campus, dedicated to social and organizational activities of the student body.

name: 学生社团成员女主角
description:
A heroine is a member of a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Student_club]student club[/url].

School clubs are student-based school organizations, consisting of administration-approved organizations functioning with myriads of tasks, varying on the specific purpose of each respective club.

name: 学生社团成员主人公
description:
The protagonist is a member of a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Student_club]student club[/url].

School clubs are student-based school organizations, consisting of administration-approved organizations functioning with myriads of tasks, varying on the specific purpose of each respective club.

name: 学生会成员主人公
alias:
Guild of Students Member Protagonist
Leader of the Student Council Protagonist
Student Body Representative Protagonist
Student Council Officer Protagonist
Student Government Member Protagonist
Students' Union Officer Protagonist
description:
The protagonist is a member of the [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Student_government]student government[/url].

A student government is a student organization present in many colleges, universities and has started to appear in some high schools. In higher education, the student union is often accorded its own building on the campus, dedicated to social and organizational activities of the student body.

name: 学校运动社团
alias:
School Athletics Club
School Sport Club
description:
A [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Sports_club]sports club[/url] associated with a school plays an important part in this story.

A school sports club is a administration-approved student-based school organization focusing on a selected sport.

name: 物体插入
description: These games include at least one scene where a sexual toy or an object (other than a body part) is inserted into an orifice.

name: 过去的中国
description: These games take place in Past [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/China]China[/url].

name: 三国时期
alias:
Romance of the Three Kingdoms
Set in the Three Kingdoms Period
Three Kingdoms Period
description: These games are set in the [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Three_Kingdoms]Three Kingdoms Period[/url] of China or based upon Romance of the Three Kingdoms

name: 吸球
description:
The game contains sexual scenes featuring the act of [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Tea_bag_(sexual_act)]balls sucking[/url], also known as tea bagging.

To tea bag is a slang term for the act of a man placing his scrotum in the mouth of a sexual partner. The practice resembles dipping a tea bag into a cup of tea when it is done in a repeated in-and-out motion.

[url=https://s2.vndb.org/sf/38/130938.jpg]NSFW Example[/url]
[url=https://s2.vndb.org/sf/37/130937.jpg]NSFW Group Sex Example 1[/url]
[url=https://s2.vndb.org/sf/39/130939.jpg]NSFW Group Sex Example 2[/url]

name: 女儿型女主角
description:
These games have at least one Musume-type heroine.

These characters have no relation to the protagonist, like a blood-related-daughter or step-daughter, but they insist calling the protagonist as "father", "papa", "mom", etc.  and acting like his/her daughter.

For actual father/mother-daughter connections please use the daughter heroine tag.

name: 可见内衣的男主角
description: This game has considerable amount of scenes where one can see hero's underwear, excluding the sexual scenes.

name: 可命名女主角
description: These games have one or more heroines whose names can be changed.

name: 和服女主角
description: These VNs have one or more heroines who wear a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Kimono]kimono[/url] most of the time.

name: 推特
description: Games with this tag include a feature to send data and comments to [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Twitter]Twitter[/url] directly from the game.

name: 根据真实事件改编
description: In these visual novels, the characters may be fictional but the plot is based on real-life events.

name: 扑克游戏
description:
This game features [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Poker]poker[/url].

Poker is a family of card games that share betting rules and usually (but not always) hand rankings. Poker games differ in how the cards are dealt, how hands may be formed, whether the high or low hand wins the pot in a showdown (in some games, the pot is split between the high and low hands), limits on bet sizes, and how many rounds of betting are allowed.

name: 可解锁的选项
description: The game has one or more choices that are unlocked after fulfilling a certain condition. The locked choice might be visible but non-selectable, or it might appear out of thin air.

name: 欧洲
description:
Most or all of the story of this game takes place in [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Europe]Europe[/url].

Europe is one of the world's seven continents. Comprising the westernmost peninsula of Eurasia, Europe is generally divided from Asia to its east by the water divide of the Ural Mountains, the Ural River, the Caspian Sea, the Caucasus region (specification of borders) and the Black Sea to the southeast.

Europe is bordered by the Arctic Ocean and other bodies of water to the north, the Atlantic Ocean to the west, the Mediterranean Sea to the south, and the Black Sea and connected waterways to the southeast.

name: 记忆改变
description:
The modification, loss, and gaining of memories by a character that is of plot significance, through means that are not natural. For example: falling down stairs and receiving brain trauma could be considered natural in this context, whereas falling down stairs into another dimension and passing/gaining inter-dimensional memories would not.

Memories do not necessarily need to be genuine, the only requirement apart from the natural cause is that after the memory modification event (be it via reality warps, a machine, magic powers or otherwise) the "new" set of memories are different from the "old" set of memories, even if only slight.

May sometimes overlap with amnesia depending on the circumstances.

name: 拳击
description:
This game features [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Boxing]boxing[/url].

Boxing is a combat sport in which two people fight each other using their fists for competition.

Boxing is typically supervised by a referee engaged in during a series of one- to three-minute intervals called rounds, and boxers generally of similar weight.

There are four ways to win; if the opponent is knocked out and unable to get up before the referee counts to ten seconds (a knockout, or KO) or if the opponent is deemed too injured to continue (a Technical Knockout, or TKO), if an opponent is disqualified for breaking a rule, or if there is no stoppage of the fight before an agreed number of rounds, a winner is determined either by the referee's decision or by judges' scorecards.

name: 具有主题的后宫结局
description:
The harem of this game only contains heroes/heroines fitting a particular theme or fetish.

Examples: All-trap harems, all-tsundere harem, all-maid harem.

name: 幽灵男主角
description:
A hero in this game is a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Ghost]ghost[/url].

In traditional belief, a ghost is the soul or spirit of a deceased person or animal that can appear, in visible form or other manifestation, to the living. Descriptions of the apparition of ghosts vary widely: The mode of manifestation can range from an invisible presence to translucent or wispy shapes, to realistic, life-like visions.

name: 皇后女主角
description:
One of the heroines in this game is a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Queen]queen[/url].

A queen regnant is a female monarch of equivalent power to a male king.

A queen consort is the wife of a reigning king without equal power.

A queen dowager is a former queen consort whose husband has died

And a queen mother is either a queen dowager, or a queen regnant who has abdicated, whose son or daughter has become the monarch.

name: 包皮环的主人公
alias:
Houkei
ほうけい
包茎
description: The protagonist of the game tagged with this tag is afflicted with the condition known as [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Phimosis]Phimosis[/url], whereas the foreskin of his (or her) penis cannot be fully retracted from the head.

name: 画家主人公
description: Protagonist is a creative artist in the medium of [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Painting]painting[/url].

name: 假阴茎肛交
alias:
Female to Male Penetration
Straight stap-on sex
description:
This game features scenes involving [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Pegging_%28sexual_practice%29]pegging[/url].

Pegging is a sexual practice in which a woman penetrates a man's anus with a strap-on dildo.

name: 内置百科全书
alias:
Built-in Glossary
Built-in Tips
Dictionary
In-game Dictionary
description: This game has built-in encyclopedia/glossary/tips, which can be accessed through in-game menus. Usually it explains in-game terms. The most notable cases (Umineko, Fate/Stay Night) can include pictures (i.e. characters data) and other additional info.

name: 性别转换性交
description:
This tag is intended to be used in games featuring characters who have sexual intercourse scenes while not in their original sex.

This usually happens after a character is transformed through magical, high-tec or mundane medical means from male into female or vice versa. For the tag to apply, the transformation must be complete.

name: Vocaloid
description: These games feature characters that are from the [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Vocaloid]Vocaloid[/url] software series.

name: 一女多男自愿群交
description:
This visual novel contains group sex scenes, where multiple male partners have sex with a single female.

Both the female and male participants need to be willing, though enjoying the situation and its results isn't necessary. Personality changes like turning into a willing sex slave by excessive rape, hypnotism, aphrodisiacs, etc. don't count.

For the purpose of the database, the tag uses the binary understanding of genders, and "Male" refers to a cis man, who was assigned male at birth and identifies as such. "Female" refers to a cis woman, who was assigned female at birth and identifies as such.

name: 主人公的对手作为女主角
alias:
Protagonist's Adversary as a Heroine
Protagonist's Challenger as a Heroine
description:
This game has one or more heroines who compete or fight against the protagonist. This could be in the form of a contest, game, or argument.

This should not be confused with [url=/g275]Protagonist's Rival as a Heroine[/url] tag, since Rivalry refers to long lasting engagement in competitive relationship, while opponents can be people that you only meet once.

name: 多于七个结局
alias:
A lot of endings
Lots and lots of endings
description:
This game has more [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Multiple_endings#Video_games]endings[/url] than usual, at least eight or maybe even more.

All endings including some sort of story bits do count towards this number. Simple screens saying "You are dead" or "Game over" without any story towards them do not.

name: 背叛
description:
This game features a story of [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Betrayal]betrayal[/url].

Betrayal is the breaking or violation of a presumptive contract, trust, or confidence that produces moral and psychological conflict within a relationship amongst individuals, between organizations or between individuals and organizations.

Often betrayal is the act of supporting a rival group, or it is a complete break from previously decided upon or presumed norms by one party from the others. Someone who betrays others is commonly called a traitor or betrayer.

name: 纪律委员女主角
description:
A heroine is a member of the discipline committee.

A discipline committee is a student organization present in many colleges, universities or high schools with the main purpose of enforcing school's rules among the students, such as curfew.

name: 纪律委员会领导女主角
alias:
Disciplinary Committee Leader Heroine
Disciplinary Committee President Heroine
Discipline Committee President Heroine
description:
A heroine is the leader of the discipline committee.

A discipline committee is a student organization present in many colleges, universities or high schools with the main purpose of enforcing school's rules among the students, such as curfew.

name: 主人公的未婚妻作为女主角
description:
One or more of the heroines is a fiancee of the protagonist.

It is not important whether they marry at the end of the story or not, this is about the relation between them.

name: 没有阅读记录
description: In this visual novel the backlog function is not present. You can't read any previous lines.

name: 检查点
alias:
Save only at certain points
Savepoints
description: In this visual novel you can save only at certain points. For example, only before and/or after an important event, a battle, only at certain locations, etc.

name: 与一个家庭谈恋爱
description:
This game features protagonist having a romance with multiple members of a single family.

This can happen when the protagonist has to choose between two romantic interests who are siblings or a parent and a child.

name: 月球
description:
The story takes place on the [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Moon]Moon[/url].

The Moon is Earth's only natural satellite and the fifth largest satellite in the Solar System.

name: 生产
description:
This game features scenes where its characters give [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Birth]birth[/url].

Birth is the act or process of bearing or bringing forth offspring. The offspring is brought forth from the mother. The time of human birth is defined as the time at which the fetus comes out of the mother's womb into the world.

name: 腹部膨胀
description:
This game features scenes where a character's belly is inflated during sexual play. This could be due to the excessive amounts of foreign material (liquids, gasses, monster eggs etc.) introduced to the body or the insertion of over-sized objects (a huge penis, a mass of tentacles or slimes, etc.) through any orifice. It can be consensual or forced.

Can be used together with [url=/g1559]Huge Insertion[/url] if it results in Stomach Deformation.

name: 双持匕首
description: Games that has people using two daggers at the same time.

name: 牺牲
description: This game features characters (maybe the protagonist, heroines or someone else) sacrifice himself/herself to save others or the world.

name: 女演员女主角
description:
One or more heroines in this game are [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Actor]actresses[/url].

An actress is a person who acts in a dramatic production and who works in film, television, theatre, or radio in that capacity. The ancient Greek word for an "actor" means literally "one who interprets" in this sense, an actor is one who interprets a dramatic character.

name: Q版立绘
alias:
SD Sprites
SD Tachies
Super Deformed Tachies
description:
The game occasionally, if not always, employs [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Sprite_%28computer_graphics%29]Character Sprites[/url] drawn in [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Super_deformed]Super Deformed[/url] style.

This tag is intended to be only used for Super Deformed Sprites, [url=http://s.vndb.org/sf/35/20535.jpg]like this example[/url]. It should not to be confused with occasional CGs that show characters that way, [url=http://s.vndb.org/sf/93/16593.jpg]like this example[/url].

name: 机器人男主角
description:
These games have at least one hero that is a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Robot]robot[/url] - an artificial body controlled by an AI.

Contrast with Cyborg Hero, who has a (partially) artificial body that is controlled by a human brain.

name: 兄控女主角
description:
At least one of the heroines is a brocon, a person who is always passionate about her brother (usually the protagonist) and she would do anything for him.

Note: This tag is used to describe heroines personality. For actual sister connection please use the sister heroine tag.

name: 外星人男主角
description:
One or more heroes of this game are of [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Extraterrestrial_life]extraterrestrial[/url] origin.

Extraterrestrial life is defined as life that does not originate from Earth. Also referred to as alien life, or simply aliens, these hypothetical forms of life range from simple bacteria-like organisms to sapient beings far more advanced than humans.

name: 男子气概的主人公
description: A protagonist well gifted with stereotypically male characteristics such as virility, strength and toughness, particularly with regard to sexual attractiveness.

name: 性暗示
alias:
Implied Sexual Content
Subtle Sexual Content
description:
This game has implied sexual content, which means that it has one or more sexual scenes that do not appear graphically or described in minute detail, but are still there. Or it has scenes that are clearly designed as a sexual reference, but dressed up differently as a joke or to get around adult rating.

This may appear graphically, like characters dressing up after sex. Or the script can imply the sex afterwards. Examples for these scenes can be found in [url=http://s.vndb.org/sf/26/62526.jpg]Ever17[/url], [url=http://s.vndb.org/sf/25/62525.jpg]Ar Tonelico[/url] and others.

name: 多个开场动画
description: This game has several opening movies besides the very first one at the beginning, usually seen when game shifts to a new phase of the story and sometimes when the player starts on a newly unlocked route.

name: 问答游戏
description:
These games have some [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Quiz]quiz[/url] elements.

In a quiz game, the player is asked a question and must pick the correct answer or be penalized.

name: 近亲繁殖的女主角
description: The heroine's parents are genetically closely related to each other.

name: 环保主义
description:
These games feature themes concerning the issues of conservation and improvement of the environment.

Environmentalism is a broad philosophy and social movement regarding concerns for environmental conservation and improvement of the health of the environment, particularly as the measure for this health seeks to incorporate the concerns of non-human elements.

Refer to the related [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Environmentalism]Wikipedia[/url] for more details.

name: 丸呑
description:
This game contains scenes of someone being eaten alive.

[url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Vorarephilia]Vorarephilia[/url] is a sexual fetish and paraphilia where arousal occurs from the idea of being eaten, eating another, observing this process, or by the general process of eating. The fantasy most frequently involves the victim being swallowed alive, and may or may not include digestion.

name: 纯文字色情内容
description: Some or all of the erotic content of these VNs are text-only, without any explicit graphics displayed.

name: 多名女性群交
alias:
Group Sex of Several Women
Lesbian Orgy
Yuri Orgy
description:
This visual novel contains group sex scenes, where multiple female partners have sex with one another.

For the purpose of the database, the tag uses the binary understanding of genders, and "Female" refers to a cis woman, who was assigned female at birth and identifies as such.

name: 傲娇主人公
description:
This game features a protagonist that displays [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Tsundere]tsundere[/url] behavior.

Tsundere is a Japanese character development process which describes a person who is initially cold and even hostile towards another person before gradually showing their warm side over time.

name: 窥淫癖
description:
The game has a considerable amount of scenes where voyeurism plays an important part, like peeping on the heroines changing their clothes, peeping on someone else having sex, etc. Please only use it for sexual voyeurism.

Voyeurism is the sexual interest in or practice of spying on people engaged in intimate behaviors, such as undressing, sexual activity, or other activity usually considered to be of a private nature.

name: 关系图表
description: These games have some sort of in-game chart, graph, or other system which displays how the characters relate to you. Examples: http://yare-yare.com/sakurasakura/seesawtohru.jpg or http://s.vndb.org/sf/84/5084.jpg

name: 军事学校
description: A significant portion of the game takes place in a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Military_academy]military school[/url].

name: 变态朋友
description: One of the supporting characters is a bit too occupied with sexual things. Usually this happens to be the best friend of the protagonist or at least as a close friend.

name: 交通工具内做爱
alias:
Boat Sex
Car Sex
Mile High Club
Plane Sex
Train Sex
Vehicle Sex
description: Some sexual scenes in this visual novel take place in a vehicle; a car, a plane, a boat, a train, etc.

name: 麻将作为故事要素
description:
The game [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Mahjong]Mahjong[/url] appears in the the story in some content, but it is not an actually playable minigame, just a story-element or plot-device.

If Mahjong is present in the visual novel as a playable game, use [url=http://vndb.org/g372]Mahjong as Gameplay Element[/url] instead.
