Do NOT use if the heroine becomes pregnant during the course of the story.

name: 鼠娘女主角
description: One or more of the heroines is a mouse-girl.

name: 生存为重
description:
Characters in this story are threatened with tangible death over a period of time and are actively trying to survive the situation.
Examples could be characters stuck in a [url=/g3342]Death Game[/url]/[url=/g664]Battle Royale[/url], a [url=/g2440]Natural Disaster[/url], a [url=/g456]War[/url], or are stranded in space with little oxygen, etc.

Do not use the tag for punctual threats, where no focus is made on survival as the goal, as this tag is not here to tag every VN featuring death fights, which are pretty common with settings such as fantasy, featuring weapons such as swords.

name: 动漫风格的3D
description:
The 3D used by this game evokes the style of Eastern or Western animation (in opposition to realistic 3D), and is usually made with rendering engines like Koikatsu.

Examples are games like [url=/v29271]What's Mine Is Yours: Season 1[/url], [url=/v35869]Keepers 1: Revolution[/url], etc.

Use the tag in addition to the tag describing if the game is [url=/g417]Realime 3D[/url] or [url=/g2693]Render-based[/url].

name: 逼真的3D
alias:
Realistic-style 3D
Daz 3D Graphics
Honey Select Graphics
description:
The 3D used by this game is realistic-looking (in opposition to anime and cartoon-looking) and usually made with rendering engines like Daz 3D or Honey Select.

The majority of games made through Patreon are realistic-looking. Examples are [url=/v25288]Being a DIK[/url], [url=/v21824]Depraved Awakening[/url], [url=/v25342]City of Broken Dreamers[/url], etc.

Use the tag in addition to the tag describing if the game is [url=/g417]Realime 3D[/url] or [url=/g2693]Render-based[/url].

One or more heroes in this game operate a land vehicle.

Includes driving all kinds of land vehicles from city cars to racing ones to buses, trucks etc. But also includes military vehicles like tanks...

Also includes carts and wagons that are pulled by animals but does not include any others that would be better associated with 'riding' than 'driving' like horses, bikes, skateboards and such.

description:
The major focus of the game is on female domination, and all or the vast majority of the scenes pertain to that activity.

Female domination is a BDSM activity in which the dominant partner is female.

This visual novel is based on or an adaptation of an [url=https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Radio_drama]audio drama[/url].

Do not mix with [url=http://vndb.org/g1056]fan-fiction[/url], fan fictions are basically side stories that are not found in the original work.

name: 可更换的配音演员
description: In this visual novel, you can choose between several voice actors for one or more characters.

name: 发情
description:
This visual novel contains characters that can go into heat.

Being "in heat", also known as the [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Estrous_cycle]Estrus cycle[/url], is the period of maximum sexual receptivity that the female of most mammals, excluding humans, experience just prior to ovulation.

In species/monsters with estrous cycles, females are generally only sexually active during the estrus phase of their cycle.

name: 毕业
description: Graduating from an academic institution is an important part of this visual novel's story.

name: 警察暴力
description:
[url=https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Police_brutality]Police brutality[/url] plays a role in this visual novel's story.

Police brutality is the excessive and unwarranted use of force by law enforcement against an individual or a group. It is an extreme form of police misconduct and is a civil rights violation. Police brutality includes, but is not limited to, beatings, shootings, "improper takedowns, and unwarranted use of tasers."

Examples: [url=/v22728]Silver Jiken 25 Ku[/url], [url=/v4511]Portopia Renzoku Satsujin Jiken[/url]

name: Command-based Adventure Game
alias:
Eastern-style Adventure Game
Japanese-style Adventure Game
コマンド選択式ADV
description: This tag is for entries on the database which feature characteristics of a command based adventure game. These are adventure games where the player selects options on an menu listing possible commands (e.g. talk, examine, talk, move, etc) that are used to progress through the narrative and puzzles. A lot of games with this tag are direct precursors to visual novels and [url=https://vndb.org/d2#1]are solely included on the database on that basis[/url], therefore their presence on the database should not be used a reason to include games that are not visual novels.

name: 点击式冒险游戏
alias:
Western-style Adventure Game
Graphical Adventure Game
description:
This visual novel has elements of a [url=https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Adventure_game#Point-and-click_adventure_games]point-and-click adventure game[/url].

Point-and-click adventure games are those where the player typically controls their character through a point and click interface using a computer mouse or similar pointing device, though additional control schemes may also be available. The player clicks to move their character around, interact with non-player characters, often initiating conversation trees with them, examine objects in the game's settings or with their character's item inventory. Many older point-and-click games include a list of on-screen verbs to describe specific actions in the manner of a text adventure, but newer games have used more context-sensitive user interface elements to reduce or eliminate this approach.

While visual novels with said elements are allowed in the database, point-and-click adventure games with negligible VN elements are not.

name: 有晒斑的男主角
alias:
Hero with Sunburn Lines
Hero with Uneven Tan
description:
This game features a hero's body with [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Tan_line]tan lines[/url].

Tan lines refer to a division between an area or areas on the skin of a human of pronounced comparative paleness relative to other areas of their body that have been suntanned by prolonged exposure to ultraviolet radiation. The source of the radiation may be the sun, or artificial UV sources as used in tanning beds.

name: 种族游戏（角色扮演）
description:
This visual novel features one or more scenes involving [url=https://en.m.wiktionary.org/wiki/raceplay]raceplay themed roleplaying[/url]. This is a form of sexual roleplay in which the players act out racially-charged situations, such as interracial slave-master relationships. 

Example: [url=/v28951]Under Control[/url]

name: 色情种族主义
description:
This visual novel features one or more erotic scenes where there are racist power dynamics between at least two characters. There should be at least one character who should be displaying a dominant side towards another character out of racial prejudice.

This tag should not be confused with [url=/g3738]Raceplay (roleplaying)[/url], where these dynamics are explicitly consentual on all sides and the racism is merely an act. 

Example: [url=/v24622]Bully[/url]

name: 改编
description:
This visual novel is an adaptation of another work from a different medium (anime, manga, novels, other games, etc.)

Use this tag or any of the child tags for official or unofficial adaptations that try to remain as faithful as possible to the original story.

If the visual novel contains side stories, unofficial characters or events not present in the original work, use [url=/g1056]Fan-fiction[/url] instead.

name: 角色移动
alias:

description:
This visual novel has a gameplay mechanic where the player is able to control a character within a 2D or 3D space. This allows players to roam around the environment and interact with other characters and objects (like books, audio logs or clues) that develop or advance the story.

Common examples are RPG games like the Rance series, or interactive adventure games like the Danganronpa series.

description: A hero in this game suffers from [url=https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Amnesia]amnesia[/url].

name: 自闭症男主角
description:
This visual novel features at least one hero with [url=https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Autism]autism[/url].

Autism is a disorder of neural development characterized by impaired social interaction, by impaired verbal and non-verbal communication, and by restricted, repetitive or stereotyped behavior. The diagnostic criteria require that symptoms become apparent before a child is three years old.

Note: Please only use this tag if the hero in question is actually diagnosed with autism. Do not use it for characters who are simply too shy to properly communicate for example.

A hero in this game is the leader of a [url=https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Gang]gang[/url].

A gang leader is the person who has the most authority in a gang. In Japan, gang-leaders are usually called as Aniki (meaning older brother) by the other gang members.

This VN contains a [url=https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Family_of_choice]found family[/url] trope.

Found family is a phenomenon where a group of people come to love each other like family, even through (and because) they aren't biologically related.

name: 滥交男主角

A hero in this game is promiscuous. He engages in sexual activity frequently and indiscriminately with different partners.

Promiscuous heroes sleep around not for money like a prostitute, but for their own satisfaction.

Do not mix this with [url=/g3631]Nympho Hero[/url] who can't resist any sexual situation at all.

description: The hero of this visual novel makes decisions and takes action based on logical, practical and/or rational considerations and perspectives. It should be noted that pragmatic people aren't necessarily cold or unemotional.

[url=https://s2.vndb.org/sf/35/179835.jpg]NSFW Example[/url]

A homunculus is an artificial human, given life by magic and/or science.

name: 回合制战术游戏
description:
[url=https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Turn-based_tactics]Turn-Based Tactics[/url] is a subgenre of strategy games generally focused on small-scale conflicts and controlling individual units instead of huge groups of combatants at once, often at the cost of removing or greatly simplifying non-combat strategic layers like resource management. 

TBT games tend to place a higher worth on individual units. To accommodate this, detailed battlefield maps, status rules like stance or facing, and other realism-focused mechanics are common.

For TBT games overlapping with the RPG genre (in particular, the ability to alter units' equipment and gain experience), use [url=/g339]SRPG[/url] tag instead.

name: 猎人男主角

At least one of the heroes is a hunter.

Hunting is the practice of pursuing any living thing (usually wildlife) for food, recreation, or trade. In present-day use, the term refers to lawful hunting, as distinguished from poaching, which is the killing, trapping or capture of the hunted species contrary to applicable law. The species which are hunted are referred to as game and are usually mammals and migratory or non-migratory gamebirds.

Fictional hunters on the other hand are known to hunt anything from animals to humans to monsters...

Ignorant About Sex Heroine

name: 皮条客男主角
description:
Traffickers, also known as pimps or madams, exploit vulnerabilities and lack of opportunities, while offering promises of marriage, employment, education, and/or an overall better life.
However, in the end, traffickers force the victims to become prostitutes or work in the sex industry.
Various work in the sex industry includes prostitution, dancing in strip clubs, performing in pornographic films and pornography, and other forms of involuntary servitude.

A pimp is an agent (usually male) for prostitutes who collects part of their earnings. This act is called procuring or pandering. The pimp may receive this money in return for advertising services, physical protection, or for providing, and possibly monopolizing, a location where he or she (i.e. the prostitute) may engage clients.

The pimp-prostitute relationship can be abusive and possessive, with the pimp using techniques such as psychological intimidation, manipulation, starvation, rape and/or gang rape, beating, confinement, threats of violence toward the victim’s family, forced drug use and the shame from these acts.

name: 夫人女主角
alias:
Trafficker Heroine
Pimp Heroine
Procurer Heroine 
Brothel Keeper Heroine 
Procuress Heroine
description:
Traffickers, also known as pimps or madams, exploit vulnerabilities and lack of opportunities, while offering promises of marriage, employment, education, and/or an overall better life.
However, in the end, traffickers force the victims to become prostitutes or work in the sex industry.
Various work in the sex industry includes prostitution, dancing in strip clubs, performing in pornographic films and pornography, and other forms of involuntary servitude.

A [url=https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Procuring_(prostitution)]pimp[/url] is an agent (usually male) for prostitutes who collects part of their earnings. This act is called procuring or pandering. The pimp may receive this money in return for advertising services, physical protection, or for providing, and possibly monopolizing, a location where he or she (i.e. the prostitute) may engage clients.

A woman who runs a brothel is known as a madam rather than a pimp.

The pimp-prostitute relationship can be abusive and possessive, with the pimp/madam using techniques such as psychological intimidation, manipulation, starvation, rape and/or gang rape, beating, confinement, threats of violence toward the victim’s family, forced drug use and the shame from these acts.

name: 爱情竞争

description:
This game has a story element in which characters compete or show rivalry with each other in order to gain the love of one person, usually the protagonist. It does not matter if the character ends up in dating one person, dating all their love interests, or even not at all.

Do not apply this tag if there is no apparent competition or rivalry between the characters involved, even if it is clear that the characters have love for each other.

If the competing characters are two people, apply its child tag [url=/g336]Love Triangle[/url] instead

name: 2030年代
description: This story takes place at a time between years 2030-2039 on Earth.

name: 基于视频游戏改编
description:
This visual novel is based on or an adaptation of an video game.

Do not mix with [url=http://vndb.org/g1056]fan-fiction[/url], fan fictions are basically side stories that are not found in the original work.

name: 产品植入
description:
This visual novel contains [url=https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Product_placement]product placement[/url] or puts real world brands in positive spotlight. 

Do not use this tag for [url=https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Generic_trademark]generic trademarks[/url], in-game advertising of fictional commodities with no relation to existing products, and neutral name-dropping that serves the narrative or is used for criticism.

There is a death scene for any heroine in all of the possible routes of the game (whether it's their own route or not) or before the branching point (also applies to linear/kinetic novels). The death cannot be avoided.

The tag may be used even if the heroine is later resurrected through some means.

There is a death scene for the protagonist in all of the possible routes of the game or before the branching point (also applies to linear/kinetic novels). The death cannot be avoided.

The scenes where you can choose not to witness the NTR events, but they still happen behind the scenes, should still count as unavoidable.

name: 恋烟癖
description:
This VN has scenes related to [url=https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Smoking_fetishism]smoking fetishism[/url].

Smoking fetishism is a sexual fetish based on the pulmonary consumption (smoking) of tobacco or cannabis, most often via cigarettes, cigars, and also pipes, vapes, and hookahs to some extent. As a fetish, its mechanisms regard sexual arousal from the observation or imagination of a person smoking, sometimes including oneself.

name: 肛门排液

A character in this visual novel expels liquid introduced into their anus, usually through enema, though the expulsion of a large amount of semen or even piss after [url=/g3662]Internal Pissing[/url] might be possible.

Use this tag alongside [url=/g897]Scat[/url] if the expelled liquid also contains feces inside it.

[url=https://t.vndb.org/sf/90/183190.jpg]Example[/url]

name: 反绿帽癖
alias:
Protagonist Lending
Reverse Hothusbanding
Reverse Hotwifing
Reverse Husband Lending
Reverse Husband Sharing
Reverse Partner Lending
Reverse Partner Sharing
Significant other-organised Netorare
Reverse Voluntary Netorare
Reverse Voluntary NTR
Reverse Wife Lending
Reverse Wife Sharing
description:
By the deliberate actions/inactions of the protagonist's significant other (SO), or by the agreement of the SO with the protagonist, in this VN the protagonist ends up engaging in sexual relations with other people. Only the protagonist (whether they are male or female) has sex with others.

Under normal circumstances neither side of the couple has a desire to cheat, but due to the desires of the protagonist's SO, the protagonist will end up having sex with other people. This can be a mutually agreed act with a trustworthy person, which the partner convinces their significant other to have sex with, or a selfish act, with the partner selling or whoring their significant other for personal gain (money, blackmail material on someone, etc.).

In every case, the protagonist's SO is (at least initially) fine with the protagonist being sexually involved with other people, and possibly even enjoys it.

Don't confuse with [url=/g1710]Swinging[/url] where both romantic partners have sex with others, or [url=/g2141]Polyamory[/url], which is a long time agreement involving romantic feelings, while Reverse Netorase is a momentary satisfaction of a kink.

name: 阴道产卵
description:
This game features scenes where it's characters lay eggs from the vagina, through a phenomenon also known as [url=https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Oviparity]oviparity[/url].

Note: It's not important to see the eggs hatching, the important thing for this trait to apply is that the eggs contain any kind of non-human creatures or monsters.

[url=https://t.vndb.org/sf/00/183200.jpg]NSFW Example[/url]

This game features scenes where it's characters lay eggs from the anus, through a phenomenon also known as anal [url=https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Oviparity]oviparity[/url].

Note: It's not important to see the eggs hatching, the important thing for this tag to apply is that the eggs contain any kind of non-human creatures or monsters.

[url=https://t.vndb.org/sf/01/183201.jpg]NSFW Example[/url]

name: 小仙子主人公
description: The protagonist of this game is (or later becomes) a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Fairy]fairy[/url].

Fictional Feudal Japan
description: Game is set in a fictionalized Medieval Japan (roughly 1200-1800), primarily characterized by feudal society structure.

name: 工作人员评论
description: This game features a section for staff to comment on their game, generally accessible from the main menu. It could be comments about development, anecdotes, future planning, etc.

name: 21世纪
description:
This story takes place at a time between years 2001-2100 on Earth.

More details on [url=https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/21st_century]21st Century[/url] can be found on Wikipedia.

name: Framed GUI
description:
In this game, elements belonging to the GUI cover the sides of the screen or wrap around it completely.

Examples: [url=https://t.vndb.org/sf/28/195928.jpg]1[/url], [url=https://t.vndb.org/sf/29/195929.jpg]2[/url], [url=https://t.vndb.org/sf/30/195930.jpg]3[/url].

name: 基于电影改编
description:
This visual novel is based on or an adaptation of a movie.

Do not mix with [url=http://vndb.org/g1056]fan-fiction[/url], fan fictions are basically side stories that are not found in the original work.

name: Optional Vertical Text
alias:
Adjustable Text Orientation
Text Orientation Toggle
description: This VN supports vertical text, but it also allows the user to freely switch to the more common horizontal text that is used in most VNs.

name: Spooktober VN Jam
description: This visual novel was created for the [url=https://itch.io/jam/spooktober-visual-novel-jam]Spooktober Visual Novel Jam[/url], an annual game jam focused around producing visual novels with themes of Halloween and horror.

name: Mandatory Choice Between Voices OR Subtitles
alias: Voices Without Subtitles OR Subtitles Without Voices
description: This game is voiced but it forces the reader to choose between having voices without subtitles or subtitles without voices. You cannot have both at the same time.

name: Asexual Characters
description:
At least one of the characters of this game identifies as asexual. 

Asexuality is the lack of sexual attraction to others. It may be considered a sexual orientation or the lack thereof. 

Please don't use this tag for abstinence or celibacy.

name: Touken Ranbu
description: This visual novel features characters from [url=https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Touken_Ranbu]Touken Ranbu[/url].

name: Optional Freeze Window on Losing Focus
alias: Toggle Freeze Window When Losing Focus
description: You can set if the game should freeze or not on losing the focus.

name: Host Club Protagonist
description: The protagonist of this visual novel works at a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Host_club]host club[/url].

name: Jigsaw Puzzle
description:
This game contains [url=https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Jigsaw_puzzle]jigsaw puzzles[/url].

A jigsaw puzzle is a tiling puzzle that requires the assembly of often irregularly shaped interlocking and mosaicked pieces, each of which typically has a portion of a picture. When assembled, the puzzle pieces produce a complete picture.

name: Crippled Hero
alias:
Amputee Hero
Hero with Missing Limbs
Hero with no Arms
Hero with no Legs
description: A hero who has severely impaired physical abilities because of deformation, injury, or amputation of parts of the body.

name: Vietnam
description: This visual novel is set in [url=https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Vietnam]Vietnam[/url].

name: Crossdressing Protagonist as a Secret
description:
The protagonist (male or female) of that game is crossdressing and has to keep their crossdressing under wraps, otherwise there will be consequences.

The most common example is when the protagonist has to infiltrate an [url=/g423]all-girl school[/url] and for that is forced to crossdress.

Another example would be when the protagonist likes to crossdress but doesn't want people to know, because they will be mocked if discovered.

Do not tag games where nobody knows the protagonist crossdresses, but this state is not the consequence of the protagonist actively trying to deceive people, just the consequence of a convincing crossdressing.

Do not tag games where the secret is exposed early on.

name: Germany
description: This visual novel is set in [url=https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Germany]Germany[/url].

name: Autistic Protagonist
description:
This visual novel features a protagonist with [url=https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Autism]autism[/url].

Autism is a disorder of neural development characterized by impaired social interaction, by impaired verbal and non-verbal communication, and by restricted, repetitive or stereotyped behavior. The diagnostic criteria require that symptoms become apparent before a child is three years old.

Note: Please only use this tag if the protagonist in question is actually diagnosed with autism. Do not use it for characters who are simply too shy to properly communicate for example.

name: Archer Hero
description:
A hero in this game is an archer, be it in a sport-related capacity or as a general vocational skill.

[url=https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Archery]Archery[/url] is the sport, practice or skill of using a bow to propel arrows. Historically, archery has been used for hunting and combat. In modern times, it is mainly a competitive sport and recreational activity.

name: Online Streamer Protagonist
alias:
Live Streamer Protagonist
Let's Player Protagonist
YouTuber Protagonist
Internet Streamer Protagonist
description:
The protagonist of this game is an [url=https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Online_streamer]online streamer[/url].

Online streamer is a person who broadcasts themselves online through a live stream or prerecorded video. The scope of online streamers has grown to include different genres ranging from playing video games, tutorials, or even solo chats.

Note that this trait only applies to non-sexual streamers.

name: Online Streamer Heroine
alias:
Live Streamer Heroine
Let's Player Heroine
YouTuber Heroine
Internet Streamer Heroine
description:
One or more of the heroines in this game is an [url=https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Online_streamer]online streamer[/url].

Online streamer is a person who broadcasts themselves online through a live stream or prerecorded video. The scope of online streamers has grown to include different genres ranging from playing video games, tutorials, or even solo chats.

Note that this trait only applies to non-sexual streamers.

name: Family Drama
alias:
Conflict Within a Family
Sibling Drama
Parent and Child Drama
description:
This story has elements of family drama, such as a falling out/feud between siblings or a parent and a child.

Don't confuse this tag with a [url=/g1865]Family Feud[/url], which is a feud between two or more different families.

name: Instrumentalist Protagonist

Drummer Protagonist

Guitarist Protagonist
Protagonist Playing on a Musical Instrument

description: The protagonist of this visual novel plays a musical instrument.

name: Multiple Positions In Background With Fixed Perspective
description:
The game features at least one sex scene set against a single background with fixed perspective while the characters in it change positions.

The passing of time can be shown, as well as the items displayed can change place, to show how disheveled the place is becoming over time.

Do not use the tag for sex scenes involving multiple positions where every CG is unique and therefore features a different perspective.

Example from [url=/v15167]Kedamono-tachi no Sumu Ie de[/url]: https://f.blicky.net/f.php?h=2S5XjsYO&p=1 > https://f.blicky.net/f.php?h=0Dj6NHwu&p=1 > https://f.blicky.net/f.php?h=1VdA85hI&p=1.

name: Only Non-Binary Love Interests
alias:
Only Nonbinary Love Interests
Only Genderqueer Love Interests
Only Non Binary Love Interests
description:
All of the love interests in this game are [url=https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Non-binary_gender]non-binary or genderqueer[/url]. 

Non-binary genders are gender identities that don't fit within the accepted binary of male and female. People can feel they are both, neither, or some mixture thereof.

This is regardless of their physical sex or the way they present.

Please don't use this tag for characters of unconfirmed gender. This tag is only for characters officially confirmed to be of a non-binary gender.

name: To Love Ru
alias:
To LOVEる -とらぶる-
出包王女
とらぶる
description: These games feature characters from the [url=https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/To_Love_Ru]To Love Ru[/url] series.

name: Clumsy Hero
description:
One or more heroes in this game are [url=http://dictionary.reference.com/browse/clumsy]clumsy[/url] or known to be [url=https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Accident-proneness]prone to accidents[/url].

A clumsy person is someone lacking in skill or physical coordination, who tends to be prone to more accidents then others.

Accident-proneness, also known as clumsiness, is the conception that some people might have predisposition, or that they might be more likely to suffer accidents, such as car crashes and industrial injuries, than other people. It may be used as a reason to deny any insurance on such individuals.

name: Protagonist Face Toggle
description:
These VNs have a toggle to turn the protagonist's face ON or OFF.

Usually this affects the Side Image, but in some cases might even affect the appearance (or not) of the protagonist's sprite.

name: Jump-to-Ejaculation Button
description: The eroge with this tag provides a way for the reader to make the jump directly to the ejaculation sequence during the ero scene.

name: Dancer Protagonist
description:
The protagonist of this game is a dancer.

A dancer is a person who dances professionally, as on the stage.

name: Programmer Protagonist
alias:
Coder Protagonist
Developer Protagonist
I.T. Protagonist
description:
The protagonist of this VN is a programmer. 

Computer programming is the process of designing, writing, testing, debugging / troubleshooting, and maintaining the source code of computer programs.

This source code is written in a programming language. The purpose of programming is to create a program that exhibits a certain desired behavior. The process of writing source code often requires expertise in many different subjects, including knowledge of the application domain, specialized algorithms and formal logic.

name: Muscle Worship
description: Muscle Worship (sthenolagnia) is a mild form of BDSM where someone touches, rubs, massages, kisses, and/or licks the muscles of their partners body in a sexually arousing manner.

name: Protagonist with Gradient Colored Hair
description: The protagonist of this game's hair is rendered in a [url=https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Color_gradient]color gradient[/url] for stylistic purposes.

name: Post-War
description:
Story takes place after a war.

A post-war or postwar period is the interval immediately following the end of a war.

Do not use the tag for [url=/g68]Post Apocalyptic Earth[/url], even if that came to be as a result of the war.

name: Asia
description:
Most or all of the story of this game takes place in [url=https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Asia]Asia[/url].

Asia is the largest continent in the world by both land area and population. It is bounded on the east by the Pacific Ocean, on the south by the Indian Ocean, and on the north by the Arctic Ocean. The border of Asia with Europe is a historical and cultural construct, as there is no clear physical and geographical separation between them.

name: Online Streamer Hero

Online streamer is a person who broadcasts themselves online through a live stream or prerecorded video. The scope of online streamers has grown to include different genres ranging from playing video games, tutorials, or even solo chats.

The protagonist of this game is a [url=https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Fisherman]fisherman[/url].

A fisherman or fisher is someone who captures fish and other animals from a body of water, or gathers shellfish.

Aesthetic Plastic Surgery
Breast Enhancement
Lip Enhancement
Facelift
description:
This visual novel prominently features cosmetic surgery. Cosmetic surgery is an optional procedure that is performed on normal parts of the body with the only purpose of improving a person's appearance and/or removing signs of aging.

The scope of cosmetic surgery procedures includes:
* Breast Enhancement: Augmentation, Lift, Reduction
* Facial Contouring: Rhinoplasty, Chin, or Cheek Enhancement
* Facial Rejuvenation: Facelift, Eyelid Lift, Neck Lift, Brow Lift
* Body Contouring: Tummy Tuck, Liposuction, Gynecomastia Treatment
* Skin Rejuvenation: Laser Resurfacing, Botox, Filler Treatments

name: Fitness Centre

This visual novel has many scenes set in a public gym, a facility specialized for indoor sports and exercise.

Do not use the tag for VNs set in or around the school gym facilities.

This visual novel contains sex scenes, where at least one character is male, at least one is female, and at least one other character either does not conform to a traditional gender identity (transgender, genderqueer, non-binary or intersex), or is an entity that does not have a traditional gender identity (futanari, dickgirl).

For the purpose of the database, the tag uses the binary understanding of genders, and "Male" refers to a cis man, who was assigned male at birth and identifies as such. "Female" refers to a cis woman, who was assigned female at birth and identifies as such.

name: Dickgirl on Female
description: Sex between a [url=/i3103]Body > Dickgirl[/url] and a woman, with the woman on the receiving end.

name: Rus vs. Lizards
description:
A fictional setting about the confrontation between the ancient Rus and the lizards.

The main source of the fictional theory is the YouTube channel [url=https://www.youtube.com/channel/UC5vQ7qMTapu70SGUe9lYGzA]Professor Bagirov[/url]. Its author introduces himself as a candidate of historical sciences with 4 higher educations. "On my channel, I am engaged in exposing the lizard ideology and a detailed analysis of the fact of the substitution of historical events." his description says.

The videos went viral, and a long-running meme appeared in the Russian-speaking community. In the setting of Rus vs. Lizards, many video games, videos, and books have been made.

name: Homeless Protagonist
description:
The protagonist of this game is [url=https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Homelessness]homeless[/url].

Homelessness describes the condition of people without a regular dwelling. People who are homeless are unable or unwilling to acquire and maintain regular, safe, and adequate housing, or lack "fixed, regular, and adequate night-time residence."

name: Cupid Hero
description: At least one hero in this game is a [url=https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Cupid]cupid[/url], a god of love.

name: Maid Cosplay
description:
The visual novel features a character cosplaying as a maid.

Key point of maid cosplay is a [url=https://t.vndb.org/sf/30/205330.jpg]maid dress[/url] (headband, stockings, high heels...). Not all parts of the costume are necessary for the tag to apply.

name: India
alias:
Republic of India
Bharat
Bhārat Gaṇarājya
description: This visual novel is set in [url=https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/India]India[/url].

name: Sex Toy Support
description: This game has built-in support for interaction with sex toys, such as Bluetooth-enabled vibrators.

name: Side Textbox
description:
The textbox in this game covers either the left or the right portion of the screen, with the other side usually reserved to display the image.

The textbox may be fully or semi-transparent, or have its own unique background.

name: Management Simulation
description:
A video-game genre where the player runs or manages a fictional setting, like a business or city, with the use of several stats that need to be managed effectively to reach specific goals.

Most games from this genre also requires a careful management of a limited resource, usually money, time or energy, that players must distribute, spend and organize to maximize efficiency.

These games may also include several stats for the characters, like keeping the staff or customers happy or comfortable, which can unlock new interactions, scenes or abilities.

name: Religion/Faith
alias:
Religious Themes
Religion Discussions
Faith Discussions
description:
This VN involves prominent discussions or themes surrounding religion, faith, and spirituality. 

Characters in this VN talk about, question, or debate religious beliefs, practices, or concepts like the existence of god(s). The plot may center around a clash of religious views, a character's spiritual journey, or the impact of religion on their decisions and worldview.

name: Succession/Inheritance Conflict
description:
The characters in this visual novel are a part of a conflict involving a position or material wealth that is or will be left up for grabs due to the transfer of power, usually involving the passing of the current or past holder.

The desired position or material gain should be coveted by multiple individuals, usually belonging to the same family or organization.

name: Rough Sex (Consensual)
description:
This game features one or more scenes featuring consensual rough sex.

Rough sex is simply sex or sexual practices like [url=/g2160]Strangulation Sex[/url], [url=/g1454]Deepthroat[/url], [url=/g1171]Erotic Spanking[/url], [url=/g3042]Hair Pulling (Sexual)[/url], [url=/g3151]Anal Sex[/url] performed in an aggressive way. There is no power exchange happening, there is no intent to dominate or submit. The intent/motivation is more related to unbridled passion, rather than giving/taking power. 
Rough sex isn't romantic. It’s animalistic, passionate, edgy, aggressive, and sometimes painful.

Note, that this tag relates only to the rough sex happening in a consensual context otherwise it's just rape or assault. The character giving rough sex cannot force themselves, or be incited by a third party to force themselves, on the receiving person. The receiving person cannot be under the influence of drugs/aphrodisiacs, or mind control.

name: Sentai
description:
Sentai represents a genre of action-packed, team-based shows where collaboration, teamwork, and courage are central themes based on the [url=https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Super_Sentai]Super Sentai[/url] franchise.

Key characteristics of Sentai shows:
Color-coded Heroes: Each hero typically wears a uniform of a specific color (e.g., Red Ranger, Blue Ranger, etc.).
Transformation: Sentai members can transform into their superhero forms using special devices or phrases.
Giant Robots (Mecha): The team usually has access to large robots that are formed by combining individual vehicles or robots.
Fighting Evil: The Sentai team battles against villains, monsters, or evil organizations in various forms.

name: Impact-Play
description:
This game contains one or more scenes featuring [url=https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Impact_play]impact-play[/url].

Impact play is a sexual practice in which one person is struck (usually repeatedly) by another person for the gratification of either or both parties which may or may not be sexual in nature. It is considered a form of [url=/g1117]BDSM[/url].

name: Erotic Beating (Consensual)
alias:
Erotic Hitting (Consensual)
Erotic Punching (Consensual)
Erotic Slapping (Consensual)
Erotic Fighting (Consensual)
description:
This game contains one or more scenes featuring erotic beating in a consensual context.

Consensual erotic beating is the sexual activity that involves hurting, beating, hitting, punching or slapping a character for the sexual gratification of the parties involved, whether they are the one being beaten up, or the one administering the beating.

name: Criminal Heroine
description:
At least one of the heroines in this game is a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Criminal]criminal[/url].

A criminal is a character that violates the law. Crime is the breach of rules or laws for which some governing authority (via mechanisms such as legal systems) can ultimately prescribe a conviction.

name: Criminal Protagonist

The protagonist in this game is a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Criminal]criminal[/url].

A criminal is a character that violates the law. Crime is the breach of rules or laws for which some governing authority (via mechanisms such as legal systems) can ultimately prescribe a conviction.

A criminal is a character that violates the law. Crime is the breach of rules or laws for which some governing authority (via mechanisms such as legal systems) can ultimately prescribe a conviction.

description:
This game has important characters suffering from [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Major_depressive_disorder]major depressive disorder[/url]. This affects the other characters in the game as well as the overall mood.

Major depressive disorder is a mental disorder characterized by an all-encompassing low mood accompanied by low self-esteem, and by loss of interest or pleasure in normally enjoyable activities.

Do not use the tag for games with general depressing storylines or those that have sad or moody characters.

name: Size Difference Fetish
description: Visual novels with this tag include scenes where the difference in height between the participants plays a fetishistic role. This is often sexual, but sometimes not.

name: Microphilia
description:
Visual novels with this tag include scenes of a microphilic nature. This is often sexual, but sometimes not.

Microphilia refers to a fascination with or a sexual fantasy involving miniature or shrunken people. The miniature people in question might have originally been of that size, or they may have been normal-sized people that have been suddenly shrunk.

name: Dickgirl on Dickgirl
description: This visual novel contains sexual scenes between dickgirls.
